siri-vaddha māṇasūri viraiyaṁ
jugāijiṇiṁda-cariyaṁ
( siri-risahanāhacariyaṁ )
namaha' jugāijiṇidaṁ purisōttimanābhisaṁbhavaṁ payaḍaṁ । varanāṇa- daṁsaṇa- raviṁ sugayamaṇaṁtaṁ mahādēvaṁ ॥1॥
ēgamaṇēgasarūvaṁ dullakkha paramajōgi paccakkhaṁ | avvayamasaṁkhamakkhayamōsappiṇipaḍhamatitthayaraṁ ||2||
saṁkuddha - sakka - vikkhitta ditta - daṁbhōli-daṇa-bhayabhīō । saraṇaṁ saraṇaṁ ti tumaṁ bhagavaṁ ! maha hōha japatō ॥3॥
jassa bhuvaṇēkkaguruṇō payaṁtaraṁ pāviūṇa asuriṁdō । sakkāō vi na saṁkai sō saraṇaṁ maha mahāvīrō ||4||
ajiyāī jayapayaḍē arihaṁtē paramapūyamarihaṁtē । arahaṁtē aruhaṁtē namāmi siripāsanāhaṁtē ॥5॥
suya-sāyara-pāragayaṁ bharaha suyaṁ risahagaṇaharaṁ paḍhamaṁ । viyasiya- puṁḍariya-muhaṁ puṁḍariyaṁ gaṇaharaṁ vaṁdē ॥6॥
khaṁtikhamaṁ vijiyakkhaṁ dakkhaṁ kiriyāsu mōkkhagayalakkhaṁ । vīrassa paḍhamasīsaṁ gōyamagaṇahāriṇaṁ namimō ||7||
jāō ajōggayassa vi jāṇa pasāēṇa majjha guṇajōgō | tāṇamaṇaṁta-guṇāṇaṁ guruṇa paya-paṁkayaṁ sarimō ॥8॥
aṇṇēya mahākaiṇō varamuṇiṇō jē ya kē vi iha guṇiṇō । kali-kayavara-kamalasamā jayaṁtu tē piṁḍiyā 3 savvē ||9||
ēgēṇa vāma- hatthēṇa pōtthayaṁ bīyaēṇa maṇiyāli । taiēṇa 4 dāhiṇēṇaṁ karēṇa kamalaṁ dharēmāṇī ॥ 10 ॥
saralaṁgu li- vivara-viṇissa raṁtalāyanna-jala - pavāhēṇaṁ । turiēṇa tihuyaṇassa vi varappayāṇaṁ karēmāṇī ॥ 11 ॥
viyasiya-vara - kamalagayā siya-vasaṇā kuṁda- kaliya- sama-dasaṇā । kaviyaṇa-muhakayavāsā sarassaī jayai supayāsā * ॥ 12 ॥
assyanayaṇāṇaṁdō nivvaviyāsēsa mahiyalābhōgō । sāraya-sasivva suhaō jaya-payaḍō sajjanō jayai ॥ 13 ॥
amuṇiyaguṇaparimāṇō gayaṇābhōgō vva nimmala - sahāvō । jō khaṁḍiō vi na muyai niyapayaī caṁdaṇa - taru vva ॥ 14 ॥
lēi guṇē cciya, dōsē dūraṁ pariharai kavvamajjhāō । dhayaraṭṭhō viva suyaṇō mōttūṇa payaṁ payaṁ piyai ॥ 15 ॥
dōsamaliṇaṁ pi kavvaṁ suyaṇē paḍiyaṁ sunimmalaṁ hōi । maliṇō vi ki kuraṁgō na sahai sasi - maṁḍalārūḍhō ? ॥ 16 ॥
samalaṁ pisuddha hiyayā dasadisi - pasaraṁ tanimmala-payāvā । vimalaṁ kuṇati kavvaṁ bhuvaṇaṁ dinanāha-kiraṇō vva ॥ 17॥
tē viralā jē guṇiṇō guṇarāgō jāṇa tē vi iha viralā । na guṇī na ya guṇarāgī na maccharī tē vi dullabhā ॥ 18 ॥
guṇarahiyā guṇapakkhavāya vimuhā muhā vi macchariṇō । baṁbhaṁḍa-maṁḍalaṁ pihu na pahuppai tāṇa purisāṇa ।। 19 ।।
khaṁḍēi" kalāvaṁtaṁ duṭṭhamuhō mittamaṁḍalaṁ druhai" । na gaṇai guruṁ pi pisuṇō tamō vva guṇamaccharī pāvō ||20||
dahṇō dahai sarīraṁ laggō aṁgēsu na uṇa dūraṭhiō । pisuṇō puṇa dūratthō vi dahai dēhaṁ na saṁdēhō ॥ 21 ॥
dujjaṇa- duvvayaṇa-mahāhisaṁkiō bhamai sajjanō niccaṁ । jaṁ parachiddaggāhī gharē gharē saṁti pisuṇāhī ||22||
mahu-mahurō muhapuraō pacchā puṇa kuṇai ki pitaṁ * jēṇa । ghummāvai harai jiyaṁ visaṁ va visamō khalō lōō ||23||
dukkha kīrai kavvaṁ dūsai taṁ dujjaṇō suhēṇēva । ahava jāṇai vaṁjhā jā viyaṇā
vararūva- jāi - kulubbhavāē 2

laṭṭhīē pīliō vihu kusaēṇa samāhaō vi muha-mūlē । taha vikhalōna vi mēllai khalattaṇaṁ kaḍuyabhāvaṁ ca ॥ 27 ॥
avagaṇṇiō vi na muyai maggaṁ' ḍaṁḍāhaō vi nō ṭhāi । pisuṇō sayā bhasaṁtō uvvēyaṁ kuṇai kavilō vva ॥ 28 ॥
adi-dōsa- pajja liya-hiyaya-dhūmaṁdhayāra khala- vayaṇē । caṁda- kiraṇa vva dhavalā kaiṇō rēhaṁti guṇanivahā ॥ 29 ॥

siririsahanāhassa dhanasatthavāha-bhavō
pallavamēttaggāhī nāṇalavēṇāvi uttaṇō bhamai । giṇhai na aṇṇa- bhaṇiyaṁ duviyaḍḍhō vajjaṇijjō u ॥ 41 ॥
duhaṁ puṇa parisāṇaṁ uvaṭṭhiyāṇaṁ buhēṇa agilāē । saṁsāra- dukkha-dalaṇī dhammakahā hōi kāvvā ||42 ||
alamittha vittharēṇaṁ kallāṇayapaṁcarayaṇacicaiyaṁ । paṁcāhigārabaddhaṁ sui- suha-jaṇayaṁ maṇabhirāmaṁ ||43||
puṇṇaṁ paraṁ pavittaṁ kallāṇaṁ maṁgalaṁ sivaṁ dhaṇṇaṁ । vimalaṁ vimaliyabhavvaṁ jayajīvāsāsayaṁ suhayaṁ ॥44॥
muha-nijjharāō jhariyaṁ cariyaṁ pāēṇa risahanāhassa । kannaṁjalīhiṁ pijjau jalaṁ va sai sajjaṇajaṇēṇa ॥45॥

tēyappasaraṁ, tiyasavai - sahāmaṁḍavaṁ va vibahā hiṭṭhiyaṁ sugayāṇugayaṁ ca mayalaṁchaṇamaṁḍalaṁ va ānaṁdiyaṁjaṇaṁ jayapāyaḍaṁ ca,
sālāhaṇagāhākō sasatthaṁ va sarasajaṇa-manōharaṁ sālaṁkāraṁ ca sugayavayaṇaṁ va karuṇāṇu gayaṁ dhammakittisaṇāhaṁ ca, dasarahabhavaṇaṁ
va rāmāṇurāyaraṁjiyaṁ lakkhaṇāṇugayaṁ ca, ahivaisarūvaṁ va mahābhōgasāraṁ suppaiṭṭiyadharaṇimaṁḍalaṁ va khiipaiṭṭiyaṁ nāma nayaraṁ ।
ēkkō cciya para dōsō aha tammi purammi guṇasamiddhammi । jaṁ vasai sayākālaṁ paradukkhē dukkhiō lōō ||46 ||

jugāṛa jijiṁda-variyaṁ
mahaṁta jāṇavattagayamappāṇayaṁ sumiṇaē, pāsiūṇa ya paḍibuddhō । 'kimēyaṁ ?' ti citāurō jāva ciṭṭhai tāva paḍhiyaṁ avasarā-
gaēṇa maṁgalapāḍhaēṇa-
kumuyavaṇamasōhaṁ paumasaṁḍaṁ susōhaṁ amaryāvigayasōyaṁ ghūya-vakkāṇa vakkaṁ ॥
pasiḍhilakarajālō jāi atthaṁ mayaṁkō । udayagirisiratthō bhāi bhāṇū pasatyō ॥53॥
sēvijjaṁtī visayā diṇē diṇē jā nava vva paḍihāi । ghummāviyanayaṇajuyā muccau niddā taha piyā ya ॥ 54 ॥
taṁ sōūṇa uṭṭiō dhaṇō । kayagōsakaraṇijjō paṇaō dēva-guru-pāya-paṁkayāṇaṁ, uvaviṭṭhō uvarimabhūmiyāē, samāhūō
sumiṇasattha- pāḍhagō । nivēiō tassa sumiṇaō । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "satyavāha ! saṁsāra - jalahijāṇavattatullēṇa siyavasaṇa'-

ētthaṁtarē'samaṁjasamimēhiṁ vihiyaṁ ti picchiuṁ sūrō। lajjaṁtō viva atyagirisiharisiharaṁ samārūḍhō ।। 135 ।।
naṁ najjai rōsēṇa va rattā saṁjhā disāvahūṇaṁ pi । daṭṭhūṇākajjamiṇaṁ sāmībhūyāṇi va muhāṇi ।। 136 ।।
taō akayakajjō vimaṇadummaṇō paḍiniyatō mayaṇaviggahapariyaṇō । mayaṇaviggahō vi pāṇiggahaṇa diyahādārambha
nimbharāṇurāyarattamāṇasō pavaḍḍhamāṇanāṇāviha-parihāsaṁ aṇavarayacāḍukammakaraṇapayaḍiyasiṇēhanibbharaṁ mayaṇamaṁjarīē saha
visayahamaṇuhavaṁtō kālaṁ gamēi ।
aṇṇā gimhālē raisamarasamma nissahā ṇila-sīya rasittakusumasattharē nuvaṇṇāṇi rayaṇīē suhapasuttāṇi cēva
ḍakkāṇi bhuyaṁgamēṇa, majjhimaguṇajōgaō mariūṇa jāyāṇi sajjhagirisamāsannāē kālāsaṇi nāmiyāē mahāḍavīē puliṁdāṇi,
pattāṇi jōnvaṇaṁ । adiṭṭhapiyavippaōgāṇi īsāvisāyaviṣyamukkamāṇasāṇi sayāsannihiyakaṁda-mūla-phalā saṇāṇi jharaṁta-
nijjharasīyala-salila - pāṇa-muiyāṇi kālaṁ gamiti' । jaō--
sāhīṇaphala - jalāṇaṁ adiṭṭhapiyavippaōgasuhiyāṇaṁ । asuyakhalajaṁpiyāṇaṁ suhaō vāsō pulidāṇaṁ ॥ 137 ॥
sa ya satyapaṭṭā paṇaṭṭamaggā iō taō pariyaḍaṁtā bahusīsaparivārā mahāvi paviṭṭhā suppaṭṭasūriṇō, asaṇa-
pāṇavirahiyāṇaṁ samaikkaṁtā satta vāsarā । annamma dinē gāma - gōulāi - gavēsaṇanimittaṁ thalamārūḍhō ēgō muṇivarō । diṭṭhō
dūrāō cēva sabarēṇa । 'piē ! adiṭṭhapuvvaṁ dīsai' tti bhaṇirēṇa samārōviyaṁ dhaṇuvaraṁ, gahiō sarō dāhiṇakarēṇa । savisēsaṁ
nirūviūṇa sāhu-daṁsaṇasaṁjāyajāi - saraṇāē bhayavēviraṁgīē jaṁpiyaṁ pulidīē - - " piyayama ! saṁhara saraṁ, muṇivarō viya
lakkhīyai ।" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "kahamakayakajjō sarō saṁharijjai ?" sabarīē bhaṇiyaṁ --
gaya-paharaṇahaṁ adōhahaṁ jīvadayāvarahaṁ, karuṇāmayamayara-harahaṁ dhammadhuraṁdharahaṁ ।
sayalasaṁgaparicattahaṁ saṁtahaṁ suhayarahaṁ, piya ! paharaṁtu paḍisi narai tuhuṁ muṇivarahaṁ ॥138 ।।
taō samuttāriyasarāsaṇō saṁhariyarō gaō sāhusamīvaṁ sabarīē saha sabarō, paṇamiō muṇī, gayāṇi muṇiṇā
gurusamībaṁ, kayā guruhiṁ dhammadēsaṇā । ladvāvasaraṁ jaṁpiyaṁ sabarīē - - " bhayavaṁ ! bahupuṇṇapāvaṇijjāṇaṁ tumhārisāṇamatihīṇa-
māgayāṇaṁ kiṁ karēu araṇṇavāsī amhārisajaṇō ?" guruṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " bhaddē ! na saṁtappiyavvaṁ, bhavvāṇaṁ cēva ēvaṁvihō bhāvō
bhavai ।” sabarīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ bhayavaṁ ! karēha mē aṇuggahaṁ kaṁdāīhiṁ ।" sāhiō guruhi saṁkhēvēṇa kappākappavihī । sabarīē

paḍipuṇṇaṁ kāūṇa visajjiyā sāhuṇō gayā saṭṭāṇaṁ । bhuttā āgamavihīē । samāsatthamāṇasā samōyāriyā maggē

saṁpayaṁ sīlē sōladhaṇāudāharaṇaṁ--
atthi ihēva jaṁbuddīvē bhārahēvāsē bahudivasavaṇṇaṇijjaguṇagaṇaṁ dharaṇi ramaṇīmuha-tilayabhūyaṁ saṁkāsaṁ nāmaṁ nayaraṁ ।

asāhāraṇarūva-sōhaggāigaṇagaṇa-viṇijjiyā sēsanārīgaṇā vīyarāya payapaṁkaya-mahayarī sīladhaṇā nāma bhāriyā । jā ya

jidipāya- paṁkayāvalī viva varalakkhaṇā vibuhāhiṭṭiyā ya, tiyaṁsa- sariya vva sadayā paramēsarāṇugayā ya; jīsē kōhō
pāvakammēsu na pariyaṇēsu, jīsē bahumāṇō guṇagaṇēsu na saṁtēsu vi niya jāi-kula-rūva-lāyannēsu; jīsē aliyāṇugayā
cihurā na samullāvā, nimmala - kavōlapaṛimāviraiyamaya maya- pattalēhā kalaṁka kiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ na sīlaṁ, savaṇāsattāṇi suvaṇṇa-
rayaṇujjalāṇi kuṁḍalāṇi na pisuṇajaṇajaṁpiyāṇi, dūrunnaya-garuya su saṁgaya supurisāṇugāriṇō payōharā na paḍivakkhā, muṇāla-
sukumālāō bāhulayāō na buddhīō, taṇuō majjhō na dāṇappasarō, vitthiṣṇō niyaṁbō na rōsō, kummunnayā calaṇā
na dasaṇā ।

vayārā vihiyavilēvaṇā varakuṁkumakayapūyā puraō vitthariyabalivihāṇā dhūvakaḍacchuyahatthā pāyavaḍiyā karēsu sayaladēvayā-
rāhaṇaṁ, uvayarasu maṁtataṁtaviyāṇaē, pajjuvāsēsu bahusuē, saraṇaṁ pavajjasu kuladēvayācalaṇē; ahaṁ puṇa na jāva vānaravaiya-
rassa pāraṁgaō na tāva bhajāmi tti kāūṇa nicchyaṁ ṭhiō । samaikkaṁtā satta vāsarā, aṭṭamadiṇarayaṇīē aṁtarikkha-
māvaṇṇēṇa sinēhasāraṁ bhaṇiō niya jaṇaēṇa dhaṇamittēṇa - "vaccha ! kimēvamappā kilēsijjai ?” paramēsarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ --
" tāya ! kilēsō vi sahalō jēṇa maṇōrahāṇaṁ pi dullahaṁ tubbhēhi saha daṁsaṇaṁ jāyaṁ, kilēsakāraṇaṁ puṇa vānaravilasiyaṁ ।"
jakkhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " mā saṁtappasu suṇēsu vānaravuttaṁtaṁ, mariūṇāhaṁ samuppaṇṇō vaṁtarataiyanikāē viṇayaṁdharō nāma jakkhō,
diṇṇōvaōgēṇa diṭṭha-tumaṁ niravaccō puttōvāyaṁ pai nirujjamō ya, aō samāgaṁtr̥̄ṇa vānaravēṇa puttaṁ pai tumaṁ ujjamaṁ
kāriō, tā taha kaha vi samujjamasu jahā acirādēva bhē puttō bhavai ।" savinayaṁ calaṇēsu nivaḍiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ paramē-
sarēṇa -- " tāya ! tumammi suppasaṇṇē savvaṁ mē sāhīṇaṁ, na khēō kāyavvō ।” jakkhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ vaccha ! atthi aṁgā baṁgāṇaṁ
jaṇavayāṇaṁ majjhabhāē mahābhēravā nāma mahāaḍavī, tīsē bahumajjhadēsabhāē maggāsaṇṇaṁ māṇavajakkhāyayaṇaṁ varārāmōya, atthi ṇaṁ
tattha suyasaṁpayā nāma mahōsahī, aṇēgahā diṭṭhapaccayā sā maē tuha puttanimittaṁ gahiumāraddhā, diṭṭhōhaṁ mānavajakkhēṇa,
sarōsaṁ khara- niṭhuravayaṇēhi nibbhacchiūṇa bhaṇiō -- "rē pāva ! saṁpayaṁ tuṭṭhō vā viṇaṇārāhiō vā ahamēyamōsahi
viyarēmi, tumaṁ puṇa akahitō takkarō viva gahiumāraddhō tā kuddhō tē kayaṁtō" tti bhaṇiya gāḍhaṁ pahaō tēṇa, satta diṇāṇi
mucchiō vivaḍiō, aṭṭamadiṇāō ihāgaō । paramēsarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " ahō ! suyasiṇēhayā, ahō ! puttavacchalayā tāyassa ।
putō vā atthō vā suhaṁ va dukkhaṁ va anajammammi । jaṁ jēṇa hōi diṇṇaṁ sō taṁ uvabhuṁjaē tāya ! ।।173 ।।
----
,
-
ēvaṁ payaṁpiūṇaṁ pūyāpurassaraṁ visajjiō jakhō । sayamavi bhuttō aṭṭhamadiṇāō । sāhiō savvō vi sīladhaṇāē
jakkhāgamaṇa-vānaravuttaṁtakahaṇavaiyarō । pucchiyā sīladhaṇā--" piē! kiṁ kayaṁ dēvayāṇamārāhaṇaṁ ? pucchiyā maṁta-taṁta-
viyāṇayā ? sēviyā bahussuyā ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " savvamaṇuṭṭiyaṁ paramucchupupphaṁ va niṣphalaṁ jāyaṁ ।" taō sēṭṭhiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ-
" piē! daṁsiō uvāō tāēṇa, tā tamēva māṇavajakkha viṇaēṇa samārāhiūṇa mahōsahi maggāmō ।” tīē bhaṇiyaṁ-
"ēvaṁ karēmō ।" ubhayasammaēṇaṁ pāraddhā satyasāmaggī, kaivayadiṇēhi satthasahiyāṇi payaṭṭāṇi aṁgābhimuhaṁ, parimiyavāsarēhiṁ
paviṭṭāṇi mahābhēravāḍavi, diṭṭhē māṇavajakkhāyayaṇaṁ, samāvāsiō paripēratēsu satyō, vihipurassaraṁ viṇaēṇa pūjiō jakkhō,
ṭhiyāṇi tatthēva kaivayadiṇāṇi sapaccavāyaṁ ti kāūṇa pēsiō pahāṇapurisasahiō satyō, ṭhiō tatthēva sakalattō sēṭṭhī ।
aṇṇammi diṇē pūiūṇa viṇṇattō sīladhaṇāē māṇavajakkhō -- bhayavaṁ ! paṇaīyaṇakappapāyava ! karēha mē suyasaṁpaya-
mahōsa hippayāṇēṇa aṇuggahūṁ, visayavisavimōhiyamāṇasēṇa tīsē rūva- sōhaggāiguṇagaṇāvajjiyahiyaēṇa majjāyamujjhiūṇa
payaḍamēva bhaṇiyaṁ māṇavajakkhēṇa - "suṁdari ! chammāsē jāva bhaē saha visayasēvāē kajjasiddhī ।" sīladhaṇāē bhaṇiyaṁ --
" mahābhāga ! jāvajjīvamavi parapurisaparibhōganiyamō mē tā kayamimiṇā sappurisanidiēṇa samullāvēṇaṁ, mahōsahīē vi
mē na kajjaṁ । ēvaṁ suṇiya sāvēsa hiyaō mōṇamāsiō gujjhaō । sā vi gayā sēṭṭhisamīvaṁ sāhiō jakkhavaiyarō |
"piē ! pabhāē gacchāmī" tti bhaṇiūṇa suttāṇi rayaṇīē, pabhāyasamaē viuddhā sīlavaṇā na pēcchai piyayamaṁ, pēcchai
māṇavajakkhaṁ paripēraṁtēsu pariyataṁ । taō sīlabhaṁgabhayabhīyā mucchāvasa - vēviraṁgī 'namōjiṇāṇaṁ' tti bhaṇamāṇī niviṭṭhā
dharaṇivaṭṭhē । jakkhō vi tayavaggahamakkamiumasamatthō 'ahō ! chāyā vi dullaṁghaṇijjā imāē, ruṭṭhā puṇa jaṁ karējjā taṁ na
prāṇāmi' (tti) pariṇāmasuṁdaraṁ maṁtiūṇa paṇaō jakkhō, gaō saṭṭāṇaṁ । sā vi samuggaē sūriē piyavirahiyā ।
hā nāha! daiya! vallaha ! nimmalajasabhariyasayalabhuvaṇayala !
rairamaṇa ! rūvaguṇanihi ! katthagaō ? katthadaṭṭhavvō ?

as freferōgō dahara aṇāhattaṇaṁ paraviēsē । dahai ya abbhakkhāṇaṁ dahai akiccaṁ kayaṁ pacchā ||220 ॥

suṇālāvē ninnēhadaṁsaṇaṁ suṇṇaē ya huṁkārē । dalamāṇī gamai diṇē sīladhaṇā sīlarakkhaṭṭhā
paḍipuṇṇā paṁcadiṇā na kō vi kattō vi āgaō taha vi । kāmaṁkurēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ saṁpai kiṁ uttaraṁ dēsi ?
saṁkuddhō rāgaṁdhō balā vi taṁ gihiuṁ samāḍhattō । puraō na kipi pēkkhai baliō puṇa pēkkhaē savvaṁ ॥ 227 ॥
hā ! kiṁ karēmi saṁpai kharēṇa na piēṇa ghēppaē ēsā । tā taha karēmi saṁpai jaha maha hatthā na uttarai ॥ 228॥
iya citiūṇa khayarō uciyapaēsamma saṁṭhiō saṁtō। acchaṛa taṁ rakkhaṁtō parihariyā sēsa - kāyavvō ।। 229 ॥
aṇammi dinē bahudukkhadukkhiyā vaṁciūṇa taṁ khayaraṁ । maraṇaṭṭhā saṁcaliyā sīladhaṇā sīlarakkhaṭṭā ||230||
thēvaṁtaraṁ gayāē diṭṭhō bahusauṇasēviō saralō । sāhāsaya saṁchaṇṇō pūṇṇāgamahīruhō rammō ॥231॥
hā tāya ! māya! hā ajjautta ! samasukkha- dukkha ! hā bhāya ! । vasaṇasamudda nivaḍiyā bhaṇa kaṁ saraṇaṁ pavajjāmi ? ॥232॥
iya ēvaṁ bahusō rōviūṇa paricitiyaṁ ca hiyaēṇa । alamimiṇā ruṇṇēṇaṁ nippaḍiyārammi raṇammi ॥ 233 ॥
maraṇēṇa viṇā sīlaṁ saṁpai paripāliuṁ na sakkēmi । iya citiūṇa tīē vatthēṇa vinimmiō pāsō ॥234॥
kāūṇa kaṁdharāē puṇṇāgadumassa hēṭṭaō hōuṁ । saccaviyā jamapahavattaṇi vva daḍhapattalā sāhā ॥ 235 ॥
bhattibharanibbharāē hiyaē sariūṇa jiṇanamōkkāraṁ । bhaṇiyā pavayaṇadēvī jai ki pi maē sukayaṁ ॥ 236।।
tā aṇṇammi vi jammē karējja maha sīlarakkhaṇē jattō mā hōjja puṇō ēvaṁvihāṇa dukkhāṇa saṁbhūī ||237||
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa taō ubbaṁdhiya jāva mukkaō appā tā aṭṭhaḍḍīṇē jīviyammi gayaṇē suō sō
mā ruyasu bhaiṇi ! narasuṁdarī ahaṁ khayarō paribhamaṁtōṁ । sōūṇa ruiyasadda gayaṇāō tuha ihaṁ pattō ॥ 239 ॥
ēvaṁ pasāhiūṇaṁ chiṇṇō churiyāē pāsaō tēṇa । sittā salilēṇa lahuṁ satthāvatthā taō jāyā || 240 ॥
ētthaṁtaragmi kaḍḍhiyakaravālō jamabhaḍō vva duppēcchō । āgacchaṁtō diṭṭhō kāmaṁkurakhēya tīē ॥ 249 ॥
bhaṇiō khēyarakumarō sīladhaṇāē paruṣṇavayaṇāē । bhāuya ! avasarasu tumaṁ ēsa durappā samāsaṇī || 242 ||
sō vibhaṇiūṇa kiṁ bhīru ! bhāyasē ? sarasu jiṇana mōkkāraṁ । gahiyāsi khēḍaō hakkiūṇa tassamhō caliō || 243 ||
sō vihu viyaḍaviḍaṁbiyavayaṇa viṇissariyajalaṇajālōhō । ravikarasaṁvaliyakarālakaḍhiṇakaravālakahatthō ।। 244 ||
aigaruyadappa - niṭṭa, raṭṭhaṭṭhōṁ bhiuḍibhīsaṇō dhaṇiyaṁ । pattō khēyarasavihaṁ hakkārava - pūriyadiyaṁtō ॥ 245 ॥
khayarēṇa vi khaggaṁ kaḍḍhiūṇa kāmaṁkurō imaṁ bhaṇiō । rēpāva ! parakalattaṁ ahilasasi na lajjiō hōsi ?

narasuṁdarēṇa taṁ vaṁciūṇa dakkhattaṇēṇa niyaēṇa I haṭṭaṇa kaṁdharāē kāmaṁkurakhēya pahaō
mucchānimīliyacchō ghummāviya lōyaṇō tharatharatō । gayapōrasābhimāṇō puvvābhimuhō paṇaṭṭōsō || 249 ।।
narasuṁdarī vi maggāṇulaggaō tassa tāva saṁcaliō | aṁtariō jāva vaṇaṁtarēṇa sō khēyarō pāvō ।। 250 ॥
laddhajaō valiūṇaṁ samāgaō bhaṇai ērisaṁ vayaṇaṁ । bhaiṇi ! bhayaṁ tē hariyaṁ saṁpai saṁcarasu nīsaṁkā
nijjiṇiō sō khayarō saṁpai sīlujjalē ! bhaṇasu kajjaṁ । jaṁ kāyavvamimēṇaṁ jaṇēṇa niyabhāisarisēṇa
tō harisiyacittāē sīladhaṇāē payaṁpiyaṁ ēyaṁ । parakajjakaraṇaniraō kō annō tujjha sāricchō ?
niravaccayāē jaṇiyaṁ jaṁ dukkha āsi majjha hiyayammi | saṁpai tumammi diṭṭha taṁ pi paṇa mahābhāga !
tattō tīya suyaṭṭhā paṇṇattī sumariyā khayarēṇa । āgamma sā payaṁpai bhaṇa puttaya ! jaṁ maē kajjaṁ
tēṇa vi bhaṇiyaṁ bhayavai ! maha bhaiṇīē jahā suyā dōṇṇi । ēgā duhiyā jāyai jayapayaḍā taha karējjāsu
paṇṇattīē bhaṇiyaṁ hōhī ēvaṁ na ēttha saṁdēhō । gēha imaṁ hāradugaṁ imaṁ ca rayaṇāvaliṁ vaccha !
i bhaṇiya takkhaṇā sā paṇṇattī pāviyā niyaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ । khayarēṇa vi rayaṇāvali-hāradugaṁ tīya taṁ diṇṇaṁ

kavilakēsarasaḍhā, bhāsurakuṁdidusaṁkā sadāḍhākarālavayaṇā, sīhakisōrārūḍhā, kōhavasavēvirasarīrā, palayakālakaṁkāla -rūva

vayārō samāgaō niyasatyaṁ satyavāhī । mayaṇamaṁjarīē vi puvvapaōgēṇa kaō kōlāhalō। nīyādaṁḍavāsiēṇa naravaisamīvaṁ ।
bhaṇiyā mahārāṇā - " kimēyaṁ samāulā ? ।” tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " satthavāhamisēṇa kō vi mē muddārayaṇaṁ gahāya gaō ।" rāiṇā
Ratana bhaṇiō talavarō -- " arē ! ērisī tē nayararakkhā, turiyamāṇēsu taṁ satthavāhatakkaraṁ । "tēṇa vi lahaṁ cēva
āṇiō । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ "satyavāha ! ki nimittaṁ taē imīē muddārayaṇaṁ hariyaṁ ?" satthavāhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "saṁtaṁ pāvaṁ । "
mayaṇamaṁjarīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "mahārāya ! kimannō vi kō vi cōriyaṁ kariyaṁ kahēi, visēsaō aṇēgakūḍa - kavaḍabhariō vaṇiya-
jaṇō ।" satthavāhēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ "āpāvē ! nagaraniddhamaṇasamā vi hōūṇa vaṇiyajāī dūsēsi ? ।" īsi hasiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ
mahīvaddaṇā -- "bhō vaṇiyasuya! jai kaha vi tuha satthē imīē muddārayaṇaṁ bhavissai tā tuha kō daṁḍō ? । " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ--
"sayala satyadaviṇassa ēsā sāmiṇī, jai puṇa imāē cēva gharē bhavissai tā imāē kō daḍō ?।" mayaṇabhaṁjarīē bhaṇiyaṁ --
" sattavēṇīsamajjiyā kaṇayakōḍī maha gharē tīē tumaṁ sāmiō ।" taō pahāṇarāyapurisasahiyā gayā satyavāhasatthaṁ, nirūviyaṁ
samaṁtaō satyavāhamaṁdiraṁ, visēsēṇa avallāō, na laddhaṁ kattha vi muddārayaṇaṁ । vilakkhavayaṇā disāmaṁḍalaṁ palōyaṁtī bhaṇiyā
satthavāhēṇa -- "saṁpayaṁ tē gharaṁ gammau ।" tahēva gayāṇi, iō taō nirūviūṇa thēvavēlaṁ pallaṁkamajjhāō kaḍḍhiyaṁ maisāyara-
purisēṇa muddārayaṇaṁ; daṁsiyāṇi mayaṇamaṁjarīna / makkharāṇi rāyapurisāṇa । tēhi vi kahiyaṁ rāiṇō । rāiṇā vi muddāviyaṁ
maṁdiraṁ, niddhāḍiyā nayarāō mayaṇamaṁjarī, diṇṇaṁ maisāyarassa mayaṇamaṁjarīmaṁdiraṁ । maisāyarō vi niyadaviṇajāyaṁ mayaṇa-
maṁjarīdaviṇaṁ ca karagayaṁ kāūṇa rāyasammaō paramapamōēṇa kālaṁ gamēi ।

kaō mahāmahasavō, samādiyāṇi jaṇaṇi jaṇayāṇi, paṇayā amacca sāmaṁtāiyā, samāṇaṁdiyāō niyadaṁsaṇēṇa aṭṭhārasa vipa-
gaīō, sāhiō pucchaṁtāṇa ammā-piīṇa savvō vi niyavaiyarō, tēhi vi āṇaṁdajalabharabhāriyalōyaṇēhiṁ gāḍhamāliṁgiō
cuṁbiō ya muddhāṇē, pamāṇīkaō sayalapayōyaṇēsu kālaṁ gamēi ।
aṇṇammi dinē kaliṁgā hivēṇa niyamāmagēṇa sōhavikkamā bhihāṇēṇa rayaṇapurāō paisiō sugutō nāmāmaccaputtō
samāgaō, dōvāriyasūīō paviṭṭō diṭṭhō dēvasārarāyā । bhuttāvasāṇē pucchiō āgamaṇakāraṇaṁ । tēṇa vi paṇāmapurassaraṁ
bhaṇiyaṁ---"dēva ! kumāramāmagēṇa sīhavikkamēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ, " atthi mē kaṇayamālāē dēvīē duhiyā kaṇayasuṁdarī nāma, sā jai
tumhāṇa sammayaṁ tā kumārassa dijjau ।” rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " kō kallāṇē virōhō ? ।” taō samāhūō jōisiō, nirūviō
pariṇayaṇagamaṇavāsarō, sammāṇiūṇa pēsiō amaccasuō, pāraddhā mahayā vicchaḍḍēṇa vivāhasāmaggī । taō pasattha diṇē
cauvihabalaparivāriō rayaṇapuraṁ pai caliō dēvadiṇṇakumārō, kamēṇa vahaṁtō pattō rayaṇapuraṁ । vivāhiyā mahaimahūsavēṇa
kaṇayasuṁdarī, āgaō sanagaraṁ maṇuyabhavadullahaṁ visayasuhamaṇuhavaṁtassa vaccati vāsarā । aṇṇammi dinē paṁcattamuvagaō dēva-
sārarāyā । mayakiccāṇi kāūṇa maṁti- sāmaṁtēhi mahāvibhūīē ahisittō mahā rāyapaē dēvadiṇṇakumārō । jammaṁtarasucariyata-
vāṇubhāvēṇa apatthiyāgayāhi cēva ahamahamiyāē varijjai samunnayavaṁsasamubbhavāhi rāyakaṇṇāhiṁ । appayāsēṇēva uvaṇamaṁti
vivakkhadharāhivā । jāō caurajjāhivaī rāyā । maṇuyabhavapasaṁsaṇijjaṁ visayasuhamaṇuhaṁvatassa kamēṇa jāyā cattāri puttā--
vasaṁtasirīē vasaṁtarāō, malayasirīē malayakēū, avaṁtisirīē avaṁtibaddhaṇō, kaṇayasuṁdarīē kaṇayakēū । pariṇayavaēṇa
paotrajjaṁ gahiukāmēṇa dēvadinnanarāhivēṇa mahāvibhūīē ahisittō baṁgāhivattaṇē vasaṁtarāō, aṁgāhivattaṇē avaṁtivaddhaṇō,
kaliṁgā hivattaṇē kaṇayakēū iyararajjē puṇa malayakēū । appaṇāvi mahāvibhūīē nikkhatō sāgarāyariyasa bhīvē, gahiya-
duvihasikkhō ahigayasuttatthō vihiya vivihatava caraṇō sāmannapariyāyaṁ paripāliūṇa kayakkhāmaṇō samāhimaraṇēṇa mariūṇa
ukkōsāuō accuē suravarō jāō । bhōttūṇa tattha surasuhāī cuō samāṇō mahāvidēhē vāsē kuṁḍavaddhaṇē nayarē rāyā
bhavissai । ēvaṁ suhaparaṁparāē kaṛavayabhavaggahaṇēhi sijjhissa |

āisasutā mahāyasa ! kiṁ tujjha karēmi viṇayapaḍikammaṁ ? paḍibhaṇai pavaṇavēgō jaṁ kāyavvaṁ tayaṁ suṇasu

dhammāō at-kāmā saggō mōkkhō ya haṁti purisāṇa । visayāsānaḍiyamaṇā mūṛhā taṁ cēva na kuṇaṁti
picchaṁtō vi na pēcchai aṇavarayagalaṁta chiddaduggaṁdhaṁ । nārī dēha - milicchō ki kīrau jēṇa rāgaṁdhō ?

jai icchasi visayasuhaṁ tā dhammaṁ kuṇasu niyayasattīē । jō mahai varāhāraṁ sō giṇhai tannimittāī

vasaṁtapuraṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tattha ṇaṁ aparimiya-dhaṇō dhaṇō nāma satthavāhō vasaṁtapurāō nivvuipuraṁ para patthaō |
ghōsaṇaṁ' karāvēi - ' jō ṇaṁ maē saha nivvuipuraṁ para payaṭṭai tassa ṇaṁ khāṇēṇa vā pāṇēṇa vā vatthēṇa vā pattēṇa vā chattēṇa
vā uvāṇahaṇēṇa vā jō jēṇa atthī tassa taṁ saṁpāḍēmi । taṁ suṇiya samāgayā bahavē pāṇiṇō । taō sō tēsi piṁḍiyāṇaṁ
paṁthaguṇē sāhēi - "bhō bhō lōyā ! nivvui puraṁ pai payaṭṭāṇaṁ dōnni pahā । ujjugō vaṁkō ya । tattha ṇaṁ jō sō daṁkō
tatya ṇaṁ paē para payāṇi, ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇē patta - puphpha-phalamaṇōharā mahīruhā, sulahāṇi bhōyaṇāṇi suhaṁ suhēṇa gammai ।
paraṁparāē sō vi ujjaya-pahaṁ samōyara । aō tēṇa cirakālēṇa nivvuipuraṁ pāvijjai । jō puṇa ujjugō tēṇa
lahuṁ gammai । kicchēṇa ya kahaṁ ? sō aīvavisamō saṇhō ya । tattha ōyārē cēva duvē mahāghōrā vaggha- sīhā parivasaṁti ।
tē tappabhiī' cēva maggaō laggaṁti amuyaṁtāṇa ya paṁthaṁ na pahavaṁti । avasāṇaṁ ca jāva aṇuvaṭṭēti । rukkhā ya ēttha ēgē
manōharā । tēsi puṇa chāyāsu vi na vīsamiyanvaṁ । māraṇappiyā khu sā chāyā । parisaḍiya paṁḍu-pattāṇaṁ puṇa ahō muhuttagaṁ
vīmivvaṁ ti । manōhara rūva-dhāriṇō mahura- vayaṇēṇaṁ' ēttha maggataraṭṭiyā bahavē purisā hakkārēti tēsi vayaṇaṁ na sōyavvaṁ ।
satthigā ya khaṇaṁ pina mōttavvā । ēgāgiṇō ya niyamā bhayaṁ duraṁtō ya ghōrō" davaggī appamattēhi 'ulhavēyavvō ।
aṇōlhavijjatōya niyamēṇa dahai । puṇō ya duggucca pavvaō appamattēhi' cēva laṁghēyavvō । alaṁghaṇē niyamā marijjai । "
puṇō mahai ai-guvila-gavvarāvaṁsa" kuḍaṁgī sigdhaṁ laṁghēyavvā । tammiṭhiyāṇaṁ bahū dōsā । taō lahugō khaḍḍō । tassa samīvē
maṇōrahō nāma baṁbhaṇō niccaṁ sannihiō acchai । sō bhaṇai - "maṇāgaṁ pūrēha ēvaṁ ti tassa vayaṇaṁ na sōyavvaṁ sō ṇa purēyavvō"
sō khu pūrijmāṇō mahallatarō havai । puriḍaṁ na sakkā, paṁthāō ya bhajjijjai । phalāṇi ya ēttha divvāṇi paṁcappayārāṇi
nētāsurā । gāṇaṁ na pēkkhiyavvāṇi na vā bhōktavvāṇi । bāvīsaṁ ca ṇaṁ ēttha ghōrā mahākarālā pisāyā । khaṇaṁ
khaṇamabhiddavāṁta tē viṇaṁ na gaṇēyavvā । bhattapāṇaṁ ca ēttha vibhāgaō virasaṁ dullahaṁ ca tti, uppayāṇagaṁ caiva na kāyavvaṁ
aṇavarayaṁ ca gaṁtavvaṁ rattīē vi dō cēva jāmāsu viyavvaṁ sēsa dugē gaṁtavvamēva । ēvaṁ ca gacchaṁtēhi dēvāṇuppiyā ! khippāmēva
aḍavī laṁghijjai । laṁghittā ya tamēgaṁtadōgaccavajjayaṁ pasatthasivapuraṁ pāvijjai । jattha ṇaṁ na jarā na maccū na ya iṭṭhaviōgō.
nāṇiṭṭhasaṁpaōgō, na vā kēi kilēsa tti । taō tattha kēi tēṇa samaṁ payaṭṭā jē ujjugēṇa gaṁtu-maṇā । annē puṇa iyarēṇa
pahā viyā । taō sō patthē divasē uccaliō । puraō vaccaṁtō maggaṁ āhaṇai, silāisu ya paṁthassa dōsaguṇa-pisuṇagāṇi akkha-
rāṇi lihai । ēttiyaṁ gayaṁ ēttiyaṁ sēsaṁ ti vibhāsā । ēvaṁ jē tassa niddēsē vaṭṭiyā tē tēṇa samaṁ acirēṇa taṁ puraṁ pattā । jē vi
lihiyāṇusārēṇa sammaṁ gacchati tē vi pāviti । jē na vaṭṭiyā na vā varddhiti sīyalachāyāisu paḍisēviṇō tē na pattā na
na yā vi pāviti ēyaṁ davvapahanāyaṁ । saṁpayaṁ bhāvapahanāē jōijjai । satthavāhatthāṇīyā arahaṁtā । ugghōsaṇā - thāṇīyā

dōhaṁ pi thūlabhaddasā miṇā pihaṁ pihaṁ gaṇā diṇṇā । tahā vi piīvasēṇa ēkkaō cēva viharaṁtī । aṇṇayā ya kayāi

pacchā kammabhaēṇa, taō pulaiyaṁgēṇa vaṁdiūṇa aṇuvvaiyā sattaṭṭhapayāṇi । ēyaṁ ca savvaṁ diṭṭha bhikkhaṭṭā paviṭṭēṇa ēgēṇa damagēṇa ।
citiyaṁ caṇēṇa - 'ahō ! suladdha mē ēsi jamma jīviyaphalaṁ jē dijjaṁtayaṁ pi na gēṇhaṁti । amhē puṇa maggaṁtayā vina
labhāmō tā ēē cēva paramakāruṇigā jahicchiyaladdhāō mama kiṁci dāhiti ।' citiūṇa maggiyā sāhuṇō । tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ-

ūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - ' astvatra kuṁḍikā mē sthāsyati' iti kuṁḍiyaṁ ṭhavēi । puṇō vi annaṁ daṁsiyaṁ । tattha tidaṁḍaṁ muyai | annattha

yathā-
kōśēna bhr̥tyaiśca nibaddhamūlaṁ putraiśca mitraiśca vivr̥ddhaśākham । utpāṭaya naṁdaṁ parivarttayāmi, mahādrumaṁ vāyurivōgravēgaḥ ।। 599 ।।
jai ēyaṁ na uppāḍēmi' tō ṇa ēvaṁ chōḍēmi'tti sihāē gaṁṭhi baṁdhai । jaṁ tujjha piuṇō rōyai taṁ karējjāsu' tti ।

-
tariyavvā ya panniyā mariyavvaṁ vā samarē samatthaēna । asarisajaṇau phēsaṇayā na hu sahiyatvā kulē pasūṇa ।। 600।
tā kahaṁ nitthariyavvaṁ ? ti citayaṁtassa puvvasamā yanniyaṁ caḍiyaṁ cittē guruvayaṇaṁ - 'jahā maē biṁbaṁtariēṇa rāiṇā bhavi -
yavvaṁ ।' na uṇa tēsiṁ mahāṇubhāvāṇaṁ jahaṭṭiyavatthuvā īṇaṁ vayaṇamannahā bhavai । tā 'gavēsāmi kiṁpi biṁbaṁ ti' । citiūṇa
parivvāyagavēsaṁ viuvviūṇa gaō naṁdassa rannō mōrapōsaġagāmaṁ । samuyāṇaṁtō paviṭṭhō mayaharagēhaṁ । jāva pēcchai tattha savva-

gāṇā sā varāī, tā dēhi pasāyaṁ kāūṇa māṇusabhikkhaṁ ।' taō 'haṁta ! bhaviyavvaṁ imīē ganbhē mama maṇōrahāpūraṇa-
samatthēṇa kēṇāvi supurisēṇaṁ' ti citiūṇa bhaṇiyaṁ cāṇakkēṇa 'pūrēmi amimīē dōhalayaṁ jaṛa mē gabbhaṁ payacchaha 'tti |
taō 'imīē jīvamāṇīē aṇṇē gabbhā bhavissaṁti' tti sāmatthēūṇa paḍivaṇṇaṁ tēhi । sakkhisamakkhaṁ ca kāūṇa kārāviō
cāṇakkēṇa paḍamaṁḍavō । puṇṇimā - rayaṇīē ya nahyalamajjhabhāgaṭṭiē sasaharē kayamuvari chiḍḍhaṁ । ṭhāviyaṁ ca savva rasaḍḍhakhīra

tā diyasu taō sā saharisaṁ caṁdaṁ' ti mantramāṇī jattiyaṁ jattiyaṁ pivai tattiyaṁ tattiyaṁ uvari purisō ucchāḍēcha ।
jāva savvaṁ pīyaṁ । pucchiyā vacchē ! 'pīō caṁdō ?' sā bhaṇai - 'āma' taō sā nivvuihiyayā gabbhamuvvahai' । cāṇakkō
vi pūriūṇa dōhalayaṁ davvuppāyaṇanimittaṁ gaō pavvaya-vivarēsu । tattha ya dhāuvvāyapaōgēṇa samāvajjiyaṁ kiṁci daviṇajāyaṁ ।

ramamāṇaṁ dhūlīmaya - gāma- nagaradēsaṁtarāṇi ḍiṁbharūvāṇa vilahaṁtaṁ । parituṭṭhacittēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ cāṇakkēṇa - " ahaṁ baṁbhaṇō mama vikipi
dijjau ।" caṁdaguttēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - 'tumaṁ puṇa imāō pavisaṁtagāvīō giṇhasu ।” cāṇakkēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -'mā kō vi mārējjā ?'

taō aṇṇammi dinē kōsanirūvaṇaṁ kuṇaṁtēṇa diṭṭha savvaṁ sunaṁ bhaṁḍāgāraṁ । tappūraṇatthaṁ ca dīṇārāṇa thālaṁ bharēkaṇa
ghōsāviyaṁ cāṇakkēṇa - "bhō bhō nāgarayā ! ramaha maē saha, jaha jiṇēha tō bhē dīṇārathālaṁ । ahaṁ vā jiṇāmi tō mē
ēgaṁ dīṇāraṁ dalaējjaha | thālalōbhēṇa ya pabhūyalōgō ramiumāraddhō । na ya kōi jii । jaō tē pāsayā tassa citimā
pati । cāṇaktrēṇa vi citiyaṁ - " pabhūyakā liō ēsa uvāō tā aṇṇamuvāyaṁtaraṁ payaṭṭēmi tti" kō puṇa uvāō bhavissai
ti huṁ nāyaṁ majjaṁ pāēmi savvē kōḍuṁbiṇō jēṇa niyagharasārassa paramatthaṁ kahēṁti ।' jaō-
kuviyassa āurassa ya vasaṇaṁ pattassa rāgarattassa । mattassa maratassa ya sabbhāvā pāyaṁḍā hōṁti
।।603॥
paribhāviūṇa nimaṁtiō pahāṇakō ḍubiyalōgō । pāiō savvō vi majjaṁ na ya apaṇā piyai । taō jāva savvē

kāi kiṁpi tassa vi viyarai na uṇa arihamittasāvaō । vahai taṁ para paōsaṁ siriharō । aṇṇayā ēgammi | dhamma-
mahasavē miliō savvō vi nagaralōō। pāraddhā siriharēṇa pōtthaya-vāiyā । pasaṁsiyaṁ savvadāṇēsu jaladāṇaṁ । tadyathā-
॥704 ।।
jalēbhyō jāyatē sasyaṁ sasyēbhyō nirvr̥tāḥ prajāḥ । prajābhyō jāyatē dharmō dharmamūlaṁ jalaṁ tataḥ ।।701 ।।
pānīyā tr̥ṇasaṁbhūtistēna gōvarga nivr̥tiḥ । gōvargācca janō lāti rasādisthiti hētukaṁ ॥।702।।
jalādi jalaparyaṁta madhyē ca jalapūrvakaṁ । bhōjanaṁ bhōjanāntē ca jalaṁ dharmāya kathyatē ॥703 ||
śaucāśaucavibhāgō hi vinā vāri na vidyatē । varēṇyaṁ vāriṇastēna nānyajjagati vidyatē
svajīvaparajīvānāṁ vāryupaṣṭaṁbhakāraṇaṁ 1 । marī marusthalagrāmē gaṁdhārō'tra nidarśanam
lōēhiṁ bhaṇiyaṁ -- ' sirihara ! kō ēsa gaṁdhārō !” tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - suṇēha ।'
gaṁdhārakahā--
,
॥705 ॥
atthi marumaṁḍalē marutthalō nāma gāmō । tattha ṇaṁ gaṁdhārō nāma pasuvālō parivasai । sō puṇa payaīē cēva bhaddagō
dāṇaruī ya । aṇṇā gimhayālē ayavaḍaṁ gahāya mahāḍavimaṇupaviṭṭhō । iō taō pariyaḍaṁtassa jāyā dōvāharī ।
gimhuṇhaparitāviō' paviralacchāyassa maggāsannakarīrataruṇō talē niviṭṭhō ēgēṇaṁ accatapivāsā parisusiya- kaṁṭhōṭṭhēṇa,
mucchāvasa vilaṁbaṇa, vijayajīviyāsēṇa, kaha kaha vi viṇissaraṁtāvattavayaṇēṇa pahiēṇa jalabhariyadīyaḍaparigayaṁ gaṁdhāraṁ
daṭṭhūṇa vaddhō tēṇa aṁjalī। pasuvālēṇa citithaṁ --- 'ahō ! saṁkaḍamāvaḍiyaṁ, jai ēyaṁ pāēmi tō maha maraṇaṁ, aha na pāēmi
tō abbhatthaṇā bhaṁgakaraṇaṁ, tā kiṁ pavajjāmi ahavā bhavē bhavē sulahā pāṇā-pāṇiṇaṁ dulahaṁ parōvayārakaraṇaṁ 'tti mantramāṇēṇa
pāīō pahiō niṭṭhiyaṁ jalaṁ । pahiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - 'mahābhāga ! tuha saṁtiyā mē pāṇā tā jai kaha vi bhaviyavvayāni-
yōgēṇa vissaurē gaṁtavvaṁ bhē bhavai vissaṁbharabhavaṇaṁ pucchiūṇa pavisiyavvaṁ ।" pasuvālēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ ēvaṁ karissāmi tti । bhaddaṁ tē
bhavautti bhaṇiūṇa gaō pahiō, pattō marutthalagāmaṁ । pasuvālēṇa vi samāhūyaṁ * ayavaḍaṁ, caliō sa gāmābhimuhaṁ " jāvajjavi
thēvaṁtaraṁ na gacchai tāvallayā yava- pivāsāhi pīḍiō chōḍhūṇa samipāyavakōḍharē siraṁ, ṭhiō khaṇamēgaṁ, ' pacchā mukkō pāhi ।
paōsē athavaḍaṁ nāgayaṁ' ti gavēsaṇatthaṁ niggayā sayaṇāiō । taō nirūvayaṁtēhi diṭṭhō vimukkajīviō । āṇēūṇagāmaṁ
sakkāriō । vissaṁbharēṇa vi muṇiyavaiyarēṇa gaṁdhārasakkāraṭṭhāṇē kāriyaṁ niyadīṇārēhi dēulaṁ gaṁdhārapaḍimā ya, tayaggaō"
mahātalāyaṁ ca khāṇiyaṁ । tatō 'ahō mē jahaṇṇattaṇaṁ ! jēṇa parapāṇēhiṁ niyapāṇā rakkhiyā, tā karēmi kiṁ pi vayavisēsaṁ

'jamahaṁ ki pi kusalaṁ karēmi tassaddhaṁ mē pāṇadāyagassa 'bhaṇiyamāraddhō dukkaraṁ tavaṁ taviuṁ । maraṇakālē jai phalamimassa
tavavisēsassa vijjai tāhaṁ tassa nikkāraṇabaṁdhuṇō paramōvayārissa jammaṁtarē vi paccuvayārakāragō havijja' tti kayaniyāṇō
mariṇa' vāṇamaṁta dēvō jāō । pasuvālō vi payappayāṇasamāvajjiyapuṇṇēṇa pagai dāṇa- rasiyattaṇēṇa ya mariūṇa samuppanō
kaṇayapurē kaṇayasēharō nāma rāyā । pasāhiyāsēsamahīmaṁḍalō rajjamaṇupālēi ।
aṇṇammi dinē vāsabhavaṇē rayaṇīē pallaṁ nivaṇṇō gahiyavaravatthāharaṇavilēvaṇaṁ' purisaṁ pāsēṛa । asaṁbhaṁtēṇa pucchiō

mitō tti sāhiō savvō vi puvva-bhava-vaiyarō । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - "bhavaṁ caiva viyāṇai ।" taō paṇayapuvvaṁ samappiyaṁ

annayā maratēṇa kulavaiṇā sō cēva kaō kulavaī gōrīgaṁdhārō'tti, savvattha pasiddhi gatō, sammatō ya naravaissa

nimittaṁ, ṭhitō saṁtōsaṁ kāūṇa arihasārō । aṇṇayā sisirasamaē chattāṇamābhavvaṁ kaṁbalō dijja gahiyā jiṇakkhara-
haṭṭātō' sivabalavalāhiēṇa kaṁbalā । jiṇakkharēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "trēyaṇaṁ viyarāhi ।" balāhiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- 'maḍhē samāgaṁtavvaṁ ।'

kulavaiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- "vayaṁsa! kayā kayaṁgalagāmātō samāgatō ?" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ "saṁpayamēva ।" daviṇaṁ dāūṇa visajjiō

bhōyaṇāsaṇa-savaṇēhiṁ jāō sāvagassa tēhi saha saṁthavō ।
annayā sāvagassa pōṭṭasaraṇī jāyā । 'adharō' tti tēhi aṇukaṁpāē rattacīvarērrōh vēḍhiūṇa mukkō । arahaṁtāṇa namōkkāraṁ
karēṁtōmatō dēvō jāō । ōhiṇā taccaniyarūvaṁ pāsati । āuṭṭō jahi jahi bhikkhugāṇa bhōyaṇaṁ tahi tahi bhatti-
viggaṇaṁ saṁbhūsaṇēṇaṁ hatthēṇaṁ parivēsēi । pabhāvaṇā taccaniyāṇaṁ ōhāvaṇā amhaccayasaḍḍhāṇaṁ । ēvaṁ vaccatē kālē vijjā-
siddhā sūriṇō samāgayā । sāvagā tāṇa uvaṭṭiyā savvaṁ parikahēṁti । āyariyā bhaṇati - "jahā jayā hatthō ṇīsarati
tayā agahatthē ghēttūṇa bhaṇijjaha | 'bujjha bujjha gujjhagā mā mujjhati tēhi vi gaṁtūṇa aggahatthē ghēttr̥ṇa 'ṇamō arahaṁtāṇaṁ' ti
paṁca padāni paṛhiūṇa bhaṇiō -- "bujjha "bujjha gujjhagā mā mujjha dullahaṁ bōhi mā hārēhiṁ ēttha ṇaṁ saṁbuddhō sō lōgassa
parikahēi । jahā - 'na ityadhammō avi ya jiṇasāsaṇē । taō jiṇasāsaṇē bhakti kāumāraddhī । kēttiyā ērisā āyariyā
bhavissaṁti jē micchattapaṁkabahuṁ uddharēhiti । tamhā āīē cēva parapāsaṁḍasaṁthavō na kāyavvō । parapāsaṁḍasaṁthavō tti gayaṁ ।
bhaṇiyaṁ sappabhēyaṁ sammattaṁ ।
iyāṇi aṇuṭhavayāi । tā duvālasabhēō sāvagadhammō bhaṇṇati--
1. pabhāē । sa. luddhō gahiō pā0 । 2. tāsiyā pā0 । 3. tī hariyā jē0 ।

paṁcaya aṇuvvayāī guṇavvayāiṁ ca hōṁti tiṇṇēva । sikkhāvayāī caurō sāvagadhammō duvālasahā ||722||
thūlagapāṇavahassā viratī duvihō ya sō vahō hōti । avarāhavajjiyāṇaṁ jiyāṇa taha sāvarāhāṇaṁ ।। 723 ।।
mōtr̥̄ṇa sāvarāhē ṇirāvarāhāṇa jō vahō hōi । saṁkappāraṁbhēhi duvihō bhaṇiō jiṇavarēhiṁ ॥ 724।।
bēiṁdithamāīṇaṁ nirāvarāhāṇa sayalajīvāṇaṁ । haḍḍāi kaē vahaṇaṁ saṁkappēṇaṁ vi vajjējjā ।। 725 ।।
gurumūlē gahiūṇaṁ thūlaga - pāṇivahaviramaṇaṁ saḍḍhō । paidiyahamaṇusaraṁtō vajjējja imē ya aiyārē ||726 ।।
baṁdha-vahaṁ chavicchēyaṁ aibhāraṁ bhatta- pāṇavōcchēyaṁ । kōhāidūsiyamaṇō gō- maṇūyāīṇa na vihijjā ।।727||
jala-dāruya-dhaṇṇāṇaṁ jayaṇāē karējja saṁgahaṁ saḍḍhō । gahiyāṇa vi paribhōgō vihīē tassa rakkhaṇaṭṭhāē ||728 ।।
thūlamusāvāyarasa ya viraī bīyaṁ aṇuvvayaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ । kaṇṇāliyāi bhēyā taṁ paṁcavihaṁ muṇēyavvaṁ ।।729।।
jaṁ jāra-cōra-ḍāiṇi nihāṇalābhāigōyaraṁ aliyaṁ । ai tivvarāgadōsēhiṁ taṁ pi vajjējja dhammaṭṭhī ||730 ।।
paḍivaṇṇava ēṇēvaṁ aṇusaramāṇēṇa paidiṇaṁ cēva । paṁcaiyārā ēē parihariyavvā payattēṇa ।। 731 ।।
abhakkhāṇaṁ sahassā rahasaṁ ca sadāramaṁtabhēyaṁ ca । mōsōvaēsadāṇaṁ kūḍaṁ lēhaṁ ca
mōsōvaēsadāṇaṁ kūḍaṁ lēṁ ca vajjējjā ।।732 ।।
buddhīē pēhiūṇaṁ puvaṁ bhāsijja ubhayabhavasuhayaṁ । appaparāṇaṁ dōnha vi na savvahā pīḍajaṇagaṁ jaṁ ।।733 ।।
dhūlādattādāṇē ' viraī taccaṁ aṇuvvayaṁ ṇēyaṁ । saccittēyara missaṁ gō- rayaṇa-vibhūsiyanaraṁ vā ।।734 ।।
jē girahaṁtō saḍḍhō cōraṁ kāraṁ labhijja lōgammi । taṁ pariharijja payatō jāō guṇaḍḍhō sa aṇṇēhiṁ ॥ 735 ||
paḍivajjiūṇa matimaṁ jā jīvaṁ ittaraṁ ca vayamēyaṁ । aṇusaramāṇō niccaṁ vajjējja imē ya aiyārē ||736||
tēnāhaḍappaōgaṁ takkarajōgaṁ viruddharajjaṁ ca । kūḍatula-kūḍamāṇaṁ tappaḍirūvaṁ ca vavahāraṁ ।।737||
paradārapariccāō sadārasaṁtōsamāvi ya cautthō । paradāraṁ puṇa duvihaṁ ōrālavējavviyaṁ taha ya ||738 ||
vayabhaṁga - bhīrūṇaṁ vayavisayaṁ paidiṇaṁ saraṁtēṇa । aiyārā saṛaḍhēṇaṁ parihariyavvā imē paṁca ||739 ||
ittariyapariggahiyā agahiyagamaṇaṁ caṇaṁgakīḍaṁ ca । vajjējja paravivāha kāmē tibvābhilāsaṁ ca ।। 740 ।।
sathalāṇatthaparaṁparamūlamiṇaṁ vairakāraṇaṁ paramaṁ | bhavaviḍavi-bīyabhūyaṁ ṇibaṁdhaṇaṁ rāga-dōsāṇaṁ ।। 741 ।।
vajjējjā mōhakaraṁ parajuvaīdaṁsaṇāisaviyāraṁ । ēē mayaṇabāṇā carittapāṇē viṇāsati ||742॥
saccittācittāṇaṁ turayasuvaṇṇāiyāṇa- vatthūṇa
turayasuvaṇṇāiyāṇa- vatthūṇa । parimāṇakaraṇamēyaṁ paṁcamagamaṇuvvayaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ || 743 ॥
taṁ puṇa paṁcaiyāraṁ khittāīyaṁ hiraṇṇamāīyaṁ । dhannāidupayāī vinnēyaṁ kuviyavisayaṁ tu ।। 744 ।।
gurumūlē uvauttō gahiūṇa tamittaraṁ ca iyaraṁ vā । pālijja visuddhamaṇō aṇusaramāṇō ya paidiyahaṁ ॥ 745 ।।
vayapaḍitraṇēṇa imē aiyārā jāṇiūṇa gurupuraō । vayabhaṁgabhīruēṇaṁ parihariyavvā payatē ||746।।
khēttāi hiraṇṇāī dhaṇāi-dupayāi - kuviya- parimāṇē । saddhā saṁsuddhamaṇō ṇa pamāṇāikkamaṁ kuṇati
saṁtōsāmayatittō ciṭṭhējja mayā vi thōvamiha mukkaṁ । vimaṇō citijja maṇē na ya gihissaṁ puṇō ēvaṁ
paṁca vi aṇubvayāī saṁkhēvēṇaṁ sahāiyārāī । bhaṇiyāi aō vōcchaṁ lēsēṇa guṇavvaē tiṇi
uḍḍhaṁ, ahō, tiricchaṁ tibhēyabhinnaṁ disāsu parimāṇaṁ । paḍhamaṁ guṇavvayamiṇaṁ aiyārē tassimē paṁca
uḍḍhāhatiridiśāṇaṁ gahiyamāṇaṁ na cēva laṁghējjā । khittassa vuḍḍhakaraṇaṁ kujjā sati aṁtaraddhaṁ ca
pasianē hōi guṇō ṇiyamā takkhēttavattijīvāṇaṁ । abhayavayāṇā iharā maṇavaikāēhi sō vahagō
bhōgaparībhōgāṇa niyamaṇaṁ bīyaguṇavvayamimaṁ ca । aṇiyattāṇa ya dōsā virayāṇa ṇa hōṁti guṇabhāvā
bhōyaṇaō kammayaō duvihaṁ ēyaṁ samāsaō ṇēyaṁ । dōṇha vi jahā kamēṇaṁ aiyārā huṁtimē vīsaṁ

tammi ya nagarē yibaṁdha kumayasaṁḍaṇisāyarō apisuṇō amaccharī kayaṇṇuō paḍhamābhibhāsī sōmadēvō nāma māhaṇō
parivasaḥ । viṇijjiyaratirūvāvīyamiva abhagga - sōhagga- mahāmahīruhassa, sukhēttamiva rūva । iguṇa- gaṇasassāṇaṁ, rāyahāṇī
viva mayara - kēuṇō' sayalasaṁsāra - suhaṇibaṁdhaṇā sōmā nāma māhaṇī । tīē saha visaya- suhamaṇubhavaṁtassa sōmadēvassa surūva
paḍirūvābhihāṇā' jāya। dōnni dārayā । kamēṇa vaḍḍhamāṇā pattā jōvvaṇaṁ । pariṇīyā tammi cēva nagarē sakamma- ṇirayāṇa
māhaṇa-kaṇṇagāṇa vaccai kālō । aṇṇayā kusauranayarāō aṇunnaviya gurūyaṇaṁ gāmāṇugāmaṁ viharatō suttattha- parikammiya-
matī sayalapāvadvāṇāī pariharaṁtō samāgatō tattha vijayadhammō nāma muṇivarō । ṭhiō sōmasēṭṭhijāṇasālāē । samāgayā
jāgarayā kayā muṇiṇā dhammadēsaṇā । vaṁdiūṇa muṇivaraṁ jahāgayaṁ paḍigayā parisā । kaō tatthēva muṇiṇā
māsakappō । āgacchaṁti paidiṇaṁ surūva-paḍirūvagā māhaṇa - dārayā । muṇī vi kahēṁti tāṇa jiṇadhammaṁ । aṇudigaṁ
dhammasavaṇa-saṁjāyasaddhēhi grahiyā muṇisamīvē ṇiravarāhabēiṁdiyāijīvāṇa saṁkappaō pāṇavaha ṇivittī । māsāvasāṇē
vihariō' aṇṇattha muṇivarō । jahā paḍivaṇṇāṇuvvaya- pālaṇaṁ kuṇatāṇa vaccai kālō surūva- paḍivagaṇa |
।
aṇṇā maraṇa pajjavasāṇayāē jīvalōgassa uvarayāṇi jaṇaṇi jaṇayāṇi । tatō tē kāūṇa tāṇa maya - kiccāṇi
ghara - kajjāṇi kāumāraddhā । puṣvakayakamma- pariṇaivasēga thōvadiṇamajjhē cēva samāgayaṁ dāliddaṁ । aṇivvahaṁtā ya gayā
gāmamēgaṁ । paragharēsu kukammāṇi kuṇaṁtā kilēsēṇa udaramēttaṁ pi bharēṁti । aṇṇayā dhaṇṇābhihāṇāē - raṁḍāthērīē vissā-
samāgayāē bhaṇiyā surūva paḍirūvagā -- " vacchā ! nēha maṁ kusatthalapuraṁ । tattha gayā dīṇāra- dasagaṁ vitarissāmi । paḍivaṇṇa-
mahi । kayā gamaṇa - sāmaggī sārahibhāvaṁ paḍavaṇṇō surūvō । gahiyāuhō puratō ṭhitō paḍirūvagō । kamēṇa vaccaṁtā
mahāvi paviṭṭhā vigaliyappā ō vāsarō sāma-vayaṇāōṁ kayāvarāhāō viva kulavadhūō jāyātō disātō । ēyammi
aṁtarē bhaggō akkhō, bhaṁḍīē samāraṇakaē taduvagaraṇaṁ parāmasaṁtēṇa diṭṭhō gaṁṭhī paḍirūvagēṇa । thērīdiṭṭhī vaṁciūṇa chōḍiō ।
diṭṭhāō dōṇi suvaṇakhōḍiyāō' caliyacittēṇa savarṇatē hōūṇa saṇiyaṁ bhaṇiō surūvō paḍirūvagēṇa - " bhāya ! ṇimmāṇusā
aḍavī, tamaṁdhayārā savvarī । atthi ēyāē thērīē suvaṇṇayaṁ । tā mārēūṇa giṇhāmō ।” surūvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "alamiyāē

vadati kuśalaṁ । naḥ sarvaprayōjanēṣu prāptō yuṣmān prahitō lēkhaḥ । prabhūtaṁ ca kāryamidaṁ । katipaya dinamadhyē vayamāgamiṣyāmaḥ ।
bhavatā pi rājānaṁ prati sarvē'pi sāmaṁtā vimukhī kāryāḥ । hastyaśvasādhanacitakā api bhēda-kṣamā dhāryā iti" । lēhatthaṁ
saṁpahāriūṇa saṁbuddhacitēṇa saddāviō maṁtī rāiṇā । suṇāviō lēhatthaṁ । maṁtiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - abaddhamūlō ēsa lēhō, kavaḍaṁ
kēṇa vi kammaviyaṁ । nāhamēyassa kammaṇōkārī ।" rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ" kō ēttha paramatthō ? " tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " sujjhāmi ।"
rannā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " paccakkhē lēhē kā suddhī ?" savvassa haraṇō kāūṇa mukkō amaccō । dāviō savvammi nagarē paḍahaō ।
bhaṇiō lōgō - - " bhō bhō gāgarayā ! paṁcadiṇamajjhē sāradhaṇaṁ ghēttūṇa pavvayaduggē gaṁtavvaṁ । appaṇā vi gahiyakari -
turayasārabhaṁḍārō duggamāsiō । rāyārahiyaṁ saṁbuddha nagaraṁ । bhīyā bhaṁḍasāliyā । samagghī bhūyāṇi bhaṁḍāṇi । taō kaō
paḍarabhaṁḍasaṁgahō viṇhuṇā appaṇā vi jaṇēṇa saddhi samārūḍhō pavvayaṁ । ṭhiō sattadiṇāṇi pavvayaduggē rāyā । taō pēsiyā
( pacchaṇṇā) pāsaṁḍavēsadhāriṇō vivakkhaṇaravai nagarē carā । muṇiyaparamatthā samāgayā kaivayadiṇāvasāṇē । pucchiyā
rāiṇā - " kiṁ tattha vadr̥ti ? " tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ -- "mahārāya ! sagharē cēva tassa rāiṇō jēṭṭhaputtajuvarāēṇa saha viggahō ।
aliyaṁ kēṇa vi dēvapāyāṇa bhayakāraṇaṁ kahiyaṁ । ēvaṁ suṇiya uttiṣṇō rāyā duggāō । samāgayā jāgarayā । pāraddhō
vavahārō । viṇhū vi jaṁ dasaha gahiyaṁ taṁ saēṇa vi na dēi । ēvaṁ vavaharaṁtēṇa tēṇa saṁpiḍiyaṁ bhūridaviṇajāyaṁ ।
--
aṇṇammi diṇē pucchiō baṁbhaṇēṇa - - " bhāya ! kahaṁ taē ṇagarasaṁbhamē vi bhaṁḍagahaṇē sāhasamaṇuṭṭiyaṁ ?" tēṇa vi kahiyaṁ
freemāyāvilasiyaṁ । iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "ṇa sōhaṇamēyaṁ, ēgaṁ tāva dhūlāliyavirativayakhaṁḍaṇaṁ bīyaṁ rāya viruddhaṁ ।" viṇhuṇā
bhaṇiyaṁ -- " vayasuddhi puṇō vi gurukahaṇāiṇā karissāmi rāyaviruddhaṁ pi ṇa bhavissati । jatō na mama।ō annō kō vi
ēyaṁ viyāṇai ।" iyarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " na mē imiṇā atthēṇa vi kajjaṁ, ajjēva maē tuha bhiṇṇēṇa hōyavvaṁ ! " viṇhuṇā bhaṇiyaṁ --
ēgaṁ tāva ṇivvavasāō bīyaṁ bhiṇṇabhavaṇēṇa bhāēsi । bhavasu kō ṇivārēi । aliyavayaṇavidattadaviṇamagiṇhaṁtō
puḍhō ṭhiō baṁbhō saccābhibhāsī susaṁtuṭṭō ka. laṁ gamēi ।
-
iō ya pāraddhā rāiṇā mūlasuddhī । kēṇēsā paracakkā liyavattā kayā ? paraṁparaēṇa tāvagayā jāva vihū । tatō
ṭhiyā bhaṇiō viṇhū rāyapurisēhi-- "bhadda ! tumaṁ pi annaṁ kahitagaṁ daṁsēhiṁ । na sō tarati aṇṇaṁ daṁsēuṁ । tatō samappitō
rāiṇō । asahaṁtaēhi kahitō ṇaravaissa samagghabhaṁḍaggahaṇavaiyarō 'kukammakārī ēsō' tti saṁjāyanicchaēṇa rāiṇā
pucchiō maṁtī - - " kuḍalēhakaraṇē kassa vāvārō ? " maṁtiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ dāhiṇa karassa jīhāē ya । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ --
" dōha vichēyaṁ karēha । tatō viḍaṁbiūṇa ṇayaramajjhē masāṇē nēūṇa viṇhuṇō dāhiṇakarō jīhā ya chiṇṇā । ruddajjhāṇēṇa
mariūṇa taccapuḍhavīē raitō jāō । baṁbhō vi rāyāmaccasammatō, giraiyāraṁ dēsaviraī paripāliūṇa, jēṭṭhaputtaṁ kuḍuṁbē
saṁṭhaviya, vihivihiyāṇasaṇō paṁcaṇamōkkāraparāyaṇō, mariūṇa sahassārē suravarō jātō । jugaṁdharāyariēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -
"ninnāmiē ! thūlamusāvāya - virativirāhaṇā duhāvahā jahā viṇhussa । ārāhaṇā puṇa suhāvahā jahā baṁbhassa ।
saṁpayaṁ thūlādattādāṇaviraīē ārāhaṇāvirāhaṇā ya bhaṇṇai ।
caṁdaṇa-naṁdaṇa kahā-
—
atha iva jaṁbuddīvē vē bhārahē vāsē uttuṁgapāgārapaiṭṭhiyakavi-sīsaya-paraṁparāvaruddha nahaṁgaṇābhōgaṁ, ṇāṇāvihamaṇi- rayaṇa-
virāyaṁta haṭṭamaggaṁ, jahāṭhāṇaviṇivēsiyatiya- caukka-caccaraṁ, maṁdarāyamāṇajiṇabhavaṇa- siharasaṁṭhiya-pavaṇapahōlira- dhavala-
dhayavaḍakaraggēhi dhammiyajaṇaṁ va hakkārayaṁtaṁ, ārāmujjāṇakāṇagavirāiyaṁ vijayavaddhaṇaṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tattha ṇaṁ caṁdaṇa-naṁdaṇa-
nāmāṇō dōnni vaṇiya-dāragā paramamēttībhāvēṇa parivasaṁti ।
aṇṇayā ahāvihārēṇa viharaṁtā sūrō vva paṇāsiyānnāṇa- timiraṇiyarā, sōmō vva sōmadaṁsaṇā caraṇāṇa viyāṇiya
vivihavatthuvittharā guṇasuṁdarābhihāṇō sūriṇō samāgayā । samōsariyā layāsuṁdarujjāṇē । samāgayā vaṁdaṇavaḍiyāē nagara-

sahasā haṁgaṇāō ṇāvōvari ṇivaḍiō girī ēkkō । tēṇa saya sikkarā sā jāyā ṇāvā khaṇadvēṇa ।।839 ।।

vi na marisitti bhaṇiūṇa pahāviō । jāvajjavi na gēṇhai tāva malayāō paḍiniyattēṇa pāraddhō vēyālō vivakkhavaṁtarēṇa

annayā tilaya- ujjāṇagaēṇa gaṁdaṇēṇa diṭṭha jiṇabhuvaṇaṁ । kayaṁ cēiyavaṁdaṇaṁ । ētyaṁtarē samāgaō ēgō juvāṇaō ।
viraiyā tēṇa titthayarassa mālaī - kusumamālāhi pūyā । uppāḍiō ghaṇasārasammissō kālāgarudhūvō । vaṁdiō bhāvasāraṁ-
titthayarō | paramasaṁvēgamāvaṇṇēṇa kayamēvaṁ paṇihāṇaṁ tēṇa ।
" patthēmi kiṁ pi jiṇavara ! jai vi tumaṁ dēva vīyarāgō si । taha viṇiya daṁsaṇaṁ dējja sāmi ! maha aṇṇa jammē vi । । 840।।

maraṇavihī pucchijjai ?” taō lajjāē ṭhiō ahōmuhō sō juvāṇō । muṇiyasayalavittaṁ tēṇa tassa cēva vayaṁsaēṇa bhaṇiō

pēsiyā bhiccavaggā ।

sāmiō suṁdarī । vilasai jahicchāē viyaraiyagharasiri । aṇṇammi diṇē bhaṇiō dhaṇasirīē -- "vaccha ! adiṭṭhadukkhō
tumaṁ, piusaṁtiyā ēsā lacchī uciyapavittīē jai vilasijjai tō cirājyā hōi । ēyaṁ suṇiya citiyaṁ suṁdarēṇa - suṁdaraṁ

ēvaṁ saṁpasāriya ṭhiō kaivayadiṇāṇi । aṇṇammi diṇē bhaṇiyā jaṇaṇī - " ammō ! jai bhaṇaha tō vavasāyaṁ kiṁpi
cālēmi ।” vāhajala-bhariyalōyaṇā ṭhiyā mōṇēṇa dhaṇasirī । aṇṇammi diṇē vaṁgā jaṇavayasaṁṭhiyāō puvva- disivahūbhāla-
yalatilayabhūyāō kaṁcaṇapurāō samāgayā gahiyaṇāṇāvihabhaṁḍā vaṇiyā । dāviyāī suṁdarassa ṇiya bhaṁḍāī, gahiyāī tēṇa
sē savaṇiēhi, ya samāsātiō samāgayavaṇiēhiṁ, icchiō lābhō parituṭṭhā cittēṇa vaṇiṇō ।

disi dēsa - bhaṁḍakayavikkayā lābhālābhasaṇāhāō kahāō । pasaṁsiō ya tēhi savvadēsēhitō vi vinnāṇa-viṇaya-dhammattha-
kāmasatthatthaviya। raṇa- kalākōsallāiēhiṁ abbhahitō ṇiyadēsō । taṁ ca sōūṇa samuppaṇṇō suṁdarassa vigappō - abvō !
ramaṇijjō vaṁgā jaṇavaō, suṁdaraṁ kaṁcaṇapuraṁ, pasatthā lōgāyārā, dhammaparāyaṇō jaṇō, jiṇabhattimatā jāṇavayā agghaṁti

lōyā, pōḍhaviyaḍḍhāō kāmiṇīō, suṁdarō nēvatthavihī, suhāvabōhā bhāsā । imaṁ citatēṇa puṇō vi vinnattā jaṇaṇī
suṁdarēṇa - "ammō ! tumbhēhiṁ samaṇunnāō vaccāmi puvvapurisāṇuvattēṇa ' mahābalīvaddasatthēṇa atthōvajjaṇanimittaṁ saṁtaraṁ ti

tatō imaṁ nisāmiūṇa ukkhayadasaṇā viva visaharī, ummūliyā viva vallarī, avamāṇiyā viva māṇiṇī,

jatō-

vihavasaricchaṁ dāṇaṁ āgamasarisaṁ ca jaṁpiyamakōvaṁ । kulasarisaṁ āyaraṇaṁ punnēhi viṇā na nivvati ॥ 876 ॥

tā gammau saṁpayaṁ ṇiyasatthaṁ ।” suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "jaṁ vayaṁsō samāṇavēi" tti bhaṇiūṇa gayā dēva-gurupūyāpurassaraṁ

"vaccha ! dīṇāralakkhaṁ giṇhasu । suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - “ ēsō cēva dīṇāralakkhō jaṁ kaṇayasuṁdarī jīviyā । tatō sēṭṭhiṇā
citiyaṁ - " ahō mahicchyā ! ahō mahāṇubhāvayā ! ahō ṇirīhattaṇaṁ ! tā mahākūlappasūēṇa kēṇāvi bhaviyavvaṁ ti
citiūṇa ēgaṁtē pucchiō jiṇamuhō sēṭṭhiṇā - "bhaṭṭa ! ki kulamalaṁkariyaṁ imiṇā tuha vayaṁsaēṇaṁ ? kattō samāgaō,
kāṇi vā nāmakkharāṇi ?" jiṇamuhēṇa vi sacca savittharaṁ sāhiyaṁ । tatō tuṭṭhō ṇiya māṇasē sēṭṭhī bhaṇiō
suṁdarō-- “vaccha ! ajja taē ratthēva bhōttavvaṁ ।” suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - " tattha jaṁ bhujjai taṁ tujjha sayaṁ cēva jaō--
uvayārēhiṁ parōcciya ghēṇaṛa agghaṁti tē tahiṁ cēva । iyarammi kī ramāṇā ṇēhābhāvaṁ payāsēṁti || 878 ||
taō pēsiō sēṭṭhiā suṁdarō। gaō niyasatthaṁ । paccasasamaē sayamēva sēṭṭhiṇā gaṁtūṇa sōvayāraṁ bhaṇiō - "vaccha !
pariṇēsu kaṇayasuṁdarī ।" suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ gurujaṇāyattō ēsa vaiyarō । tatō kajja majjhamavagacchiya gaō sagharaṁ sēṭṭhī
lēhaṁ samappiūṇa pēsiyā pahāṇa purisā । jayaṁtīē samappiō tēhi lēhō dhaṇasirīē vāiumāraddhā । taṁ jahā - " bhaddē !
kaṁcaṇaurē ṇayarē kaṇagasārō sēṭṭhī sōvayāraṁ bhaṇati -- “ jahā atthēttha tumha suō suṁdarō ṇāma । jai bhaṇaha tō tassa
yiduhiyaraṁ kaṇagasuṁdara dēmō ।" dhaṇasirīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ kō kallāṇē virōhō mukuluggaēṇa dhaṇavaṁtapaṇa' bhuvaṇayalapasariya-
jasēṇa saralēṇa sajjaṇēṇaṁ na sammatō kassa saṁbaṁdhō ? supurisasuṁdaravuddhīē suṁdaraṁ suṁdarassa savvaṁ pijaṁ jaṁ uciyaṁ taṁ taṁ
karē ki bahuviyārēṇa ?" jayasuṁdarī sammaēṇa lihīūṇa ēvaṁvihō paḍilēhō samappiō tāṇa | gayā tē kaṁcaṇauraṁ । samappiō
lēhō sēṭṭissa । sō vi avagayatthō harisavasavisaṭṭaṁtalōyaṇajayalō lēhaṁ gahāya gaō suṁdarasamīvaṁ । lēhaṁ daṁsiūṇa bhaṇitō
suṁdarō-- "vaccha ! saṁpayaṁ kimuttaraṁ ?" suṁdarēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "jaṁ bhaṇaha tattha sajjō imō jaṇō ।" tatō samāhūtō saṁvaccha-
riō । kayasammāṇō pucchiō pariṇayaṇavāsaraṁ । tēṇa vi jēṭṭa- sukkilapakkhē sōmē navamīē sāhitō । tatō pāraddhā mahayā
vicchaḍḍēṇa vivāhasāmaggī sēṭṭhiṇā । paramānaṁdabharaṇibbharāṇa samāgaō sō divasō । pariṇīyā kaṇagasuṁdarī suṁdarēṇa ।
dinaṁ piuṇā pāriōsiyaṁ । vittō vīvāhō । ṭhiō paramāṇaṁdēṇa kaivayadiṇāṇi suṁdarī । pacchā sa visayamaṇusaraṁtō
bhaṇiō sēṭṭiṇā - "vaccha ! samāsaṇṇō pāusō । gāḍhaṁ tavati taraṇimaṁḍalaṁ । duggamā bhaggā tā ētthēva parivasiya saraē
gaṁtavvaṁ ।" paḍivaṇṇaṁ suṁdarēṇa । caliyā kē vi satthiyā । sattarayaṇāṇi kusalalēhaṁ ca samappiūṇa bhaṇiō suṁdarēṇa vissa-
ṇijjō dāmōyara - diyavarō -- "vayaṁsa ! imāṇi satta rayaṇāṇi imō ya lēhō maha jaṇaṇi ghariṇīṇa samappēyavvō ।” sō
vi tahēva paḍivajjiūṇa satthiēhi samaṁ ṇiyagharaṁ samāgatō । lōbhamōhiyamaiṇā samappiō lēhō avalattāṇi rayaṇāṇi ।
bīyadiyahē samapiō aṇṇavaṇiēṇa vīya lēhō | dhaṇasirīē vāitō lēhō। tīē dāmōyarahatthāō sattarayaṇāṇi gahēya-
vvāṇi । tatō sā lēhaṁ karē kāūṇa gayā dāmōyaragharaṁ । maggitō rayaṇāṇi । sō bhaṇai -- "na maha hatthē pēsiyāṇi । "
daṁsitō lēhō dāmōyarēṇa । bhaṇiyaṁ - 'aliyaṁ kēṇāvi lihiyaṁ । tatō sagharamāgayā dhaṇatirī bhaṇiyā jayasuṁdarī - "halē !
caliyacittō aiya lakkhīyai ēsa baṁbhaṇō, tā kassai pahāṇapurissassa kahēūṇa karē kijjaṁtu rayaṇāṇi ।" jaṁ aṁbā āṇa-
vēiti bhaṇiūṇa bhuttattaraṁ gayā sēṭṭisamīvaṁ jayasuṁdarī । diṭṭhō sēṭṭhī । kahiyaṁ kajjaṁ । tēṇa vi jayasuṁdarī ruvāiguṇa-
gaṇa-mucchiyamāṇasēṇa mailiyamēraṁ ēvaṁ payaṁpiyaṁ-- “suṁdari ! maē saha ēkkasi pi visayasuhamaṇuhavasi tō tē paōyaṇaṁ
sāhēmi ।" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "jai ēvaṁ tō jāmiṇī paḍhamajāmē samāgaṁtavvaṁ" tti payaṁpiūṇa tatō gayā uvarōhiyasamīvē ।
tassa vi sēṭṭisarisa samullāvō । 'vīya jāmē samāgaṁtavvaṁ' ti payaṁpiūṇa gayā amaccasagāsaṁ । amaccō vi uvarōhiēṇa va
pāḍhiō tamēva vāgarai । taiyapaharē rayaṇīē ējjasu' tti bhaṇiūṇa pattā ṇaravaisamīvaṁ । sāhiyaṁ kajjaṁ । raṇṇā vi tahēva bhaṇṇati
jaṁ maṁtiṇā । cauttha jāmē jāmiṇīē sāmiṇā samāgaṁtavvaṁ ti । payaṁpiūṇa pacchā sagharamāgayā । sāhiō sāsuyāē tāṇa
samullāō । dhaṇasirīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " jattha kāraṇapurisā vi vimukkamērā ēvaṁvihāṇi payaṁpaṁti tattha kā rayaṇāsā ?"
jagasuṁdarīē bhaṇiyaṁ --- "atthi causu vi disāsu samaṁtaō purisapamāṇacaukōṇālaṁkiyā mahai mahāliyā tuha gharē maṁjasā ?"
tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " atthi ।" jagasuṁdarīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " jai ēvaṁ tō sā ugghāṅakavāḍā gharamajjhē muccau ।" tahēva kayaṁ । tatō

ētyaṁtarē vāsiyaṁ taṁbacūḍēṇa । uggatō ravirahasārahī । tatō bahuyaraṁ galē ghittūṇa sadukkhamiva paruṇṇā dhaṇasirī ।

rāyā । paḍiniyattō bhaṇiō talavarō -- " na dīsati rāyā ।" pacchā gatō talavarō amaccamaṁdiraṁ * । tamavi apēcchaṁtō

rajjakajjaṁ । saṁgōvijjau asāmiyā gharasirī । ēvaṁ maṁtiūṇa gayā dhaṇasirīgharē । ṇirūviyaṁ samaṁtatō maṁdiraṁ । tatō
bhaṇiyā dhaṇasirī - " bhaddē ! mahaī tumha gharē atthasaṁbhāvaṇā na puṇa kiṁ pi dīsai, kō ēttha paramatthō ?" dhaṇasirīē
bhaṇiyaṁ - " ahaṁ pi na yāṇāmi । paraṁ dēsaṁtaraṁ vaccaṁtēṇa puttēṇa ēttiyaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ jahā - " ammō ēsā maṁjūsā payattēṇa saṁrakkhaṇīyā ।
tatō citiyamaṇēhi ghaḍamāṇamēyaṁ saṁbhāvijjai ēttha gharasārō । ṇirūviyā, jāva vālēuṁ pi na tīrai ।” pucchiyā
saṇṇavattiṇī 6 jagasuṁdarī । kiṁ kāraṇamaccaggalō bhārō ?” tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - ajja maē rayaṇicaramajāmē suttajāgarāē
sumiṇagammi cattāri lōgapālā niyagharamaṇupaviṭṭhā diṭṭhā | tē gharaṁ saccavēūṇa maṁjūsāē puvvadāhiṇāvaruttarēsu kōṇēsu
ēkkēkkō paviṭṭhō । tatō jaggiyāhaṁ jai ēsa saccō sumiṇagō, tā lōgapālāṇubhāvēṇa bhārō vi saṁbhāvijjaiti ।

militō ṇagaralōgō, maggiyā pāriggahiēhiṁ dhaṇasirī kuṁciyā । samappiyā tīē । taō ugghāḍiyaṁ puvvakōṇō tālayaṁ ।
ahiṇavuvvūḍhakula kannaya' vva palaṁbapaḍapāuyamuhō ahōṇiviṭṭhadiṭṭhī ṇiggatō rāyā । turiya turiyaṁ palāṇō ṇiyamaṁdirābhimuhaṁ ।
dāhiṇilla kōṇātō ra amaccō ṇiggaō । sō vi tahēva sabhavaṇābhimuhō pahāvitō । pacchillātō uvarōhiō sō vi
sarasarassa ṇiyasaraṇaṁ saraṁtō cēva lōgēhi diṭṭhō । uttarillāō sēṭṭhī vaṁciūṇa diṭṭhī sigghasigdhaṁ sagharaṁ gatō । taō
pārigāhiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ ki saccamēva ēē rāyāmaccōvarōhiya- siṭṭiṇō uyāhu iṁdayālaṁ ? na hasaṁtayā ṇa rōvaṁtayāṇa saṁpayaṁ
saṁgayaṁ' ti pucchiyā jagasuṁdarī -- “ kō ēsa vr̥ttaṁtō ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - "gharē cēva sāhiō sumiṇagō sō saccō saṁbhāvijjai । "
pāriggahiēṇa citiyaṁ - "alamimiṇā viyārēṇa mā jaṇō paṁḍitō kīrau ।” āyārasaṁvaraṁ kāūṇa saha maṁjūsāē pēsiyāō5
sagharaṁ sāsuyabahuō ṇiya-niya gharaṁ । gatō ṇagaralōgō । rāiṇā vi saddāviō daṁḍavāsiō । bhaṇiō ēgaṁtē ।" arē !
gaṁtūṇa bhaṇāhi maha vayaṇēṇa jayasuṁdari - 'jahā acirādēvarayaṇasāmiṇī bhavasi tahā karissāmō paraṁ ṇa ēsa nisāvaiyarō
kassai puratō payāsiyavvō ।' tahēva kayaṁ daṁḍavāsiēṇa । bīryādiṇē hakkāriūṇa bhaṇiō amaccēṇa dāmōyarō ।" arē !
dharatammi sāmiē vi bhinnalēhasūiyāṇi pararayaṇāṇi avaharaṁtassa sumariyaṁ tē kayaṁtēṇa ? tā lahuṁ sayamēva gaṁtūṇa samappēhi ।
tēṇā vi tahēva kayaṁ ।
rāyā maccuvarōhiya-sēṭṭhīṇaṁ bhāvakhaṁḍiyavayāṇa । ihalōgammi akittī duggaigamaṇaṁ parabhavammi || 879 ।।
iō ya sō suṁdarō vittē vāsāratē viḍhattabhūridaviṇasaṁcaō aṇuṣṇaviyakaṇayasārasēṭṭhi kaṇayasuṁdarī sahitō mahayā
satyasaṁmaddēṇa pattō jayaṁtīē । ānaṁdiyā jaṇaṇī । pāḍiyā calaṇēsu dhaṇasiri । jagasuṁdarīṇa kaṇagasuṁdarī sāhiō savvō
vi suṁdarēṇa ṇiyayavuttaṁtō । dhaṇasirīē vi rayaṇāvalāva - lābhavaiyarō । jāyā savisēsaṁ sammayā jagasuṁdarī suṁdarassa । ēvaṁ
tivaggasāraṁ visayasuhamaṇuhavaṁtāṇi kālaṁ garmēti tāṇi । tā bhaddē ! paradāravirativirāhaṇā ihalōgē vi viḍaṁbaṇaphalā
jahā rāyāmaccōvarōhiya-sēṭṭhīṇa ārāhaṇā guṇakarī jahā jayasuṁdarīē ।
iyāṇi pavitra niyama paripālaṇāē vīyaṁ 6 bhaṇṇai ।
sāvaya-sāviyā kahā --
-----
asthi kacchadēsēsu kacchō nāma gāmō । tattha āhīrakulasaṁbhūyāṇi sāvaō sāviyā ya bhajjō vaiyāṇi parivasaṁti ।
iō ya tammi cēva dēsē āṇaṁdapuravatthabvō ājammadāriddiō dhijjāitō parivasati । annayā tēṇa citiyaṁ - "ahō !
mē apuṇaparivāḍī, tō kiṁci dēvaṁ samārāhiūṇa saṁpattadhaṇō dēmi bhagavaṁtāṇa baṁbhaṇāṇa bhōyaṇaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ ca, jēṇa jammaṁtarē
vi nēvaṁvidukkhāṇa bhāyaṇaṁ bhavāmi ।" ēvaṁ vigappiya gatō thūlēsaraṁ । ṭhiō abhōyaṇēṇa kaivayadiṇēhiṁ aṛagaēhi
bhaṇiō dēvēṇa -- "bhō chakkamma ! kiṁ nimittaṁ uvarōhasi ?" baṁbhaṇēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - " bhagavaṁ ! atthi mē dāṇēcchā ṇatthi
dāyavvaṁ tā tahā karēsu jahā baṁbhaṇāṇaṁ bhōyaṇaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ ca dēmi ।" dēvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ " kiṁ tuha baṁbhaṇēhi kacchēsu kacchagāmē
sāvagāṇi bhajjō vaiyāṇi, tāṇa bhōyaṇaṁ dakkhiṇaṁ ca dēhi jai putrēṇa paōaṇaṁ ।" ēvaṁ dōnni tinni vārā bhaṇiō
dinnadhaṇō, gaō kacchaṁ dhijjāitō " didvāṇi tāṇi" sāvagāṇi jarā-jajjariyasarīrāṇi diṇṇaṁ bhōyaṇaṁ dakkhiṇā ya । pacchā
pucchiyāṇi - “bhō ! kahē kō guṇō tumha jēṇa dēvassa vi pūyaṇijjāṇi ।" taō bhaṇiyaṁ sāvaēṇa māhaṇasuēhi ।"
amhē vi bhiṇṇagāmavāsīṇi aṇṇayā sāhusamāgamēṇa laddhaṁ sammattaṁ । paḍivaṇṇā dēsaviratī । savisēsa jāyasadvēṇa maē
kayā jāvajjīvaṁ sukka - paḍivayamāī kāūṇa gurupuratō ēgaṁtariyā mēhuṇaṇivittī । imāē vi sukka vīyamāī kāūṇa paḍivaṇṇā
jāvajjīvaṁ ēgaṁtariyā abaṁbhaviratī । pattāṇi jōvvaṇaṁ । vihivasēṇa jātō amhāṇa pariṇayaṇasaṁbaṁdhō। taṁ ca vivarīyaṁ

samāvaḍiyaṁ । jaddivasaṁ maha mōkkalaṁ taddivasaṁ imāē baṁbha-niyamō । jaddivasaṁ imāē mōkkalaṁ tammi dinē maha niyamō ।

maṁgalamiṇamō khalu maṁgalāṇa varabhūsaṇāṇamābharaṇaṁ । sīlaṁ ciya jayapayaḍaṁ thuṇaṁti jēṇēha dēvā vi ।।880 ॥
jātirahiyā vijaniṁdiyā vi supasattharūvarahiyā vi । māyaṁgarisī viva suravarēhiṁ thuvvaṁti sīlaḍḍhā ||881 ॥
taṁ natthi jaṁ na sijjhai sayalē mahimaṁḍalammi purisāṇa । sīlakaliyāṇa kajjaṁ jahicchiyaṁ dhīrapurisāṇa ||882 ॥
saṁpunnanāṇarahiyā vimūḍhamaiṇō vi jaṁti diya lōyaṁ । sīlaparipālaṇāō tamhā sīlammi jaiyavvaṁ ॥ 883 ॥ |
ēvaṁ suṇiya saṁbuddhō māhaṇō । tā ninnāmiē ! jahā gahiyaniyamaparipālaṇāparā ihalōē vi dēvēhiṁ pi ṇijjaṁti
jahā imaṁ sāvagamihuṇaṁ ।
saṁpayaṁ pariggahaparimāṇa virāhaṇārāhaṇaphalaṁ bhaṇṇai ।

atthi iva jaṁbuddīvē dīvē bhārahē vāsē visappaṁta- vivēyaguṇa rayaṇāharaṇa-maṁḍiya- viggahāsama-satta-naravisara- virāya-
māṇō mōkkhataruvaṁśa - vīyakappa- sammattāiguṇasaṁpāyaṇa samattha-dhamma- dēsaṇā- ṇirayamuṇijaṇa-paya-paṁkayāsaṁgiō' gāmāgara-
puravaraṇivāsi" sura-suṁdarī" vāra- vajjiratāra-nē urārāvaraṁjiyarāyahaṁsa-maṁḍalō kacchō ṇāma jaṇavaō । tammi sayalavisaya-
pahāṇaṁ tihūyaṇasirīsaṁsēviyaṁ mahīmaṁḍaṇaṁ nāma nagaraṁ । tattha ya aṁjaṇagiri - siharasamāṇathirathōra karārikari-kuṁbhatthala-
viyā raṇucchaliya-dhavala-muttāhalukkēradaṁturiyakarāla -karavāladhārā nisaṇṇarāyalacchī samāliṁgiyaviggahō ṇaravāhaṇō nāma
rāyā । niyasuṁdēraviṇijjiyasurasuṁdarīsaṁdōhā caṁdalēha vva baṁdhuyaṇa- kumuya - saṁḍānaṁdakāraṇaṁ caṁdalēhā ṇāma mahādēvī' । tīē
saha visaya suhamaṇuhavaṁtassa rāiṇō jātō puttō । uciyasamaē paṭṭhāviyaṁ nāmaṁ 'guṇacaṁdō' tti | aṭṭavārisiō' samappiō

ṇāma । aṇṇā maraṇapajjavasāṇayāē jīvalōgassa uvarayā caṁdalēhā । ṭhaviyā tammi ṭhāṇē aṇṇā dēvī । samuppaṇṇō
tīē vi puttō । taō sā guṇacaṁdaṁ para vippayārēi rāyāṇaṁ । sō vi kaṇṇa-visaviyāra' paṇaṭṭa - vivēō aviyāriūṇa
paramatthaṁ viyaliya - siṇēhō sāmaṇṇajaṇaṁ va pēcchai guṇacaṁdakumāraṁ । tatō visāyamāvaṇṇēṇa citiyaṁ kumārēṇa -- “ avakriyā

parāvattiō maṁtō । taō sapphuriyāē maṁtassa ummīliyaṁ lōyaṇajuyalaṁ maḍaēṇa pacaliyaṁ maṇāyaṁ । taō jāyā guṇacaṁdassa āsaṁkā ।

mariūṇa samuppaṇṇī mahāḍavīē mōrō । jīvaṁtō cēva gahiō lōddhaēṇa । āṇiō tammi cēva ṇayarē dāūṇa mullaṁ gahiō
haridēttēṇa āṇiō ghiyadharaṁ । taṁ daṭṭhūṇa samuppaṇṇaṁ jāīsaraṇaṁ । aṇṇayā diṭṭhā savvāṇī haridēvēṇa saha aṇāyāramāyaraṁtī ।
samuppaṇṇō amarisō । na tarai maṁgalaṁ kāuṁ । aṇṇadiyahammi pugvadēsāō samāgaō viraṁcisarisō cauvēyaviyāṇatō
tivikkamō nāma diyavarō ।
tataśca samamaśrōtriyē dānaṁ dviguṇaṁ brāhmaṇaḥ bruvē । sahasraguṇamācāryē anantaṁ vēdapāragē ।
imaṁ citiyaṁ tēṇa sa bahumāṇaṁ ṇimaṁtitō tivikkamō haridattēṇa । parikappitō savvō vi āhāravihī । visēsaō
āmisāṇi saṁpattāē bhōyaṇavēlāē uvaviṭṭhō tivikkamō saha vēyapāḍhagacaṭṭēhiṁ । samuvaṇīyāṇi ṇāṇāvihāṇi bhakkhabhōyaṇāṇi
āmisāṇi ya । bhuttāṇi jahāruiyaṁ āyaṁtasuibhūtō ṇisaṇṇō gharamaṁḍavē tivikkamō । tatō rayaṇasuvaṇṇavatthāiēhiṁ sabahumāṇaṁ
pūiūṇa bhaṇitō haridattēṇa tivikkamō । “uvajjhāya ! vīsa varisāṇi sātirēgāṇi tāyassa paralōgaṁ gayassa । ēyammi
aṁtarē tassa' nāmēṇa aṇavarayaṁ jaṭṭājannā kayāṇi, piṁḍappāṇāṇi paryāṭṭayā sattāgārā, diṇṇāṇi jahāgamaṁ diyavarāṇa
vicittadāṇāṇi savvahā kayaṁ savvaṁ pi paralōyakāyavvaṁ taṁ savvaṁ kamalāsaṇassēva cauvēyaviyāṇagassa tujjha vayaṇēṇa sēsa-
baṁbhaṇāṇa ya uvaṇamau tāyassa । ।" tēṇa palattaṁ - "sēsa diyavarēhiṁ ya tini vārāō uvaṇamaṁu 3 ।” ētthaṁtarammi taṁ
sōūṇa citiyaṁ maūrēṇa -- "accō puttagēṇa mama nāmēṇa jāgāiṇō ṇivvittiyā tahā vi ṇa mama tajjaṇiyaṁ kiṁ pi
suhaphalamuvaṇayaṁ ṇa ya tiriyavāsāō vi ahaṁ vimōiō । maē vi jaṁ sayaṁ jāgāiyaṁ kayaṁ taṁ pi ṇa ṇajjati kahiṁ pi
gayaṁ । iya ēvamā bahuvicitābharaṇinbharassa mōrassa vōlīṇō sō diyahō jammaṁtaragēhasāmissa । bīyadivasē bhaṇiyā
savvāṇī haridattēṇa -- "ammō tātō mōramaṁsappiō āsi tā tannāmēṇa bhuṁjāvēsu uvajjhāyaṁ mōrāmisēṇa । taṁ mōraṁ pai
pauṭṭhamāṇasāē bhaṇiyaṁ savvāṇīē -- "vaccha ! natthi mōra-maṁsapaḍikkaō । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ imaṁ cēva ghara- mōraṁ mārēsu ।
tatō taṁ suṇatō" ahō ! puttagō mamaṁ pai ēvaṁ dukkhaō ahaṁ puṇa savisēsaṁ bhavē bhavē cēva dukkhitō marāmi ।" ēvaṁ
saṁbuddhacittō kiṁci suhapariṇāmō vārāitō varahī । jēmāvitō uvajjhāō । sō vimaō saṁtō kiṁ ci majjhimaguṇa-
jōgaō samuppaṇṇō ṇiyaputtassa haridattassa puttattāē । samaē paṭṭāviyaṁ nāmaṁ viṇḍudattōti । aṭṭhavārisiyassa daṭṭhūṇa
ṇiyapariyaṇaṁ samuppaṇṇaṁ jāīsaraṇaṁ । abvō ! ēsā savvāṇatthanibaṁdhaṇā maha ghariṇī । savvāṇī ēsa puṇa suō haridattō
ēsā maha jaṇaṇī husā, tā saṁpayaṁ ki juttaṁ kiṁ mōṇaṁ māyarāmi uyāhu aṇasaṇaṁ karēmi kiṁ vā appāṇaṁ vā vāēmi ? "

amma dinē vāhiṁ gaēsu jaṇaṇi jaṇaēsu suhapasuttaṁ viṇhudattaṁ nāūṇa galē aṁguṭṭhē dāūṇa māriumāraddhā savvāṇī ।

bhaṇiyā ghariṇī - "ēsā tuha sāsuyā kālaratti vva suyassa saṁghārakāriyā tā ēsa niyaputtagō sammaṁ rakkhēyavvō । tatō

bahumasiṇa- kasiṇa- kuṁciya-siṇiddha-taṇumuddhayāvalidvēṇaṁ' । muddhāṇēṇaṁ muha- sasi viḍappakappēṇa rēhatī ।।929 ।।

uttuṁguṇṇaya - riu-pavara - nāsiyā kuṁda - kaliyasa madasaṇā । gīvā guṇa-ramaṇijjā navanaliṇi- muṇāla - bāhulayā ।।931||
tuṁganiraṁtara uṇṇaya-samacitta-paōharā pavaravacchā । tivalī taraṁga-bhaṁguramajjha saṇāhā ya taṇuyaṁgī ॥ 932 ॥ |
miu-kasiṇārōmarāī gaṁbhīravirāyamāṇa nāhī ya । rasaṇādāmavirāiyaviyaḍa niyaṁbatthalābhōyā ।।933 ।।
uttattakaṇayavanna৷ kayalī - khaṁbhōvamēhiṁ urūhi । varakara-kara - samajaṁghā mayaraddhaya - jaya paḍāya vva ।।934॥
samakummunnaya-maṁsala -
miu-maṇahara calaṇaēhiṁ calamāṇī । vararāyahaṁsiyā iva sōhai sahiyāyaṇasamēyā ।। 935 ॥
aṁgōvaṁga-paiṭṭhiya-lakkhaṇa- supasattha- suṁdara - sarīrā । acchau tā maṇuyāṇaṁ ahilasaṇijjā surāṇaṁ pi ॥ 936 ॥
harai maṇaṁ guṇaniyarō vaṇijjaṁtō vi tīē taruṇāṇaṁ । rāyaduhiyāē dhaṇiyaṁ kiṁ puṇa paccakhadiṭṭhāē ||937||
iya sā suṁdararūvā abhagga - sōhaggamaṁdiraṁ bālā । diṭṭhā kumarī kumarēṇa sirimaī vairajaṁghēṇa ।। 938 ।।
taō bhaṇiō rāiṇā kumārō -- "vaccha vairajaṁgha ! ēsā sirimaī pugvabhavāṇurāgēṇa tumaṁ cēva bhattāramabhilasati ।
tākīrau tuha imīē saha saṁbaṁdhō । kumārēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "tāō cēva juttā-juttaṁ viyāṇai । amhārisā puṇa guruāṇā-
kāragā cēva । ēyammi avasarē aṇāhuō cēva ṇiyayapaōyaṇavasēṇa puppha-phalabhariyahatthō pattō sumaī nāma jōisiō ।
nisaṇṇō rāyāṇuṣṇāē samuciyāsaṇē । sammāṇiūṇa pucchiō rāiṇā laggadiṇaṁ । tēṇa vi gaṇiūṇa kahiyaṁ adruma diṇē ।
dēvīē taō bhaṇiyaṁ " -- āsaṇṇaṁ nāha! suṁdaraṁ laggaṁ । avilaṁbiyāṇi saṁpai, kijjaṁtu vivāhakajjāṇi ।।939 ।।
īsi hasiūṇa raṇṇā niyaāvāsammi pēsiō kumarō । niyavarisa vaddhaṇa chaṇaṁ saṁkhēvēṇaṁ vihēūṇaṁ ।। 940 ।।
savvāraṁbhēṇa taō pariyaṇasahiēṇa vairasēṇēṇa । pāradvā riddhīē
pāraddhā riddhīē vivāhasāmaggiyā sayalā ||941 ॥
jaṁ jaṁ citai taṁ taṁ saṁpajjai takkhaṇaṁ naridassa । natthi asajjhaṁ ahavā saṁciya puṇṇāṇa purisāṇa ।। 942॥
dhavalaharē dhavalaharē vicittacittāō kuṇaha bhittīō। navaraṁgarēhirāī karēha navaraṁgajuyalāī || 943 ||
ēmāi rāya-maṁdira-nara-nārīṇaṁ payaṁ payaṁtāṇaṁ । pattō samaō hatthaṁgulīhi diyahē gaṇatāṇa ।।944 ।।
jaō--
cōra-paradāriyāṇaṁ chuhāparadvāṇa naṭṭa-niuṇāṇa । kalakaṁṭhāṇa vaṇijjaṁ agghai vīvāha - diyahēsu
pasaraṁta hiyaya-parisa-visaṁṭhula * chaliya-vayaṇa - viṇṇāsō । mairāmattō vva jaṇō vivāhadiyahē paribhama
kayakuṁkumaṁgarāō niyatthavara vattha vaddha-cahu-kusumō । taruṇīyaṇō vivāhē na kassa maṇamōhaṇaṁ kuṇai ?
ussiṁkhala paribhamijaṁ ussikhalajaṁpiyaṁ ca hasiyaṁ ca । juvaīṇa juvāṇāṇaṁ hōi vivāhasa disu
airammō siṁgārō sarasaṁ gīyaṁ ca laḍahanaṭṭaṁ ca । ramaṇīṇa kahaṁ jāyai jai na vivāhusavō hōi

"iyahallupphala pariyaṇapisuṇiya saṇṇihiyalaggapacchāvō । naranāhavairasēgō pahāṇapurisaṁ imaṁ bhaṇai ।। 950 ।।
rē ! rē ! akālahīṇaṁ hakkāraha dūradēsarāyāṇō । purajaṇavayāṇa payaḍaha pāṇigrahaṇaṁ kumārīē ।। 951 ।।
tē vi tahā kāūṇaṁ saccaṁ sāhiti vairasēṇassa । sō vi kaidiyaha majjhē pauṇaṁ kāuṁ ṭhiō savvaṁ ॥ 952 ॥
aṇṇammi diṇē sumaī samāgaō bhaṇai dēvalaggadiṇō । āsaṇṇō cciya vaṭṭai kumarīē pāṇiggahaṇaṭṭā ।। 953 ।।
taō viraijjaṁti raṁgāvalīō, bajjhati caṁdaṇamālāō, taḍuvijjaṁti vicittavattha-vitāṇayā, laṁbāvijjaṁti
muttāvalīō, kīraṁti haṭṭasōhāō । samāharijjaṁti takkālajōggāṇi vattha-gaṁdha-mallālaṁkāra-bhakkha bhōjja-pēya-sayaṇā-
sāīṇi । saṁvacchariyavayaṇēṇa samuciyasamaē samādattāṇi ṇhavaṇayaṁ bhūmīē maṁgalāṇi kāuṁ nāṇāvihavaṇṇaēhiṁ viraiō
raṁgāvalīō, gōrasiddhatthaēhiṁ kaō satthiō । gajjaṁkura javāraya-pihiyavayaṇā surahivimalajalāvūriyā viṇimmiyā kaṁcana-
kalasā causu vi disāsu । tassa majjhē dhavaladugullō chāīyā, ṭhaviyā kalahōya pēḍhiyā, nisaṇṇā tattha puvvābhimuhī
sirimaī । dhariyā calaṇā maṇimayasilā vīḍhē, nimmaviyaṁ mahakammaṁ vacchīputtēṇa, pāḍiō pēraṁtēsu lakkhārasō, kayaṁ
makkhaṇayaṁ, āsīsamūhalāhiṁ dharitadhavāhi nariṁdakulabāliyāhi । puṇō vi palhatthā sē uttimaṁgē gaṁdhōdayapa hatthā kaṁcana-
kalasā । samāhayāī maṁgalatū rāī । āvariyā jamalasaṁkhā । pagīyāī maṁgalāī । ēvaṁ vihiṇā nivvattiyābhisēyā pavēsiyā
bhavaṇabhaṁtarasmi । kāriyā ṇiyagōttakittaṇāī | avi ya--
varagōttukittaṇajāyaharisa ucchaliya sēyasalilēhiṁ । paḍhamaṁ ciya sā haviyā pacchā puṇa kaṇaya - kala sēhiṁ ॥ 954 ॥ ।
ētyaṁtarē vidda māyaṁbirēsu vi niyadaīō vi vasāṇurāō nivaḍiō sirimaīē jāvayarasō calaṇēsu । tahā niyaya
kaṁtivibbhamēṇaṁ kathāō kuṁkumakēsararasēṇa saṇāhāō jaṁdhiyāō kaṇiyārakusumapiṁjarēsu vi pāḍiō kuṁkumarāgō uru-
juyalēsu । niyadaitō viva kaō sēsamayaṇō aharō niyajasēṇaṁ piva nimmalēṇaṁ ullōiyaṁ vayaṇaṁ caṁdaṇarasēṇaṁ । avi ya--
cūḍāmaṇī virāya tissā sīsammi tiṇayaṇa-sasi vva । hārō vi hiyaya nihiō guṇakaliō sahai daiō vva ।। 955 ||
avalaṁbiūṇa kaṁṭhaṁ paōharucchaṁga-saṁga dullaliō । upphusai nīvi-baṁdhaṁ tissādaya vva varahārō ।।956।।
sōhai kuṁḍalajuyalaṁ kavōla - ghōlaṁta - paḍiya - paḍiviṁvaṁ । paccūsapuṇṇimāē diṇayara-sasi-biṁbajuyalaṁ ca ।। 957 ॥
vaddhaṁ rasaṇādāmaṁ sura-sari - viyaḍē niyaṁbadēsammi । kavvaṁ va suvaṇṇakayaṁ rakkhākaṁḍē va mayaṇassa ।। 958 ।।
kasaṇāgaru saṁkāsō rēhaṛa tilaō maō va muhaiṁdē । vammabāṇa vva phuḍaṁ mayavaṭṭā varakavōlē ।।959 ।।
paḍimā paḍiō rēes kavōlamūlammi cuṁbaṇasayahō । kāmi vva jaṇiyasōkkhō avvō kaṇṇāvayaṁsō sē ।। 960 ।।
daṭhṭhē pāhaṇasiriṁ tissāmayaraddhaō visaṁbhaṁtō । kiṁ saccaṁ ciya ēsā hōjja raī vimhayaṁ pattō ॥ 969 ॥
,
ēvaṁ ca jāva sirimaī viyaḍḍhasahiyāyaṇēṇa pasāhijjai । tāva pēsiyaṁ vairasēṇēṇa vairajaṁghakumārassa
vi ṇhavaṇayaṁ haviō vairasē piṁḍavilāsiṇī - pamuhapariyarēṇa paramavibhūīē nāṇāvihakōjyamaṁgalēhiṁ kumārō । dāūṇa tāsa
māhapadāṇaṁ, 'baccaha niyayabhavaṇaṁ'ti, bhaṇiūṇa kāūṇa varavatthābharaṇāiēhi sārasiṁgāraṁ āruhiūṇa mattavāraṇaṁ aṇēgana-
raṇāha-bhaḍabhōiyasamaṇugammāṇamaggō puraō paḍhataēhi maṁgalapāḍhaēhi, samaṁtaō kari-turaya rahavara pāya kkāṇiēṇa parivēḍhiō
samasamāhayatūra- sadda-bhariya baṁbhaṁḍamaṁḍalō, uvari dhariyadhavala- virāyaṁtukhaṁḍapuṁḍarīō mayaraṁduddāma-gaṁdhāyaḍḍiya-bhamira- bhamarō-
limālai kusuma - mālōmmāliya-kaṁdharābhōgō, vihuvvaṁta - siya- cārucāmaruppīlō, payaṭṭō niyadhavalaharāō vairajaṁghakumārō |
pattō kamēṇa āṇaṁdētō purajaṇaṁ vairasēga garida dhavalahara - dubāradēsaṁ dhariō ya tattha vilāsiṇījaṇēṇa । davāviō āyārimayaṁ -
dahi- siddhatthayakusumasaṇāharayaṇathālahatthāē, bhaggā sē bhiuḍī rayaṇamusalēṇa avihavanariṁdavilayāē । viraiō agghō

sirimai ! muha daṁsaṇatthaṁ savvamēvamāraddhati bhaṇatō saṁpattō vippainnakusumōvayāraṁ saṁpāḍiyāsēsa tiyasapaḍimōvayāraṁ caṁdaṇa-

aṇṇayā kayāi vējjassa gharē ēgaō savvēsi saṇṇisaṇṇāṇaṁ tattha' sāhū mahappā kimikuṭṭhēṇa gahiō bhikkhaṭṭā
samāgaō । taṁ sāhuṁ daṭṭhūṇa sappaṇayaṁ sahāsaṁ sōvālaṁbhaṁ tēhi kēsavō bhaṇiō - " tubbhēhi lōgō cēva khāiyavvō kiṁ na
turbhēhi tavasissa vā aṇāhassa vā kiriyā kāyavvā ?" sō bhaṇai karēmi kahaṁ ? tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ - "ēsa mahātavassī
tava - susiya- sarīrō nippaḍikamma sarīrō kimikuṭṭhōvaddavō jaṁgamatitthaṁ । paḍipuṇṇapuṇṇōdaēṇa tuha gharaṁgaṇamāgaō । jai
ēyassa cicchiṁ na karēsi tō niratthayaṁ tē vējjayaṁ । ” tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- " karēmi । kiṁtu na saṁti maha gharē ōsahāṇi । "
tēhi bhaṇiyaṁ -- " amhē mōllaṁ dēmō, kiṁ ōsahaṁ jāijjau ?” sō bhaṇai - " kaṁbalarayaṇaṁ gōsīsacaṁdaṇaṁ ca । taiyaṁ saya-
sahassapāgaṁ tēllaṁ taṁ puṇa maha gharē cēva atthi । tāhē tē maggiuṁ pavattā । āgamiyaṁ tēhiṁ jahā amugassa vuḍḍhavāṇiyagassa
atthi ēyāṇi dōṇi vi dunni lakkhā daviṇajāyassa ghēttūṇa gayā tē vaṇiyasagāsaṁ । sō vāṇiyagō bhai - - " kiṁ dēmi ?
tē bhaṇaṁti——“kaṁbalarayaṇaṁ gōsīsacaṁdaṇaṁ ca dēhi । sō vāṇiyagō bhaṇai - - ' ki imēhiṁ paōyaṇaṁ ?' tēhi bhaṇṇai - " sāhussa
kiriyā kāyavvā ।" tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "alāhi mama ēēṇa daviṇa jāēṇa, iharahā cēva gēṇhaha, karēha sāhussa ki riyaṁ, mama
vi dhammō hōutti sō vāṇiyaō citēi - - " jai tāva ēēsi bālattaṇē vaṭṭamāṇāṇaṁ ērisā saddhā dhammassa uvari, mama
maṁdapuṇṇassa puṇa ihalōgapaḍibaddhassa natthi ।

vimāṇaṁ viubvāhi viuvvittā khippāmēva ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccappiṇāhi ।” sō vi tahēva karēi । tassa ṇaṁ divvajāṇavimāṇassa'
tidisi tiṣṇi ti-sōvāṇa paḍirūvagā । tēsi ṇaṁ paḍirūvagāṇaṁ puraō pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ tōraṇē । tassa ṇaṁ jāṇavimāṇassa aṁtō
bahusamaramaṇijjē bhūmibhāgē siyā sē jahā nāmaē āliṁga-pukkharē i vā samakarayalē i vā āyaṁsamuhē i vā dīviya cammē i
vā aisamē paṇṇattē । sē ṇaṁ majjhabhāē aṇēgabhatticittēhi sacchāēhi sappabhēhi sassiriēhi saujjōēhiṁ suhaphāsēhi nāṇā-
vihapaṁcavaṇēhi maṇīhi uvasōhiē | tassa ṇaṁ bahusamabhūmibhāgassa majjhadēsabhāē ēttha ṇaṁ ēgē pēcchāgharamaṁḍavē
siyā । tassa ṇaṁ maṁḍavassa samaramaṇijjassa bhūmibhāgassa bahumajjhadēsabhāgaṁsi mahaṁ ēgā maṇipēḍhiyā siyā । aṭṭhajōyaṇāī
āyāma vikkhaṁbhēṇaṁ, cattāri jōyaṇāī bāhallēṇaṁ, savvamaṇimaī pāsāiyā darisaṇijjā abhikhyā paḍirūvā । tassuvara
mahēgē siṁhāsanē । savvarayaṇāmaē । tassuvari mahēṁgē vijayasē savvarayaṇāmaē । tassa majjhabhāē ēgē vairāmaē aṁkusē । ēttha
ṇaṁ mahēṁgē kuṁbhikkē muttādāmē । sē ṇaṁ aṇṇēhi tadaddhuccattappamāṇēhiṁ cauhi addhakubhikkēhi muttādāmēhiṁ savvaō samaṁtā
saṁparikhitē । tēṇaṁ dāmā tavaṇijja-laṁbūsagā suvaraṇa- patharaga-maṁḍiyā nāṇā- maṇi rayaṇa- viviha- hāradvahārauvasōhiyā isi
aṇṇamaṇṇama saṁpattā pugvāiēhi vāēhi maṁdaṁ maṁdaṁ ēijjamānā suisuhayarēṇaṁ cittanivvuikarēṇaṁ saddēṇaṁ tē paēsē āūrēmāṇā āūrē-
māṇā aīva aīva uvasōhēmāṇā - uvasōhēmāṇā ciṭṭhati । tassa ṇaṁ sīhāsaṇassa avaruttarēṇaṁ uttarēṇaṁ uttaraputthimēṇaṁ ēttha ṇaṁ
sakkassa caurāsīē sāmāṇiyasāhassīṇaṁ caurāsīibhahāsaṇasāhassīō puratthimēṇaṁ aṭṭhaṇhaṁ aggamahisīṇaṁ । ēvaṁ dāhiṇa-
puratthimēṇaṁ abhitaraparisāē duvālasaṇhaṁ dēvasāhassīṇaṁ । dāhiṇēṇaṁ majjhimāē cōṭsahaṁ dēvasāhassīṇaṁ, dāhiṇapaccatthimē gaṁ
bāhiraparisāē sōlasahaṁ dēvasāhassīṇaṁ, paccatthimēṇaṁ sattaṇhaṁ aṇiyāhivaīṇaṁ ।
taē ṇaṁ tassa sīhāsaṇassa caṁuddisiṁ caunhaṁ caurāsīṇaṁ āyarakkhadēvasāhassīṇaṁ । caurāsī bhaddāsapasāhassīō
hōtyā । taē ṇaṁ tē ābhiōgiyadēvā jahā iṭṭha savvaṁ kāūṇa sakkassa sāhiti । taē ṇaṁ sē saknē harisavasavisappamāṇa-
himaē divvaṁ jiṇidābhigamaṇajōggaṁ savvālaṁkāravibhūsiyaṁ uttaravēubviyaṁ rūvaṁ viuvvai viubvittā aṭṭhahi aggamahisīhi
saparivārāhiṁ naṭṭāṇīēṇaṁ gaṁdhavvāṇīēṇa ya saddhi taṁ vimāṇaṁ aṇuppayāhiṇī karēmāṇē puvvillēṇa tisōvāṇēṇaṁ paḍirūva-
gēṇaṁ duruhai duruhittā sīhāsaṇaṁsi puratthābhimuhē nisaṇṇē । taē ṇaṁ sāmāṇiyāṇa vi caurāsī sahassā uttarēṇaṁ tisōvāṇēṇa
duruhittā pattēyaṁ puvvannatthēsu bhaddāsaṇēsu nisīyaṁti । avasēsā dēvā ya dēvīō ya dāhiṇillēṇaṁ tisōvāṇēṇaṁ duruhittā puvva-
natthēsu bhaddāsasu pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ nisīyaṁti ।
taē ṇaṁ sakkassa taṁsi durūḍhassa dappaṇāiyā aṭṭamaṁgalagā puraō ahāṇupuvvīē saṁpatthiyā । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ bhigārachatta-
puṇṇa kalāiyā । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ jōyaṇasahassūsīē gagaṇatalamaṇulihaṁtē aṇēgakuḍabhiyāsaya sahassa parikkhittē divvē mahiṁdajjhaē ।
tayaṇaṁtaraṁ' surūvanēvatthaparihatthiyavēsā savvālaṁkāravibhūsiyā paṁcaaṇiyā paṁcaaṇiyā hivaiṇōṁ । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ bahavē abhiōgiyā
dēvā ya dēvīō ya saēhiṁ saēhi rūvēhi, saēhiṁ saēhi balēhi saēhiṁ saēhiṁ niōgēhiṁ sakkaṁ dēvidaṁ puraō maggaō pāsaō
ahāṇupuvvī saṁpaṭṭiyā । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē tēṇaṁ paṁcāṇiyaparikkhittēṇaṁ puraō pakaḍḍhijjamāṇēṇaṁ mahiṁdajjhaēṇaṁ aṭṭhahi aggamahisīhi
saparivārāhi naṭṭāṇīēṇaṁ gaṁdhavvāṇīēṇaṁ caurāsīē sāmaṇiyasāhassīhiṁ cauguṇāēṁ caurāsīē āyarakkhadēvasāhassīṇaṁ
tāyattisagāē dēvāṇaṁ aṇṇāhi ya sōhammakappavāsidēvāṇaṁ ya dēvīṇa ya bahūhiṁ kōḍīhiṁ saddhi saṁparivuḍē savvāē iḍḍhīē
savvēṇaṁ balēṇaṁ savvēṇaṁ parakkamēṇaṁ divvuttaranināēṇaṁ phōḍatē aṁbaratalaṁ sōhammakappassa majjhaṁ majjhēṇaṁ taṁ divvaṁ dēviḍiṭa
uvadaṁsēmāṇē uvadaṁsēmāṇē jēṇēva sōhammassa uttarillē nijjāṇamaggē tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvagacchittā jōyaṇasayasāhassiē hi
viggahēhi ōvayamāṇē ya vīīvayamāṇē ya tāē ukkiṭṭhāē divvāē dēvagaīē vīīvayamāṇē vīīvayamāṇē tiriyamasaṁ-

ubaṭṭhavēha ।" tē vi tahēva uvaṭṭhavēṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē sakkē titthayarassa cauddisiṁ cattāri dhavalavasabhē viubvēi sēē saṁkha-

taō tēṇa bhagavayā lōgahiyāē cauvvihō rāyasaṁgahō kaō । taṁ jahā uggā bhōgā rāinnā khattiyā । jēsi uggā
daṁḍanī tē uggā ārakkhiyapurisā । bhōgā nāma jē piitthāṇīyā accatamāṇaṇijjā sāmissa ।। rāinnā jē sāmiṇō
samāvayā । avasēsā savvē khattiyā । tēsi lōyāṇa vōcchinnēsu kappapāyavēsu paḍhamaṁ kaṁdāī āhārō āsi, pacchā tammi ajīraṁtē
tē usahaṁ uvaṭṭhāyaṁti bhāṁti ya - " jahā amha na jīraī ।" tāhē sāmī bhagai - " hatthēhi malittā bāhiriyaṁ challi
avaṇittā āhārēha । tē vi tahēva kāumāradvā । kaḍhiṇattaṇaō ōsahīṇaṁ ēvaṁ pi ajīraṁgā । puṇō vi sāmī uvaṭṭiyā ।

vittā pacchā āhārēha ।” kēṇa kāraṇēṇa bhayavaṁ aggī na upāēi ? sāmī jāṇai - jayā ēgaṁtaniddhō kālō havai tayā
aggī na uṭṭhēi, ēgaṁta rukkhēṇaṁ' vina, uṭṭhēi jayā vēmāyāē niddhalukkhō bhavai tathā aggī uṭhēḍa । tēṇa sāmī ariṁga na
uṭṭhāvēi। iō ya kālasahāvēṇa rukkha saṁghaṁsēṇa aggī uṭṭhāiō, tāhē sō aggī bhūmi pattō, jāṇi tattha sukka-taṇa-patta-
kaṭṭu -kayavarāṇi tāṇi dahiumāraddhō, tāhē tē maṇuyā taṁ accanbhuyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa taō huttā pahāviyā । tāhē ima । ṇi rayaṇāṇi
tti tē tāṇi gihiumāraddhā jāhē dajjhati tāhē pacchāhuttā saraṁti bhayabhīyā samāṇā āgaṁtūṇa usabhasāmissa sāhēti ।
usō bhai-pāsēsu vilaggiūṇa imassa paripēratēsu taṇa-kaṭṭhāiyaṁ savvaṁ phēḍēha । tēhiṁ vi tahēva kathaṁ । uvasaṁtō aggī । sō
aggī bhagavaō uvaēsēṇa tēhi gahiō । bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ -- "pāgaṁ karēha । tē na jāṇaṁti kiha pāgōṁ kī rai ? taō' ōsahīō
aggammi chuti, aggī vi ḍahai । taō tē puṇō vi usahaṁ uvaṭṭiyā | bhāṁti -- “ sō savvaṁ apaṇā khāi' na amhaṁ kiṁpi dēi ।
bhagavaṁ bhaṇai-maṭṭiyā piṁḍaṁ āṇēha । tē gayā । bhagavaṁdhi gayavarāruḍhō nagarāō nīi । ētyaṁtarē tēhi maṭṭiyā piṁḍō uvaṇīō । tāhē
bhagavayā kuṁbhi - kuṁbhatthalē kāūṇa darisiyaṁ pattayaṁ । bhaṇiyā ya ēyārisāṇi kāūṇa ēēsu ōsahīō chōḍhūṇa payaha । tēhi vi

kuṁbhakārā utpannā ।

tihuyaṇalaggaṇakhaṁbhō atulabalaparakkamō mahāsattō । niruvakkamāuō taha maraṇaṁ taṁ tēṇa nō pattō
sammattanāṇacaraṇā nivvāṇapasāhagā suē bhaṇiyā । tāṇāhārō dēhō dēhāhārō ya āhārō
asaṇāipayāṇēṇaṁ pīiṁ jō jaṇai jai jaṇassēha । sō paralōē pāvai pīīō pīvaratarīō ।। 1203 ।।
taṁ suṇiya jaṇō savvō haṭṭupahaṭṭō paṇaṭṭa- avivēō । niya niya ṭhāṇēsu gaō sējjaṁsapasaṁsaṇāsattō ।। 1204॥
saṁsārammi asārē sārō sējjaṁsa ! tujjha parajambhō । jēṇa taē paḍhamaguru paḍhamaṁ pārāviō usabhō ।।1205।।
bahupunnapāvaṇijjaṁ risahajiṇō varisadhāraṇē pattaṁ । ikkhurasō varadāṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ navahiṁ kōḍīhi ।। 1206 ॥
sējjasō puṇa dāyā aṇusamayavisujjhamāṇapariṇāmō । ēvaṁvihasāmaggī punnēhi viṇā na saṁpaḍai ।। 1207 ।।
pattē vipattē sulahaṁ na vittaṁ, vittē vi pattē na huēi cittaṁ । tiṇhaṁ pi jastai ha havējja jōgō, subuddhimaṁ sōcci puṇṇavatō ।।1208 ||

saṁtaṁ bajjhamaṇiccaṁ pattē pattammi jō na viyarijjā | sō tucchaō varāō sīlaṁ kaha duddharaṁ dharihī ।।1209 ॥

tēlōkka raṁgamajjhē sējjasēgaṁ surāsurasamakkhaṁ । gahiyā dāṇapaḍāgā pārāviyajiṇavaraṁ paḍhamaṁ ।। 1211 । ।

yata uktaṁ-
kāryāśirā iva gūḍhaṁ prathamata unmōcayanti tē viralāḥ । kaṁ kata kadaṁta kā iva labdhaprasarāḥ tatō tu dhanāḥ ।। 1213 ।।
dēmitti maṇē tuṭṭhō । payāṇa kālē vi samahiyaṁ tuṭṭhō । dinē vi paramatuṭṭhī jāyā sējjaṁsakumarassa ।। 1214 ।।
nāraya - tiriya - narāmaragaīṇa dinnō jalaṁjalī tēṇa । pakkhittā tassa galē siddhi puraṁdhīē varamālā || 1215 ।।
ahariyacitāmaṇikāmadhēṇu, kappadumōvamamaṇagdhuṁ । mōkkha tarubīyakappaṁ supattadāṇaṁ jaē jayai ।।1216 ।।
bhavaṇaṁ dhaṇēṇa bhuvaṇaṁ jasēga bhayavaṁ rasēṇa nivvaviō । appā nirūvamasōkkhē supattadāṇaṁ mahagghaviyaṁ ॥ 1217॥
risasa rasamapattaṁ niravajjaṁ khōyarasasamaṁ dāṇaṁ । sēyaṁ samō bhāvō havējja jai maggiyaṁ hōi ।। 1218 ।।
bhagavaṁ pi pāraṇagaṁ kāūṇa niggaō sējjaṁsamaṁdirāō । sējjaṁsō vi bhagavaṁ jattha ṭhiō paḍilābhiō tāṇi
payāṇi mā pāhiṁ ahamaṇṇō vā akkamijjatti bhattīē tattha rayaṇāmayaṁ pēḍhaṁ kārāvēi bhattibahumāṇahayahiyaō tisaṁjhaṁ
ca pavarapupphaīhiṁ acciṇai । visēlēga ya dēsakālē savisēsaṁ pūrvaūṇa bhuṁjai । lōgō pucchai - " kimēyaṁ ? ti ।" sējjaṁsō
bhaṇai - āigaramaṁḍalaṁ'ti taō lōgēṇa vi jattha jattha bhagavaṁ ṭhiō tattha tattha pēḍhaṁ kayaṁ । taṁ ca kālēna āiccapēḍhaṁ jāyaṁ ।
bhayavaṁ pi gayauranayarāō takkhasilaṁ gaō । bāhubalī tattha rāyā । suā tēṇa niyapurisēhitō - bhagavaṁ samāgaō ।
citiyamaṇēṇa -- 'saṁpayaṁ samāsannō paōsō । kallaṁ savviḍḍhīē tahā vaṁdēmi jahā na kēṇai vaṁdiō । ēvaṁ kayapaṇihāṇō
mahāsāmariṁga paṛa tōraviyaniyaparivārō suhasaṁkaṣpanisāyarakaraniyarasaṁgasaṁkhōhiyamaṇamayaraharō pattō vāsabhavaṇapavarapallaṁkē
bāhubali narāhivō । aṇēgasaṁkaṣpaviyappasamāulamāṇasassa cirēṇa samāgayā niddā । pabhāē paḍibuddhō samāṇō balavāuyaṁ
samāhūya ēvaṁ vayāsī — "khippāmēva bhō dēvāṇuppiyā ! haya-gaya-raha- paurapāyattāṇīya saṁruddhamahīmaṁḍalaṁ cāuraṁgiṇī sēṇṇaṁ
paṇī karēha ।' sō vi tahēva karēttā tamāṇattiyaṁ paccappiṇaḥ । taō nayarārakkhiyapurisē samāisai - "khippāmēva bhō !
takkhasilaṁ nayariṁ siṁghāḍaga-tiya- caukka caccara- caummha mahāpaha-pahēsu āsiyasaṁmajjivalittaṁ kālāgaru-pavara-kuṁdurukka-
turukkaḍajjhatagaṁdhuddhayābhirāmaṁ paibhavaṇanibaddha-tōraṇaṁ ubhayapāsa vimukkacaṁdaṇa- cacciya- kalasaṁ, vihiya vivihahaṭṭasōhaṁ,
maṁcāimaṁcakaliyaṁ samaṁtaō karēha kārāvēha ya karēttā ya ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccaṣpiṇaha ।" tē vi tahēva kāūṇa paccappiti ।
taō sahāvēttā mahallaē bhagai -- "khippāmēva bhō ! vasaṁtasiripamuhamaṁtēuraṁ hāyaṁ kayabalikambhaṁ, vihiyapavaraṁgarāgaṁ paṁcavanna-
vivihakusubhōvasōhiyaṁ, hā radvahārāiṇā tilayacōdasamēṇaṁ āharaṇēṇa virāiyaṁ niyatthavaravatthaṁ bhagavaō vaṁdaṇanimittaṁ pauṇaṁ
karēha । tē vi tahēva kāūṇa nivēyaṁti । taō appaṇā vhāyavilittō appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrō gahiyavaranēvacchō
niuttapurisaḍhōiyaṁ jayapuṁjagaṁdhavāraṇaṁ samārūḍhō । taō samakālasamāhayāṇa vajjāujjasaddabahiriyabaṁbhaṁḍa bhaṁḍōdarō māgaha-
jaṇajaṇiyajayajayārāvabharibhūmaṁḍalō savvēṇaṁ balēṇaṁ savvēṇaṁ aṁtēurēṇaṁ savvāē riddhīē sabvāē sāmaggīē savvēṇaṁ purajaṇa-
samudaṇaṁ takkhasilaṁ nayariṁ majjhaṁ majjhaṇaṁ bhagavaō vaṁdaṇavaḍiyāē niggaō sunaṁdānaṁdaṇō ।

pattō nayarujjāṇaṁ bāhubalī bahujaṇēṇa pariyariō । jayapuṁjakuṁjarā uttinnō takkhaṇā cēva ।। 1219 ॥

mūḍhamaṇēṇaṁ kammamahāvāhigahiyadēhēṇaṁ । gharamāgayā na diṭṭhā mahōsahī maṁdapunnēṇaṁ ।। 1238 ।
hiyaicchiyakappataru acitacitāmaṇī mahāsattō । gharamāgaō vi na mayā usahō jagabaṁdhavō diṭṭhī ।।1239 ।।
nayā niratthayā mē jēhiṁ na diṭṭhōsi tihuyaṇānaṁda । pāyā vi akajjakarā gaṁtūṇa na vaṁdiō jēhi ।।1240 ।।

dēvō ya dāṇavō vā sāhaṁkāraṁ suṇē vi maha vayaṇaṁ । jai kuviō khamau mahaṁ paṇayapiyā jēṇa sappurisā ।। 1250 ।।

144
jugāijidi-cariyaṁ
na gati guruṁ na namaṁti dēvayaṁ na ya muṇaṁti suhisayaṇaṁ । pīyamaira vva mattā bhamaṁti vihalaṁghalasarīrā ।। 1259 ।।
guṇiṇō vi huṁti viguṇā caṁcalalacchīē saṁgayā purisā । viguṇāṇa puṇō maraṇaṁ jaṁna kuṇai taṁ mahacchariyaṁ ।। 1260।।
synnā vihu vinaḍai avivēijaṇaṁ ? jaṇāṇa majjhammi । appaḍipunnāē puṇa viḍaṁbaṇā caiva lacchīē || 1261॥
kō muṇai tāṇa saṁkhaṁ narāṇa lacchīē jē chalijjaṁti । saṁtā vi jēhiṁ lacchī chaliyā tē ēkka dō tinni ।। 1262 ।।
jammō tāṇa gaṇijjai sukayatthaṁ jīviyaṁ jaē tāṇa । jē pāviūṇa lacchi ucchēyaṁ nēva gacchati ।। 1263।।
bhāviyajiṇavayaṇatthā appakasāyā pamāyapurihīṇā । garuē vi vihavasārē nirahaṁkārā mahāsattā ।। 1264 ।।
jaṁ puṇa bhayavaṁ na vaṁdiō na tattha khēō kāyavvō bhāvēṇaṁ vaṁdiō caiva daduvvō । kiṁ ca bahuvigghāṇi sēyavatthūṇi
havaṁti । visēsaō tihuyaṇaguruṇō sayalajayajīva - nikkāraṇabaṁdhuṇō jaṁgamatitthassa jugāititthayarassa pāyavaṁdaṇaṁ jaṁ ca tumaē
citiyaṁ tahā pabhāē vaṁdissaṁ । jahā na kēṇai vaṁdiō ēyaṁ dina saṁgayaṁ mahāpurisāṇa ēsa | mahārāya ! riddhimaō
ihalōgē vi pāṇiṇaṁ mahāṇatthaparaṁparāhēū jahā pavaṇapōyavaṇiṇō riddhimayaparihārō puṇa ihalōgē vi kallāṇakāraṇaṁ jahā
pavaṇakē uṇō । rāiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " kō ēsa pavaṇapōō ? kō vā pavaṇakēū ? " maṁtiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ - "suṇau dēvō ।"
pavaṇapōyakahā--
atha iva tumha nayarīē aṇēgadhaṇakōḍīsarō pavaṇapōō nāmavaṇiō । tassa ṇaṁ laliya vva lēliyacariyā rūvāi
guṇagaṇaviṇijjiyaraīparamaraīkāraṇaṁ pāṇēhitō vi piyā dhaṇasirī nāma diyā । sā puṇa aviyāurī avaccaduhaduhiyā
kālaṁ gamēi ।
annamma dinē tamaṁdhayārāē rayaṇīē vāsabhavaṇapallaṁkāō niruddhapaya-ravā ujjāṇaṁ pai patthiyā dhaṇasirī ।
pavaṇapōō vi bhaviyavvayā niōēṇa vibuddhō । kahi ēsā gacchara ?" tti saṁkiyahiyaō saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ alakkhiō
cēva tayaṇumaggēṇa caliō । sā vi gharujjāṇaṁ gaṁtūṇa sahayārapāyavamārūḍhā baddhō uttarijjēṇa kaṁdharāē pāsaō । tayaṇu-
sahayārasāhāē baṁdhiūṇa mannubharabhariyamāṇasā sagaggara- rakkharaṁ ēvaṁ bhaṇiumāḍhattā - - " bhō bhagavaīō vaṇadēvayāō ! laddhō
maē āsaṁghiyapēmaguṇō samasuhasuhiō dhaṇaō vva aparimiyadhaṇō pavaṇapōyasarisō daiō, paraṁ gimhayālaravikiraṇāvalī
va daha dēhaṁ niravaccayā tā taha karējjaha jahā jammaṁtarē vi pavaṇapōō cēva piō havai na uṇa niravaccattaṇaṁ tti ।"
bhaṇiūṇa mukkō appā । ētyaṁtarē " hā ! kimēyaṁ ? ti bhaṇatō vēgēṇa samāgaō pavaṇapōō । chinnō churiyāē tēṇa
pāsaō । saṁvāhiyā kaṁdharā satthāvatthānīyā niyagharaṁ । bhaṇiyā ya - "suṁdari ! kimēyaṁ taē mahāsāhasamaṇuṭṭhiyaṁ ?" sā
vi bāhāvilalōyaṇā thōramuttāhalapamāṇa- nayaṇaṁsusaṁsittavacchatthalā dharaṇiyalanihiyalōlalōyaṇā niruddhasaddaṁ ruyai cēva na
uṇa paḍivayaṇaṁ viyarai । taō sēṭṭiṇā kaha kaha vi saṁṭhavēūṇa bhaṇiyā- "piē! na visāō kāyavvō tahā jaissaṁ
jahā tē avaccasaṁpattī havai ।" dhaṇasirīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- " nāha ! natthēttha tuha dōsō jammaṁtarakayāṇi nikammāṇi cēva
pāṇiṇaṁ avarajjhaṁ ti jaṁ tumaṁ pi maha puttapaōyaṇē udāsīṇō ciya lakkhīyasi । kayanicchaē tumammi kiṁ na sijjhai ?
pavaṇapōēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ---" piē! ayāṇuyā tumaṁ jā ēvaṁ palavasi, majjha vi ēsa niravaccayā vaṇakaṭu-samubbhavō daha dēhaṁ
sōyānalō paramappaḍiyārē vihivilasiyammi ki bahuṇā paridēviēṇa ? taha vi jai tē ēsa nibbaṁdhō tā mahāsāhasaṁ
kiṁ pikāūṇa tahā karissaṁ jahā tē maṇōrahasaṁpattī havai । avi ya-
daṁtaggē ।
gurudussahajāla samāulammi jalaṇē havi vva huṇiūṇa । adhpāṇaṁ taha vi maē tuha puttō suyaṇu ! kāyavvō ।। 1265 ।।
aigāḍharūḍhadāḍhafggabhaggatiyasi dadaṁti
pucchacchōḍaṇacāliyagurugirivarasiharapabbhārē ॥। 1266॥
saha- kisōra ṭhiyaṁ sarayaghaṇē vijjulaṁ va kuladēvi । ārāhiūṇa tāraṁ kāyavvō taha vi tē puttō ॥ 1267॥
iya niyaiṇa vayaṇaṁ sōūṇa dhaṇasirī pasannamaṇā । calaṇajuyalammi paḍiyā mahāpasāō tti bhaṇiūṇa ।। 1268 ।।
taō paṇapōēṇa pāraddhā dēvayāṇa pūyā । visēsā icchiyāṇi vivihōvāiyāṇi sēviyā maṁta-taṁta-viyāṇagā ।
taha vi na jāyā kajjasiddhī । taō avalaṁbiyasāhasassa vihiyabalivihāṇassa saṁgahiyarattacaṁdaṇaratakaṇavīrakusumassa

sakkārēūṇa visajjiyā dēvayā । appaṇā vi siddhakajjō gharaṁ gaō । sāhiō savvō vi dēvayā pariōsaha ralābha-

gaya-sīha-vaggha- haya-vasaha - narajuyaṁ rahavaraṁ samārūḍhō । jō vaccai sumiṇaṁ tē puhaīē hōi sō rāyā ।। 1270 ।।
karinarapāsa yatthō jalahi pāūṇa jō u bujjhējjā । taha cēva sō vi rāyā hōi phuḍaṁ jāirahiō vi ।। 1271 । ।
dhavalagaīdārūḍhō taḍāgasīsammi sāli - dahikūraṁ । jō bhuṁjai sō vi phuḍaṁ naranāhō hōi puhaīē ।। 1272 ॥

timiṇō āmaṁ maṁsaṁ pāyāīsu taha narāṇa khāyaṁtō । paḍibujjhai paṁcasaē pāvai sīsammi jā rajjaṁ
aininnakūvajalasaṁcayāō āruhai jō thalaṁ purisō । bhayarahiō sō vaḍḍhai mēhāguṇadhāraṇāīhi ।।

puvvuttarāē baccas disāē jō vasahasaṁgaē jāṇē । icchiyamatthaṁ pāvai sō purisō jīvalōgammi
pajjaliyanagaramaṁdirasē laggasirammi saṁṭhiō buddhō । sumiṇammi hōi rāyā vayaṇamiṇaṁ bhaddabāhussa

aṁgōvaṁgasaṇāhaṁ naharōmavivajjiyaṁ sarīraṁ tu । sumiṇammi jassa vaṭṭaī sō lacchiṁ lahai daiyaṁ ca

nēhābhaṁgē rōgō dhaṇanāsō hōī daṁtapaḍaṇammi । siṁgilladāṛhivānarasaṁtāsē bhayaṁ khu naravaiṇō ।। 1291 ।।
