rāīē taīyajāmē taiē māsammi kuṇai suhamasuhaṁ । gōsammi dasāhēṇaṁ diṭṭhī sumiṇaṁ phalaṁ dēi ।।1302 ।।
vāillā pittillā bahucitā bahusilēsayā purisā । pēcchaṁti jē u sumiṇē vi tahēvi hu tē viyāṇijjā ।। 1303 ||
samadhāū dhammarayā parimiyacitā ya jē jiyā hōṁti । pāēṇa tāṇa sumiṇā vi muṇiya atyaṁ pasārhēti ।। 1304 ||
daṭhṭhē suṁdarasumiṇē jiṇida-kaha- vāvaḍō nisalēuṁ । pacchā phalabhariyakarō guruṇa sāhijja viṇaēṇa ।। 1305 ।।
nihaṁ puṇō pavajjasu sumiṇē daṭṭhūṇa maṁgulē kaha vi । jiṇasāhu saṁthaṇaṇavaṁ daṇakāussaggāṇi ya karējjā ।। 1306॥
sattī kuṇasu tavaṁ jiṇidaṇhavaṇaṁ ca sāhupūyaṁ ca । dussamiṇā vi susumiṇā hōṁti phuṅa dhammanirayāṇa ।। 1307 ।।
iī saṁkhēvēṇa imaṁ sudarasūmiṇāṇa maṁgulāṇaṁ ca । kahiyaṁ phalaṁ maē tuha vittharaōnnattha jāṇējjā ।।1308।।
taō sammāṇiūṇa puṣphaphalāīhi dāūṇa daviṇajāyaṁ visijjiō sumiṇasatthapāḍhagō । pamuiyamāṇasā gabhamuvvahaṁtī
diṇāṇi aivāi dhaṇasirī । uciyasamaē pasūyā dārayaṁ kayaṁ mahāvaddhāvaṇayaṁ । suhi-saṁyaṇasamakkhaṁ mahāmahūsavēṇa samaē
paṭṭāviyaṁ nāma 'hārappahō' tti । iō ya pēsiyā pavaṇapōēṇa nāṇāvihabhaṁḍabhariyā cattāri mahāpōyā । dunniṁ suvaṇṇa-
dīvē dunni rayaṇadīvē । kaivayamāsēhi samāgaō suvaṇṇadīvāō ēgō paccaiyapuirisō | annapavahaṇēṇa pucchiyā pavaṇapōēṇaṁ
niyapōyapattī । tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ pattāṇi khēmēṇa vikkiyaṁ bhaṁḍaṁ gahiyaṁ paḍibhaṁḍaṁ bhariyā dō vi pōyā suvannamayaiṭṭagāṇaṁ ।
ahaṁ pi kusalanivēyaṇaṭṭā pēsiō । taṁ muṇiya pavaṇapōyassa bhariō uyaratibhāgō sirisamutthasāmavāyassa । puṇō vi kaivaya-
digēhiṁ samāgaō bīyasurisō rayaṇadīvāō । tēṇa vi pavaṇapōyapucchiēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- “ sāmi ! pattāṇi kusalēṇaṁ rayaṇadīvaṁ
dō vi jāṇavattāṇi jāō kayavikkaō bhariyāṇi nāṇāviharayaṇāṇaṁ kaivayadiṇamajjhē āgamissaṁti ।" taṁ muṇiya pūriō
bīō bhāgō vi pavaṇapōyapōdr̥ssa sāmavāēṇa ।
annamma diṇē viyasiyavayaṇāē baddhāviō bīyaputtajammēṇa harisiyābhihāṇāē gharadāsīē । taṁ suṇiya bhariyaṁ savvaṁ
pi pōṭṭaṁ sāmavāyassa । taō pamhuṭṭhō appāsirisamutthāhaṁkāracōrēṇa avahariyaṁ maṇarayaṇaṁ mahāgahagahiō viva asamaṁjasāṇi
palaviumārō |
bhō dhaṇaya ! bhaṇasu savvaṁ payaḍāō tujjha savvariddhīō । jai pavaṇapōyasarisō diṭṭhō puhaīē dhaṇavatō ।। 1309 ।।

jaha jaha vaḍḍhai vivō taha taha dhīrā namaṁti savisēsaṁ । jaha jaha namaṁti taha taha vihavō vi samaggalī hōi ।। 13
lacchīē aṇucchēō uciyapavittī pahāṇaviṇaō ya । rūvēṇa samaṁ sīlaṁ jai labbhai pavaṇakēmmi ।। 1345 ।।
bhuvaṇōvayāradutthiyadēhā avagaṇiyagaruyaniyakajjā । na ṇu pavaṇakēusarisā purisā mahi maṁḍalē viralā ।। 1346 ।।
jē pavaṇakēusarisā tē thōvā pavaṇapōyasarisāṇa । ṭhāṇē ṭhāṇē naravara narāṇa pōyā bharijjati ॥ 1347 ||
vaḍṁtu chēyatamaṁdhayāraviṇiyavivēyaujjōvō | taṁ natthi jaṁ na jaṁpai purisō lacchīē vēlaviō ।। 1348 । ।
vattavvamavattavvaṁ kajjamakajjaṁ na yāṇaī mūḍhō । vēsā iva lacchīē kammaṇakārīē kammaṇiō ।। 1349 । ।
guṇarayaṇaharaṇadacchī lacchī saguṇē vi nigguṇē kuṇaṛa । viguṇēsu gayā maraṇaṁ jaṁ na kuṇai taṁ mahacchariyaṁ ।। 1350 ।।
mā vaha kōi gavvaṁ guṇēhi vivēhiṁ maha samō natthi । garuyāṇa vi jaṁ garuyā guṇiṇō dhaṇiṇō ya dīsaṁti ।। 1351 ।।
garuē vi vihavasārē nirahaṁkārēṇa hōi hōyavvaṁ । jaha pavaṇakēuṇā taha narēṇa appahiyakāmēṇa ।। 1352 ।।
sōūṇa imaṁ vayaṇaṁ bāhubalī bhaṇai saccamēvēyaṁ । icchāmi pavaṇakēuṁ kēṇa vi kajjēṇa daṭṭumahaṁ ।। 1353 ।।

ēyaṁ suṇiya saddāviō maṁtiṇā dōvāriō bhaṇiō ya - " arē ! lahuṁ gaṁtūṇa bhaṇasu pavaṇakēuṁ jahā - akayakāla-

।
kālē nissa paṇayassa agghō na tīraē kāuṁ । tassēva athakkapaṇāmiyassa giṇhaṁtayā natthi ।। 1473 ।।
kālammi kīramāṇaṁ kisikammaṁ bahuphalaṁ jahā hōi । iya dāṇaṁ pi hu kālē dijjaṁtaṁ bahuphalaṁ hōi ।। 1474 ।।
bhannai saṁkhēvēṇaṁ bhāvavisuddhaṁ pi saṁpayaṁ dāṇaṁ । jō saddhā suddhamaṇō aṭṭhamayadvāṇaparihīṇō ।। 1475 ।।
kayakiccaṁ mannatō appāṇaṁ jaṁ maē supattāṇaṁ । dinnaṁ dāṇaṁ saṁpai pattaṁ dhaṇa - jammasāphalaṁ ।। 1476।।
ditassa jassa gihiṇa bhāvā ēvaṁvihā maṇē huṁti । taṁ hōi bhāvasuddhaṁ dāṇaṁ kammakkhayanimittaṁ ।। 1477।।
saṁpai sīlaṁ bhannai paṁcāsavaviramaṇā iō dhammō । ājammaniraiyārō daṁḍanti ya viraipajjatō ।। 1478 ।।
pāṇavaha-musāvāō adatta- mēhuṇa - pariggahāraṁbhō । paṁcāsavā imē khalu pannattā titthanāhēhiṁ ।। 1479 ।।
paḍhamaṁ khalu sīlaṁgaṁ jā jīvadayā asēsajīvāṇaṁ । ēgidiya - bēiṁdiya-tiya- cau-paṁcidiyāṇaṁ ca ।। 1480 ।।
suhumassa-bāyarassa ya jāvajjīvāē aliyavayaṇassa । jā viṇivittī nicca bīyaṁ sīlaṁgamēyaṁ tu ।। 1481।।
jā jīvaṁ jō sāhū taṇamēttaṁ pi hu na giṇhai adattaṁ । sō dattādāṇakayaṁ pāvaṁ na kayāi baṁdhēi । । 1482 ।
navabaṁbhaguttiguttō maṇa-vai-kāēhiṁ cayai juvaīō । tiri-maṇu-surīō sō khalu cautthasīlaṁgavaṁ purisō ।। 1483 ।।
jō saṁtōsanisannō pariharai pariggahaṁ pahāpāvaṁ । sō na pariggahajaṇiyaṁ kiliṭṭhakammaṁ samajjiṇai ।। 1484 ।।
phāsāiiṁdiyāṇaṁ kupahapayaṭṭāṇa kuṇai jō rōhaṁ । kōmalaphāsē na mahai na ya dūsai kakkasē phāsē ।। 1485 ।।
jēṇa niruddhaṁ luddhaṁ rasaṇaṁ rasa- laṁpaḍaṁ payaṭṭaṁtaṁ । sō jibbhim̐diyajaṇiyaṁ pāvaṁ na kayāi saṁciṇai ।। 1486 ।।
jō na suyaṁdhē rāgaṁ na vi dōsaṁ jāi durabhigaṁdhammi । bhāvai vatthusahāvaṁ jittaṁ ghāṇidiyaṁ tēṇa ॥। 1487।।
da suṁdarāī ruvāi na jāi tēsu aṇurāgaṁ । iyarēsu vi na vi rōsaṁ vasīkayaṁ tēṇa niyacakkhuṁ ॥। 1488 ।।
jō na vi baccai rāyaṁ na vi rāyaṁ maō ya kakkasa - sarēsu । sōiṁdiyābhihāṇaṁ sīlaṁgaṁ nimmalaṁ tassa ।। 1489 ।।
iya paṁcidiyaniggaharūvaṁ sīlaṁ maē samakkhāyaṁ । saṁpai kasāyavisayaṁ sīlaṁgaṁ saṁpavakkhāmi ।। 1490 ।।
khaṁti-salilēṇa sittō pajalaṁtō kōhavaṇadavō jēṇa । sō pasamasirisamēō appaparasuhāvahō hōi ।। 1491 ।।
bhaṁjatō dhammavaṇaṁ aṭṭhamayadvāṇamāṇamattagaō । jō maddavaṁkusēṇaṁ kuṇas vasē tassa sīlaṁgaṁ ।। 1492 ।
1. bahuphalaṁ pā0 ।

siririsahasāmibaṇṇaṇaṁ
māyāvaṁsakuḍaṁgī aḍguvilagaruyadōsasayamūlaṁ । ajjava kuhāḍaēṇaṁ jō chiṁdai । tassa sīlaṁgaṁ ।। 1493 ।।
icchāvasavaṭṭaṁtō lōhamahāsāgarō aiduraṁtō । saṁtōsataraṁḍēṇaṁ jō taraī tassa sīliṁgaṁ ।। 1494 ।।
bhaṇiōkasāyavijiō tidaṁḍavijayaṁ pi saṁpayaṁ bhaṇimō । maṇa vayaṇa kāyadaṁḍā dupattā dukkhasayahēū ।। 1495 ।।
maṇadaṁḍō jhāyaṁtō aṭṭavasaṭṭāī aṭṭarōddāī | sammaṁ niraṁbhiyavvō buhēṇa saddhammajhāṇēṇa ॥। 1496 ।।
vāyādaṁḍō duvvayaṇapharusapēsunnadudruvayaṇēhiṁ । dumitō sayalajaṇaṁ vivēiṇā niggahēyavvō ।। 1497 ।।
anivāriyappayārō kāō tattāyagōlasāricchō । sammaṁ saṁjamiyavvō asaṁjamē saṁpayaṭṭaṁtō ॥। 1498 ।।
sīmaō vi ya dhammō bhaṇiō sattarasabhēyasaṁbhinnō । saṁpai puṇa saṁkhēvō tavō vi sīlaṁ tayaṁ suṇaha ।। 1499 ।।
sō puṇa hōi dubhēō bāhiraabhitarō jahā kamasō । bāhiraō chanbhēō abhitaraō vi chanbhēō ।। 1500 ।।
aṇasaṇamūṇōyariyā vittīsaṁkhēvaṇaṁ rasaccāō । kāyakilēsō saṁlīṇayā ya bajjhō tavō hōi ।। 1501 ।।
pāyacchittaṁ viṇaō vēyāvaccaṁ tahēva sajjhāō। jhāṇaṁ ussaggō vi ya abhitaraō tavō hōi ।। 1502 ।।
aṇasaṇakaraṇaṁ duvihaṁ ittiriyaṁ cēva āvakahiyaṁ ca । cau chaṭṭha aṭṭamāī paḍhamaṁ bīyaṁ tu jā jīvaṁ ।। 1503 ।।
bhaṇiō aṇasaṇamaiō bajjhatavō saṁpayaṁ puṇa bhaṇāmi । ūṇōyariyaṁ bīyaṁ aṇēgabhēyaṁ samāsēṇa ।। 1504 ।।
dattahiṁ vicittāhi kavalēhi ya paṁca aṭṭhamāīhiṁ । bhaṇiyā ūṇōyariyā dhīrēhiṁ anaṁtanāṇīhi ।। 1505 ।।
ēgammi gharē dōhiuṁ jaṁ laddhaṁ ajja tēṇa sāricchaṁ । vittīsaṁkhēvatavō ēsō saṁkhēvaō bhaṇiō ।। 1506 ।।
khīrāī vigaīō mahu-makkhaṇa- majja- maṁsavajjāō । ēgaṁ va dō vi giṇhai asaṁtharē na uṇa savvāō ।। 1507 ।।
viviharasaṁ ākaṁṭhaṁ bhuttamudīrēi mōhamahajaiṇō । mōhēṇa mōhiō puṇa kahaṁ akajjē na vaṭṭihihī ।। 1508 । ।
bhanna kāyakilēsō aṇhāṇaṁ bhūmisayaṇasiralāō । paḍimākaraṇaṁ cittaṁ ṭhāṇā vīrāsaṇāīyā ।। 1509 ।।
bhaṇi kāya kalēsō saṁpai saṁlīṇayaṁ nisāmēha । kajjēṇa viṇā kummō vva hōjja savvaṁgasaṁlīṇō ।। 1510 ।।
bhaṇiō saṁkhēvēṇaṁ chabbhēō bāhirō ta visēsō । abhitaraṁ pi saṁpai tavaṁ nisāmēha chabbhēyaṁ ।। 1511 ।।
na kayaṁ āgamavayaṇaṁ nāṇāisu jaṁ na vaḍḍhiyaṁ sammaṁ । tattha u pāyacchittaṁ kāyavvaṁ attasuddhikaē ।। 1512 । ।
appā jāṇai sammaṁ appā appēṇa vaṁciō hōi । jai na kuṇai pacchittaṁ appā appassa sahi sattū ॥ 15
jaṇaraṁjaṇēṇa māyā dhammō puṇa appasakkhiō suddhō । jaṁ appā pāvamalaṁ karēi taṁ dhuyai pacchittaṁ ।। 1514।।
viṇaō bhaṇṇai iṇhi daṁsaṇanāṇē ya taha ya cāritē । arahaṁtē ya pavayaṇē thēra- gilāṇē tavassīsu ।। 1515 ।।
bālē guṇagarusu ya ēmāisu sāhuṇā payattēṇa । viṇaō khalu kāyavvō jaṁ viṇayā sagga mōkkhāī ।। 1516 ।।
vēyāvaccaṁ bhaṇṇai taiyatavō aṁtaraṁgamajjhammi । anigūhiyabala - viriyā kuṇanti jaṁ sāhavō dhīrā ।। 1517 ।।
pāhuṇagagilāṇāṇaṁ gurūṇa bālāṇa khavagasēhāṇaṁ । ēmāiyāṇa niccaṁ vēyāvaccaṁ karēyavvaṁ ।। 1518 ।।
suttatthacitaṇāē kilaṁtagaṁ tāṇa sūripamuhāṇa | vīsāmaṇāikajjaṁ kāyavvaṁ nijjaraṭṭhāē । । 1519 ।।
ōsaha sajjāṇi ya dalijja dāvējja saibalē sāhū । jaṁ vēyāvaccakayaṁ na nāsaē suhaphalaṁ kammaṁ ।। 1520 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca---
paḍibhaggassa mayassa ya nāsai caraṇaṁ suyaṁ aguṇaṇāē । na hu vēyāvaccakayaṁ suhōdayaṁ nāsaē kammaṁ ।। 1521 ।।
iṇhi sajjhāyatavaṁ cautthayaṁ suṇaha vajjarijjaṁ taṁ । vāyaṇa- pucchaṇa- ciṁtaṇa- guṇaṇaṇuppēhāipaṁcavihaṁ ॥1522।।

4. vīrēhi pā0 ।

jugāi jiṇidaṁcariyaṁ
bārasavihammi vi tavē sambhitarabāhirē kusalaniddiṭṭhē । na vi asthi na vi yaṁ hōhī sajjhāyasamaṁ tavōkammaṁ ।। 1523 ॥
ētō titthayarattaṁ sabvannuttaṁ pi jāyai kamēṇa । jaṁ paramaṁ mōkkhaṁgaṁ sajjhāō ēttha niddiṭṭhō ।। 1524 ।।
maṇa-vaṇa-kāyajōgā tāṇa nirōhēṇa jhāyaē jhāṇaṁ । saggāpavaggaphalayaṁ sajjhāē na uṇa annattha ।। 1525 ।।
cittēṇa citayaṁtō vāyāē tamēva uccaraṁtō ya । kāēṇa ēgaṭṭāṇaṭṭaō ya pariyaṭṭaē sutaṁ ।। 1526 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca--
jaha jaha suyamōgāhai aisayarasapasarasaṁjuyamauvvaṁ । taha taha palhāi muṇī nava nava saṁvēgasaddhāē ॥। 1527।।
suciraṁ pitavaṁ taviyaṁ caraṇaṁ cinnaṁ suyaṁ pi bahupaḍhiyaṁ । jai nō saṁvēgarasō tātaṁ tusakhaṁḍaṇaṁ savvaṁ ।। 1528 ।।
jāvaiyaṁ ciya kālaṁ sajjhāyaṁ kuṇai suddhapariṇāmō । tāvaiyaṁ ciya kālaṁ asēsakammakkhayaṁ kuṇai ।। 1529 ।।
suttatthathirīkaraṇaṁ nava navasaṁvēga taha ya vēraggaṁ । mōhadugaṁchā sajjhāyavāvaḍāṇaṁ guṇā hōṁti ।। 1530 ।।
saṁpai jhāṇaṁ bhaṇṇai rōddaṁ aṭṭaṁ ca dhamma-sukkaṁ ca । naraya- tirimaṇaya- sura-sivagaīṇa saṁsāhagaṁ kamasō ।।1531 ।।
jattha vaha-baṁdhaṇāī dahaṇaṁ kaṇamāraṇāṇi ruddāṇi । jhāijjati maṇēṇaṁ taṁ ruddaṁ bhannaē jhāṇaṁ ।। 1532 ।।
jaṁ puṇa putta-kalattē piyamittē atthasayaṇagēhēsu । gāḍhāsattaṁ cittaṁ taṁ aṭṭaṁ bhannaē jhāṇaṁ ।। 1533 ।।
cīvaṁdaṇamāvassayaguṇavaṁtaguṇāṇa citaṇaṁ niccaṁ । dāṇāīṇa vihāṇaṁ dhammajjhāṇaṁ muṇēyabvaṁ ।। 1534 ।।
hōi utthaṁ jhāṇaṁ duvihaṁ sukkaṁ ca paramasukkaṁ ca । sukkaṁ suragaihēū sivagaihēū paramasukkaṁ ।। 1535 ।।
savvēvi iṁdiyatthā maṇa- vaha kāyā niraṁbhiyā jattha । taṁ jalaṇō vva tiṇāī jhāṇaṁ niddahai kammāī ।। 1536 ।।
taṁ puṇa parittasaṁsāriyasa jīvassa naṁ uṇa annassa । jāyai kālāvēkkhaṁ uttamasaṁghayaṇajuttassa ।। 1537।।
bhaṇiyaṁ jhāṇaṁ saṁpai kāussaggaṁ suṇēha bhaṇṇataṁ । jaṁ ālōyaṇa- niṁdaṇa - garihaṇamāīsu kāyavvaṁ ।। 1538 ।।
dussumiṇadunnimittē tahōvasaggē ya dēvamāṇusiē । dēvārāhaṇakajjē kāussaggō karēyavvō ।। 1539 ।।
jaha kaḍhiṇaṁ pi hu mayaṇaṁ vilāipajjaliyajalaṇasaṁgēṇa । taha ussaggaggigayaṁ vilijjaē kammamayaṇaṁ pi ।। 1540 ।।
jaha jalatāvataviyaṁ muyai malaṁ kaṁcaṇaṁ bahumalaṁ pi । taha ussaggaggigayaṁ kammamalaṁ galai jīvassa ।। 1541 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca--
jaha karagaō vikiṁtai dāruṁ iṁtō puṇō vi vaccatō । taha kattaṁti suvihiyā kāussaggēṇa kammāī ।। 1542 ।
tā ēsō sayaluvasaggavaggavigdhāṇavihaḍaṇasamatthō ।
kāussaggō uggō kammakkhayaṭṭhāē kāyavvō ।। 1543 ॥
abhita vibhaṇiō tavō tavassīṇa bhūsaṇaṁ paramaṁ । jaṁ cariūṇa suvihiyā vacvaṁti aṇuttaraṁ mōkkhaṁ ।। 1544 ।।
saṁpai bhāvaṇamaiō dhammō bhavajalahitaraṇatarakaṁḍō । bhaṇṇai tāō bārasa imāō iha vakkhamāṇāō ।। 1545 ।।
'savvamaṇiccamasaraṇaṁ saṁsārō ēgayā tahannattaṁ । asuittā' savasaṁvarakammāṇaṁ nijjarā navamā ।। 1546 ॥
'lōgasarūvaṁ bōhī dhammakahīṁ dullahō jiṇō arahā । ēyāō bhāvaṇāō' bhavvā bhāviti na hu annō ।। 1547 ।।
rajjaṁ dhaṇaṁ va rūvaṁ jīyaṁ suhisayaṇajōvvaṇāīṇi | sarayabbhavibbhamāī bhavammi jīvāṇa savvāṇi ।। 1548 ।।
jō cēva puhaipālō damagō sā cēva jāyai khaṇēṇa । tā kaha rajjasirīē rajjijjai calasahāvāē ।। 1549 ।।
jē cēva vihavavitthāragavviyā kāmabhōgadullaliyā | vigaliyavihavā parapēsaṇāṇi tē caiva kubvaṁti ।। 1550 ।।
jaṇamaṇanayaṇāṇaṁdā hōuṁ vararūvadhāriṇō purisā । vāhi- jara jajjaraṁgā jaṇaṁti tē cēva uvvēyaṁ ।। 1551 ॥
1. ō suttammi bhaṇiyāō pā0 । 2. padamamaṇi pā. 3. yā annataṁ pā0 4. ittaṁ prasava pā0 । 5. saṁvarō ya taha nijja
pā0 । 6. lōga sahāvō bōhī ya dullahā dhammasāhasrō arahā pā0 7 ṇāō bhāvēyavvāō jattēṇa pā0 ।

siririsahasāmivaṇṇaṇaṁ
puvvahē jēṇa samaṁ vicittakīlāhiṁ kīliyaṁ bahusō । avaraṇhē rōijjai sō ciya bahudukkhabhariēhiṁ ।। 1552 ।।
karikannacalaṁ jīyaṁ kusaggajalabiṁducaṁcalaṁ pēmmaṁ । taḍitaralaṁ tāruṇṇaṁ muṇiya thirā sā na kāyavvā ।। 1553 ।।
ēsā saṁkhēvēṇaṁ aṇiccayā savvavatthuvisayāō । kahiyā taō na katthai thirabuddhī hōi kāyavvā ।। 1554 ।।
causaṭṭisahassā suṁdarīṇa battīsanaravariṁdāṇa । āṇānidēsakarāṇa kaṇayavaravaddhamauḍāṇa ।। 1555 ।
sōlasajakkhasahassā sayā vi vaṭṭaṁti bhiccabhāvammi । jassa bharahāhivaiṇō maraṇaṁtē sō vihu asaraṇō ।। 1556 ।
kīrati maṁgalāī saṁti kaē dijjaē mahādāṇaṁ । jaṁpati ki karēmō suhisayaṇāsavihamallīṇā ।। 1557 ।।
maṇimaṁta ōsahīō rakkhākaṁḍāṇi cēva kīraṁti । vējjā vijjayaniuṇā vējjayasatthaṁ pauṁjaṁti ।। 1558 ।।
haya-gaya-rahajōhēhiṁ ya cauraṁgabalēṇa vēḍhiō saṁtō । caudisipēsiyaaidīṇamaraṇabhayabhariyataralacchō ।। 1559 ।।
kēṇāvi akayarakkhō cakkī vi hu marai pēcchayaṁtāṇa । sēsāṇa puṇō rakkhaṁ kō kāhī maṇuyamēttāṇa ।। 1560 ।।
tā sārīramaṇō bhavasu tikkhadukkhēhiṁ dūmiyamaṇāṇa | jīvāṇa natthi saraṇaṁ annaṁ mōttūṇa jiṇadhammaṁ ।। 1561 ।।
rāyā raṁkō raṁkō vi naravarō hōi takkhaṇā cēva' । dhaṇavaṁtō vi dariddō hōṛa dariddō vi dhaṇavaṁtō ।। 1562 ।।
puttō vi hōi sattū sattū puttattaṇēṇa uvaṇamai । māyā vi hōi ghariṇī piyā vi puttō marēūṇaṁ ।। 1563 ।।
saṁsārammi aṇatē kammavasāṇatasō jiyā savvē । pii māi bhāi bhaiṇī- suya-suhi-suyaṇattaṇaṁ pattā ।। 1564 ॥
saṁsāravilasiyāī virasāī paē paē niēūṇa । purisō sayā sayannō saṁsārā kō na nivinnō ।। 1565 ।।
ēgō jāyai jīvō suhaṁ ca dukkhaṁ ca bhuṁjaī ēgō । vivihāē vēyaṇāē vihuriyahiyaō marai ēgō ।। 1566 ।।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca--
।। 1568 ।।
।। 1569 ।।
atthō gharē niyattai sayaṇajaṇō piuvaṇāō gaṁtūṇa । dēhaṁ pi dahai jalaṇō jīvō puṇa ēgaō jāi ॥। 1567।।
jaṁ pi sarīraṁ iṭṭha na nēi sō taṁ pi parabhavē jaṁtō । pāṇasahāvō jīvō vaccai savvaṁ pi mōttūṇa
ēgattabhāvaṇā viśhu nihuyaṁ bhāvē vi nāṇaniuṇēhiṁ । sayaṇā sā chaḍḍijjai visadiddhā tikkhabhalli vva
annaṁ imaṁ sarīraṁ amnō jīvō imāō dēhāō । iya ēsā jassa maī sōgapisāō na taṁ chalai ॥। 1570 ।।
sayaṇā va pariyaṇā vā vivittadhaṇadhannasaṁcayā sabvē । girinaipurasamāṇā jīvā dacchaṁtarā bhūyā ॥। 1571 ।।
asuimmi samubbhūō asuirasēṇaṁ ca vaḍhiō ganbhē । jāō vi sattaapavittaruhiramaṁsāidhāuō ।। 1572 ।।
saisitō salilēṇaṁ vilittō gōsīsa caṁdaṇarasēṇa । na hu hōi suī dēhō navachiddamalāvilō jēṇa ।। 1573 ।।
ēvaṁvihē vi dēhē gēhē savvasta asuibhāvassa । suibuddhī jai nibuddhiyāṇa na uṇō subuddhīṇaṁ ।। 1574 । ।
hiṁsāiēsa paṁcasu paṁcasu sōyāiēsu akkhēsu । causu kasāēsu tahā jōgēsu ya appasatthēsu ।। 1575 ॥
jīvassa jā pavittī saāsavō saṁvarō puṇa nivattī । ēēhitō niccaṁ sammaṁ maṇa vayaṇa - kāhi ।। 1576 ।।
saṁvariyāsavadārō navaṁ na baṁdhēṛa kammamihajīvō । nijjarai purāṇaṁ pi hu tavāyaṇā nijjarā ēsā ।। 1577 ।।
cōhasarajjupamāṇō vittharaō sattarajjuō lōō । paṁcatthikāyamaiō aṇāinihaṇō muṇēyavvō ।। 1578 ।।
dharaṇiyalāō samāō hēṭṭhāō sattasamahiyā rajjū । uvarēṇaṁ pi hu rajjū sattēva havaṁti kiṁcūṇā ।। 1579 ।।
puḍhavīē tamatamāē paēsapayarammi savvahiṭṭimaē । vikkhaṁbhāyāmēṇaṁ sattēva havaṁti rajjūō ।। 1580 ।।
tattō parihāṇīē rayaṇīē jāva ubarimē payarē । vikkhaṁbhāyāmēṇaṁ paḍipuṇṇā ēgarajju tti । । 1581 ।।

jugāi jiṇidacariyaṁ
tattō ya uvarivuḍḍhī rajjū jā paṁcabaṁbhalōgammi । tattō vi uvari hāṇī kujjā jā rajjulōgaṁtē ।। 1582 ।।
samabhūmipaēsaō hēṭṭhāhō muhasarāva sāricchō । uvarēṇaṁ puṇa kōṭṭhagasarisō saṁṭhāṇaō lōō ।। 1583 ॥
afafa dhammāhammā i-ṭṭhii uvaṭṭhabhakāragā bhaṇiyā । avagāsayamāgāsaṁ jīvā puṇa cēyaṇasarūvā ।। 1584 ।।
sadda rasa- rūva-gaṁdhāṇa taha ya phāsāṇa bahupagārāṇa । kāraṇamiha pannattā paramāṇū paramanāṇīhi ।। 1585 ।।
ēvaṁvihammi lōē tila - tusamēttaṁ pinatthi taṁ ṭhāṇaṁ । jattha na jāō na maō anaṁtakhuttō imō jīvō ॥। 1586 ।।
ēsō lōgasahāvō saṁkhēvēṇaṁ maē samakkhāō । saṁpai puṇa jaha dulahā bōhī taha saṁpavakkhāmi ।। 1587 ।।
saṁsārasāyarē saṁsaraṁtasattāṇa tāṇa rahiyāṇa । dulahā jiṇidadhammē bōhī - micchattamūḍhāṇa ॥। 1588 ।।
thāvarabhāvaṁ pattā tahēva vigalidiyattamāvannā । na hu jīvā jiṇadhammē lahaṁti aidullahaṁ bōhiṁ ॥। 1589 ।।
paṁcidiyattaṇē vihu dulahā iha jalayarāitiriyāṇaṁ । maṇuyattaṇē vi dulahā aṇāriyāṇaṁ kukammāṇaṁ ।। 1590 ।।
āriyadēsē vi tahā bōkkasa-khasa sabara- babbarāīṇaṁ । dulahā jiṇidabōhī sakammanihayāṇa pāvāṇa ।। 1591 ।।
dhammatthiyā vi jīvā parapāsaṁḍīhiṁ mōhiyā saṁtā । dhammacchalēṇa pāvaṁ kuṇaṁti na muṇaṁti paramatthaṁ ।। 1592 ।।
kuggahagahasaṁgahiyā dhaṇa- jōvvaṇa-rūvagavviyā kēī । visayāsattā annē dhammassa paraṁmuhā hōṁti ।। 1593 ।।
jaha maruthalīē salilaṁ gimhāyavajagaḍiyāṇa jīvāṇa । taha jiṇavariṁdadhammē sudullahā hōi varabōhī ।। 1594 । ।
guṇasuṭṭhiō jaiṭṭhiyavāī saṁsārabhīru dhaṇiyaṁ । paṁcavihāyāradharō dhammakahīdullahō bhaṇiō ।। 1595 ।।
laddhūṇa 1 vi dhammaguruṁ tityayaraṁ gaṇaharāiyaṁ kaha vi । vivarīyamaīpāvā pāvāyariyaṁ pavajjaṁti ।। 1596 ।।
pāvāyariyaṁ pi guruṁ paḍivajjiyamōhamōhiyāmūḍhā । pāṇāivāyasattā sattā hiṁḍaṁti saṁsārē ।। 1597 ।।
kāyamaṇīṇaṁ majjhē vēruliō jai vi nivaḍiō kaha vi । vantrēṇa samāṇō vi hu taha vi viyāṇēi niuṇajaṇō ।। 1598 ।।
taha pāvāyariyāṇaṁ majjhagayaṁ nāmaō samāṇaṁ pi । mōttūṇa kuhammaguruṁ dhammaguruṁ dhannaō lēi ।। 1599 ।।
tā jai sayalasurāsura-nara' surasōkkhāī mahaha tā tubbhē । giṇhha dhammāyariyaṁ pāvāyariyaṁ pamōttūṇa ॥। 1600 ॥
bārasa vihabhāvaṇāō sammaṁ paribhāviūṇa ēyāō । taha kuṇaha jaha na nivaḍaha puṇō vi saṁsārakaṁtārē ।। 1601 ।।
atthēṇa hōi dāṇaṁ tavō vi sattīē kīraē kāuṁ । sīlaṁ pi sattasajyaṁ sāhīṇā bhāvaṇā lōē ।। 1602 ।।
ēsa caugvidhammō dāṇāī bhāvaṇāvasāṇō ti । niyabhūmiyāṇusārēṇa kuṇaha mā mujjhaha sa kajjē ।। 1603 ।।
sattarasasīlāharaṇō paramarisinisēviō guṇavisālō । sacarācarajīvahiō jaidhammō hōi ukkōsō || 1604 ।।
virayāvirayāṇa puṇō sāvayalōyāṇa majjhimō bhaṇiō । avirayasammaddiṭṭhīṇa sāvagāṇaṁ jahannō u ।। 1605 ।।
ēvaṁ muṇiya saṁjāyacaraṇapariṇāmō niyasahōyarāiduvālasasayasahiō bharahasuō usabhasēṇō nāma bhagavaō samīvē pavvaiō ।
bhaṇiyaṁ ca -
paṁca ya puttasayāī bharahas ya sattanattuya sayāī । sayarāhaṁ pavvaīyā tammi kumārā samōsaraṇē ।। 1606 ।।
baṁbhī vi pavvaiyā bharahō vi sāvagō jāō । suṁdarī pavvayaṁtī 'ēsā maha itthirayaṇaṁ bhavissai' tti bharahēṇa
vāriyā sā sāviyā jāyā । annē vi maṇussā- maṇussīō dēvā dēvīō tirikkhajōṇīyā-tirikkhajōṇiyāō ya jahā-
saṁbhavaṁ kē vi pavvaiyā annē dēsaviraī pavannā kē vi sammattamēttadhāragā jāyā । ētyaṁtarē bhagavayā usabhasēṇapamuhāṇa
caurāsīē gaṇaharāṇa uppannē vā vigamēi vā dhuvēi vā mājyāpayāṇi uddiṭṭhāṇi, tē vi bhagavaṁtō jammaṁtaranivvattiya-

gaṇaharanāmakammōdaēṇaṁ māuyāpayāṇi nisāmiūṇa takkhaṇā cēva ēgārasa aṁgāṇi cōhasapuvvāṇi ya virayaṁti । ētyaṁtarē
rayaṇamayathālē divvacunnē kāūṇa cauvvidēvanikāyasaṁparivuḍō sakkō samuōi । taō aṇuparivāḍīē parisaṁ ṭhiyāṇaṁ
usahasēṇapāmōkkhāṇaṁ caurāsīgaṇaharāṇaṁ? cunnakkhēvapurassaraṁ suttēṇaṁ atyēṇaṁ tadubhaēṇaṁ savva-davvaṁ guṇa-naya- pajjavēhiṁ bhagavaṁ
aṇuōgāṇunnaṁ gaṇāṇuna ca karēi । dēvaduṁduhinināyapurassaraṁ sakkāiyā suragaṇā bharahavaipamuhanaranārigaṇā ya vāsanikkhēvaṁ

phalavisēsō ?” bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ -- " tullakiriyāṇa vi jīvāṇa pariṇāmavisēsēṇa phalavisēsō diṭṭhō । taṁ jahā --
jīvō aṇāisuddhō lēsāṇa tamēṇa baṁdhaē kammaṁ । baṁdhassa visuddhalēsō bhēvaṁ bahuyaṁ asuddhāē ॥। 1607 ।।
kiṇhā - nīlā-kāū tēu pamhā ya hōi sukkā ya । chaccēva imā bhaṇiyā saṁsārē jīvalēsāō ।। 1608 ।।
jaha phalihapattharammi kasiṇē nīlē va pīyaratē vva । uvahāṇē taṁ phalihaṁ jā pajjuvahāṇa samavannaṁ ।। 1609 ।।
appā vi taha visuddhō phalihamaī uccaniyasahāvēṇa । kasiṇāikammapōggalajōē kasiṇattaṇaṁ jāi ।। 1610 ।।
jārisayaṁ taṁ kammaṁ kasiṇaṁ nīlaṁ va pīyapaumaṁ vā । tārisaō sē bhāvō jaṁbūphalabhakkhaṇā haraṇē ।।1611 ॥

gahaṇaṁ ca tē paviṭṭhā pēcchaṁti ya taruvarē mahākāē । ēkkammi taruvarammi bhattāī ṭhāviyaṁ tēhi ।। 1613 ।।

aha tēhiṁ caḍiskkhē bhattaṁ bhōttūṇa bhāyaṇē bhaggē । aha luṁpiūṇa savvaṁ paḍipahahuttaṁ gayā pavayā ।। 1615 ।।
varṇāchaṁdiyā vi purisā majjhaṇhē tisiyabhukkhiyā savvē । kira bhuṁjimō tti iṇhi taṁ bhattataruṁ samallīṇā ।। 1616 ।।
pēcchaṁti na taṁ bhattaṁ na bhāyaṇē kappaḍēyaphāliyaē । aha nāyaṁ tēhi jahā vānarajūhaṁ samallīṇaṁ ।। 1617॥
tā saṁpara chuhiyāṇaṁ " kā amhāṇaṁ gai tti ciṁtēmō । vaṇa' phullaphalē asimō varṇāmmi annēsimō sabvē ।। 1618 ।।
ētthaṁtarammi kālōdarapacci rajaṁbupikka' sahayārō । paḍhamuvvuṭṭamahīrayapasariyavaragaṁdhagaṁdhaḍḍhō ।।1619॥

chijjaṁtu imāē bhō ! sāhāō khaṁdhadēsalaggāō । paḍiyāsu tāsu amhē bhakkhissāmō vara - phalāṇi ।। 1625 ।।

jugāijiniṁdacariyaṁ
purisō bhaṇai cautthō mā bahuyaṁ bhaṇaha ēsa maha buddhī । thavaē chiṁdaha tubbhē tattha vi jē phalabharakkaṁtē ।। 1627।।
aha paṁcamēṇa bhaṇiyā mā palavaha kiṁ ci kuṇaha maha vayaṇaṁ । lauḍēṇa haṇaha thavaē paḍiyāṇi phalāṇi khāēha ।। 1628 ।।
sōūṇa imē vayaṇē īsī hēlāē hasiyavayaṇēṇa । chuṭṭapurisēṇa bhaṇiyā savvē vi narā samaṁ caiva ।। 1629।।
hā ! kaṭṭhē annāṇaṁ ahō ! mahāraṁbhayā bhavaṁtāṇaṁ । thōvā buddhī tubbhaṁ ērisayaṁ jēṇa maṁtēha || 1630 ।।
kiṁ ēttha samādattaṁ jaṁbūphalabhakkhaṇaṁ tu tubbhēhiṁ । jai tā ki ēēhi mūlāō chiṁdaṇāīhiṁ ।। 1631।।
ēē sahāvapakkāpaḍiyā taha pāḍiyā suyāīhi । pakkaphalajaṁbunivahā dharaṇigayā rayaṇanivaha vva ।। 1632 ॥ |
vīsamaūṇa nivannā ahava nuvannā' ṭhiyā va icchāē । ghēttūṇa khāha tubbhē vaccaha aha vā vi annattha ॥। 1633।।
iya tē bhaṇiyā savvē ēvaṁ hōu tti navara bhaṇamāṇā । asiuṁ ca samāḍhattā phalāī dharaṇīē paḍiyāī ।। 1634 ।।
tē tittā tēhi ciya dharaṇīpaḍiēhi navara jaṁbūhi । sarisō phalāṇa bhōō pāvaṁ puṇa bahuvihaṁ rāgē ।। 1635 ।।
jō sō chiṁdaṛa mūlaṁ thēvē kajjammi bahuvihāraṁbhō । mariūna kaṇhalēsō avassa sō jāi narayammi ॥। 1636 ॥
bīō sāhaṁ chiṁdai varataruō sō vi nīlalēsillō । mariūṇa pārvācitō narayaṁ tiriēsu vā jāi ।। 1637।।
taiō vi pāvapurisō bhaṇaṛa pasāhāō chiṁdimō amhē । kāōya-lēsa bhāvō sō mariuṁ jāi tiriēsu ।। 1638 ।।
jō uṇa cautthapurisō thavaē savvē vi ēttha avahaṇaha । sō tēyasa - lēsāē purisō vā hōi dēvō vā ।। 1639 ।।
jō uṇa paṁcamapurisō pakkē āmēva girihamō sabbē । sō paumalēsabhākō avassa dēvattaṇaṁ lahai ।। 1640 ।।
jō puṇa chaṭṭhō purisō bhūmigaē gihimō tti sadayamaṇō । sō hōi sukka-lēsō mōkkhassa vi bhāyaṇaṁ purisō ॥। 1641 ।।
tā usabhasēṇa jāṇasu kajjē ēkkambhi jaṁbu-bhakkhaṇaē । chaṇhaṁ pi bhinnabhāvō lēsābhēō ya savvāṇaṁ ।। 1642 ॥
bhinnō ya kammabaṁdhō bhinnā ya gaī maī vi sē bhinnā । ēkkammi vi vāvārē vaṭṭaṁtā tē jahā bhinnā ॥1643 ॥
ēvaṁ jaṁ jaṁ kajjaṁ kēṇa vi purisēṇa kāumāḍhattaṁ । kajjammi tammi ēē challēsā huṁti nāyavvā ।। 1644 ।।
haṇa chiṁda bhiṁda māraha cūraha camaṛhēha lu paha jahicchaṁ । jassa na dayā na dhammō taṁ jāṇaha kiṇhalēsaṁ tu ।। 1645 ।।
jō kuṇai paṁca kajjē ahammajuttē ya bhaṁṇai taha vayaṇē । chaṭṭhē puṇa dhammiṭṭhaṁ taṁ jāṇaha nīlalēsaṁ ti ।। 1646 ॥
cattāri akajjāī vayaṇāṇi ya bhaṇai pāvajuttāī । sō dhammadayā juttō vaṭṭaha kāōyalēsāē ।। 1647 ।।
jō kuṇai tinni pāvē tinni ya vayaṇēṇa kakkasē bhaṇai । dhammammi kuṇai tinni ya tēūlēsō hu sō purisō ।। 1648 ।।
kāūṇa dōnni pāvē cattāri puṇō karēi punnāī । niṁdai pāvāraṁbhaṁ taṁ jāṇasu paumalēsaṁ ti ।। 1649 ।।
ēkkaṁ pāvāraṁbhaṁ paṁca ya dhammassa kuṇai jō purisō । sō hōi sukkalēsō lēsāīō jiṇō hōi ।। 1650 ।।
ēguttaravuḍḍhīē nīlādārambha jāva sukkaṁ tti । kammāṇi ya vayaṇāṇi ya suhāṇi vaṭṭaṁti aṇukamasō ।। 1651 ।।
tā bhō sirippaha ! tuha suyāṇaṁ jēṭṭhō appakasāō kayannū jiiṁdiō visuddha pariṇāmō parōvayārī dayāluō ।

sachattaṁ sajjhayaṁ vihihāuhapaharaṇapaḍiputraṁ cāughaṁṭaṁ āsa rahaṁ durūḍhē । taē ṇaṁ sē sirōvaribirāyaṁtachattarayaṇē ubhayapāsanivaḍaṁta

rahassanāhī ullātaō ṭaṁkāraravā puriyamahimaṁḍalaṁ paṁcavannamaṇirayaṇacacaiyaviggahaṁ aśruggayavālayaṁda iṁdadhaṇusannigāsaṁ
dappiyavaramahisadaḍhakaḍhiṇasiṁgaggasarisasāraṁ parahuyabhamarakulakasiṇōragēṁdanīlaniddhacchavi niuṇōviyamisimisitamaṇi-
rayaṇaghaṁṭiyājālaparikkhittaṁ taḍitaruṇataraṇikiraṇatavaṇijjabarddhācadhapaṭṭaṁ kālahariyaratta - pīya- sukkila - bahuhāruṇisaṁpiṇaddhaṁ
riujaṇajīviyaṁtakaraṁ dhaṇuṁ giṇhai । varavairasāratikkhatuṁḍaṁ ravikarasaṁgasaṁvaḍḍhiyatēyaduddasaṇaṁ kaṁcaṇamaṇirayaṇaraiyasukaya-
puṁkhaṁ aṇēgamaṇirayaṇaramaṇīyasa ra lihiyanāmakkharaṁ tihuyaṇasaṁkhōhakaraṁ āyayakaṇṇāyayaṁ saraṁ ca kāūṇa imāī udārāī
vayaṇāī udāhariṁsu sē naravaī --
bhō bhō suṇaṁtu bhavaṁtō nāgā- asurā - suvaṇṇā - bāhiraō khalu sarassa jē dēvā haṁdi suṇaṁtu bhavaṁtō abbhiṁtaraō sarassa

kaṇaga-taviya-paṁkaja-jāsumaṇa - jaliyajalaṇa-sugatuṁḍarāgaṁ, guṁjaddha-baṁdhujīvaga-rattahiguluya - siṁdūra - ruila- kuṁkuma-pārāvaya-calaṇa

āsarahaṁ naravaī durūḍhē ।
taē ṇaṁ sē naravaī dāhiṇābhimuhē varadāmatitthēṇaṁ cakkadhurā pamāṇaṁ lavaṇajalahijalamōgāḍhē dhaṇuṁ giṇhai saraṁ
muyai sē vi ya ṇaṁ sarē varadāmatitthāhivassē bhavagaṁgaṇē nivaḍai sē vi ya ṇaṁ varadāmatitthāhivaī sakōvē saraṁ giṇhai ।
uppannē bharahē paḍhamabharahāhivai tti akkharāṇi vāēi । pasamasalilavijjhaviyakōvānalē rayaṇamālaṁ mauṁḍaṁ muttājālaṁ
hēmajālaṁ kaḍagāṇi tuḍiyāṇi ya gahāya āgaē । bharahaṁ ēvaṁ vayāsī - - " aha ṇṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyāṇaṁ āṇāniddēsakarē
varadāmatitthāhiyē dāhiṇillē aṁtēvāsī । taṁ giṇhaṁtu ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā ! imaṁ pīidāṇaṁ ti bhaṇiūṇa mālāmauḍāiyaṁ
paṇāmēva । bharahē vi sammaṁ paḍicchai varadāmatitthāhivaṁ sakkārēi sammāṇēi paḍivisajjēi । appaṇā vi jēṇēva
vijayakhaṁdhāvārē tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchittā hāē ya kayabalikammē bhuttē samāṇē varadāma-titthāhivassa aṭṭhāhiyaṁ
mahimaṁ karēi । taō cakkarayaṇaṁ dēsiyamaggē paccatthimadisābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । tahēva khaṁdhāvāranivēsaṁ
pabhāsatitthāsannē karēi tahēva aṭṭamaṁ giṇhai rahamārūhai pabhāsatitthēṇaṁ rahanābhimēttajalaṁ lavaṇasamudaṁ ōgāhai saraṁ
muyai sē viyaṇaṁ sarē pabhāsatitthā hivassa gharaṁgaṇē nivaḍai । sē vi ya ṇaṁ pabhāsatitthāhivē sara-nāmakkhara - vinnāyavr̥ttaṁtē
cūḍāmaṇīdivvaṁ uratthaṁgē vējjaṁsōṇīsuttaṁ kaḍagāṇi ya tuḍiyāṇi ya gahāya samāgaē। aṁtalikkhapaḍivannē jaē ṇaṁ
vijaēṇaṁ bharahāhivaṁ vaddhāvēda vaddhāvaittā ēvaṁ vayāsī - - " aha ṇṇaṁ tubbhāṇaṁ visayavāsī pabhāsatitthāhivē dēvāṇu-
ppiyāṇaṁ kiṁkarē vasē vaṭṭāmi taṁ giṇhaṁtu ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā imaṁ ēyārūvaṁ mama pāhuḍaṁ "ti bhaṇiūṇa maṇimāiyaṁ uvāyaṇī
karēi। sē vi sammaṁ saṁpaḍicchai pabhāsatitthāhivaṁ sakkāriūṇa visajjēi । appaṇā vi vijayakhaṁdhāvāramāgaṁtūṇa aṭṭamāō
pārēi pabhāsatitthahivassa aṭṭhāhiyaṁ mahāmahimaṁ karēi । pabhāsatitthāhivassa aṭṭhāhiyāē mahāmahimāē nivvattāē cakkarayaṇa-
dēsiyamaggē siṁdhūē mahānaīē dāhiṇillēṇaṁ kūlēṇaṁ puratthābhimuhē siṁdhudēvī bhavaṇābhimuhē payāē yā vi hōtthā ।
taō siṁdhudēvī bhuvaṇassa adūrasāmaṁtē vijayakhaṁdhāvāranivēsa karēi, karitā siṁdhudēvi maṇē kāūṇa aṭṭamabhattaṁ giṇhai,
aṭṭhamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi siṁdhudēvīē āsaṇaṁ calai । ōhi pauṁjai, jīyakappaṁ sarai "kiccamēyaṁ tīyapaḍuppannamaṇāgayāṇaṁ
bharahasāmiyāṇaṁ pūyāsakkāraṁ karēttaē" tti kaṭṭu kuṁbhaṭṭasahassaṁ rayaṇavicittaṁ nāṇāmaṇikaṇagarayaṇabhatticittāṇi duvē kaṇaga-
bhaddāsaṇāṇi kaḍagāṇi ya tuḍiyāṇī ya vatthāṇi ya ābharaṇāṇi ya gahāya āgacchai, āgacchittā aṁtalikkhapaḍivannāī
sakhikhiṇīyāiṁ pavaravatthāī parihiyā bharahaṁ rāyāṇaṁ jaēṇaṁ vijayaēṇaṁ vaddhāvēda, vaddhāvaittā ēvaṁ vayāsī -- aha naṁ
dēvāṇuppiyāṇaṁ visayanivāsiṇī kiṁkari tti bhaṇiūṇa vicittarayaṇa kuṁbhaṭṭasahassāiyaṁ pāhuḍaṁ payacchai bharahē vi sāyaraṁ paḍicchai,
pacchittā siṁdhudēvi sakkārēi sammāṇēi saṁbhāsēi paḍivisajjēi । appaṇā vi khaṁdhavāramāgacchai āgacchittā aṭṭhamāō pārēi,
pāritā siṁdhudēvīē aṭṭhāhiyā mahimaṁ karēi nivvattiyāē aṭṭhāhiyā mahimāē sē cakkarayaṇē āuhagharasālāō paḍinikkhamai,
paḍinikkhamittā uttaraputthimēṇaṁ disībhāēṇaṁ vēyaḍḍhapavvayābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā ।
tāhē jōyaṇamāṇēhiṁ suhappayāṇaēhiṁ gaṁtūṇa vēyaḍḍhapavvayassa dāhiṇē niyaṁbē khaṁdhāvāraṁ nivēsai nivēsittā aṭṭamaṁ pagiha
aṭṭamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi vēyaḍḍhagirikumārassa vi āsaṇē calai ōhi pauṁjai pāsai bharahē vāsē paḍhamacakkaharaṁ
samupapannaṁ । taō paṭṭamāṇasō nāṇāviharayaṇāṇi mahagghaṁ mōllāṇi dēvadūsāṇi ābhisēkkō alaṁkārō annaṁpi bhaddāsaṇa-
vīrāsaṇāīyaṁ ghēttūṇa samāgaō । aṁtalikkhapaḍivannō bharahāhivaṁ jaēṇaṁ vijayaṇaṁ vaddhāvēi uvāyaṇaṁ paṇāmēi sēvaṁ saṁpaḍivajjai
sē vi bharahāhivē sakkārikaṇa visajjēi । appaṇā vi khaṁdhāvāraṁ gaṁtūṇa aṭṭamāō pārē । vēyaḍḍhagirikumārassa aṭṭhāhiyā
mahimaṁ karēi । taē ṇaṁ sē cakkarayaṇē timisaguhābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । tayaṇucakkāhivē vi suhaṁ suhēṇa gaṁtūṇa

visamaṭṭhāṇasamīkaraṇaṁ hiyakaraṁ saṁtikaraṁ suhakaraṁ rannō hiyaicchiyamaṇōraha-pūragaṁ divyamappasihayaṁ daṁḍarayaṇaṁ gahāya sattaṭṭhapaē
paccōsakkai । paccōsakkittā tē kavāḍē tēṇa daṁḍarayaṇēṇa mahayā mahayā saddēṇaṁ tikkhuttō āuḍēi । taē ṇaṁ tē dāraka-
vāḍā daṁḍarayaṇēṇa samāyā samāṇā mahayā mahayā saddēṇaṁ kuṁcāravaṁ karēmāṇā karēmāṇā sarasarassa sagāī sagāī ṭhāṇāī
paccōsakkitthā |
taē ṇaṁ sē susēṇē sēṇāvaī jēṇēva bharahē rāyā tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchattā kayapaṇāmē kavāḍugghāḍaṇaṁ sāhēi ।
bharāhivō vi cauraṁgabalaparivāriō gaṁdhavāraṇārūḍhō jēṇēva timisaguhaṁ tēṇēva uvāgacchai । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē cauraṁgula-
ppamāṇaṁ mēttaṁ aṇagdhēyaṁ sapāḍihēraṁ aṇōvamajuī maṇirayaṇaṁ paīvasamaṁ paṇāsiyā sēsatamaṁdhayāraṁ jēṇēva muddhāgaēṇaṁ dukkhaṁ na
kiṁ ci jāyai । havai ārōggēya savvakālaṁ tēricchiyā divvā māṇusā ya uvasaggā savvē na karēṁti kiṁ ci dukkha
saṁgamē vaya asatthabajjhō havai narō taṁ maṇirayaṇaṁ bharahāhivō gahāya hatthirayaṇassa dāhiṇillāē kuṁbhīē nikkhivai ।
taē ṇaṁ ( bharahāhivē ṇariṁdē ) haya-gaya-raha- jōha - saṁkulāē cāuriṁgiṇīē sēṇāē saddhi saṁparivuḍē taṁ timisaguhaṁ dāhiṇillēṇaṁ
duvārēṇaṁ sasi va mēhaṁdharayāranivahaṁ aīī । tēēṇaṁ sē bharahē chattalaṁ duvālasaṁsiyaṁ aṭṭhakanniyaṁ ahigaraṇisaṁṭhāṇasaṁṭhiya
aṭṭhasōvanniyaṁ jakkhasahassakayapāḍihēraṁ cauraṁgulapamāṇamēttaṁ samatalaṁ māṇummāṇapamāṇajōgaṁ ( yara juttaṁ duvālasajōyaṇāṇi
timiranigarapaḍisēhagaṁ" sasisūrajaliyajalaṇajagaḍiya tēyaṁ ) jassa pabhāvēṇa cakkavaṭṭī cauraṁgabalasahiō tamisaguhaṁ
laṁghiūṇa vīyamaḍḍhabharahaṁ uyavēī । taṁ kāgiṇirayaṇaṁ gahāya rāyavarē puratthimapaccatthimillēsu kaḍaēsu jōyaṇaṁtariyāī
paṁcadhaṇusayāyāmavikkhaṁbhāī jōyaṇujjōyaka rāī ( cakkaṇēmīsaṁṭhiyāī caṁdamaṁḍalapaḍiṇigāsāiṁ ēgūṇapaṇṇaṁ maṁḍalāī) ālihamāṇē
ālihamāṇē timisaguhamaṇupavisai । jāva kila dharai cakkavaṭṭī tāva tāṇi maṁḍalāṇi dharaṁti guhā vi tahā ugghāḍiyā cēva
ciṭṭha tēhi maṁḍalēhiṁ ālōyabhūyā ujjōyabhūyā sūrarassīhiṁ ca paṇāsiyaṁdhayārā caṁdakiraṇēhiṁ ca kavaliyatamaṁdhayārā

ō pannattāō । jāō ṇaṁ timisaguhāē puratthimillāō bhittikaḍagāō pavūḍhāō samāṇīō paccatthimēṇaṁ siṁdhu mahānaī
samappēṁti । jannaṁ ummuggajalāē mahāṇaīē taṇaṁ vā kaṭṭu vā pattaṁ vā sakkaraṁ vā āsē vā hatthī vā rahē vā jōhē vā

nimajjāvēi । taē ṇaṁ sē vaḍḍhairayaṇē bharahavayaṇēṇa tāsu naīsu aṇēgakhaṁbhasayasaṁnniviṭṭha acalamakaṁpaṁ sālaṁbaṇavāhagaṁ savvarayaṇā-

vitthinnaviulabhavaṇasayaṇāsaṇajāṇavāhaṇāinnā । bahudhaṇa - bahujāyarūvarayayā bahudāsī - dāsa - gōmahisa - gavēlaga-ppabhūyā bahujaṇassa

taō bharahō vatthābharaṇāīhiṁ sammāṇiūṇa khayarāhivē visajjēi । appaṇā vi cakka rayaṇadēsiyamaggē uttara-
puratthimēṇaṁ disībhāgēṇaṁ gaṁgādēvibhavaṇābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē gaṁgābhavaṇassa naccāsaṇṇē nāidūrē
vijayakhaṁdhāvāraṁ nivēsa karēi । jā siṁdhudēvī tahā gaṁgaṁ pi ōyavēi । sō puṇa gaṁgādēvī kuṁbhaṭṭasahassaṁ rayaṇacittaṁ nāṇāma-
ṇi-kaṇaga-rayaṇa-bhatticittāṇi ya duvē siṁhāsaṇāṇi uvaṇēi । bharahō vi gaṁgāē aṭṭhāhiyā mahāmahimaṁ kāūṇa cakkarayaṇa-
dēsiyamaggē dāhiṇadisāē khaṁḍappavāyābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē khaṁḍappavāyaguhāsaṇṇē khaṁdhāvāranivēsaṁ
karēi । naṭṭamālayaṁ maṇasī kāūṇa aṭṭamabhattaṁ pariṇhai aṭṭamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi tassa naṭṭamālayadēvassa āsaṇaṁ calai ।
āsaṇaṁ caliyē pāsittā ōhiṁ pauṁjai kēvalakappaṁ jaṁbuddīvaṁ ōhiṇā ābhōēmāṇē ābhōēmāṇē bharahāhivaṁ pāsai, pāsittā
bharahaṁtiyamāgacchai । nāṇāvihāṇi āharaṇāṇi bharahassa uvāyaṇī karēi । sēvaṁ ca paḍivajjai । bharahō vi taṁ sakkāriūṇa
visajjēi । aṭṭhāhiyā mahimaṁ ca karēi । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē naṭṭamālayassa aṭṭhāhiyāē nivvattāē samāṇīē sēṇāvaī āṇavēi--
“gacchaha ṇaṁ bhō ! gaṁgāpuvvillaṁ nikkhuḍaṁ samavisamāṇi ya ōyavēhi । sō vi siṁdhu-nikkhuḍavattanvayāē savvaṁ ōyavēi
ōyavittā gahiyanāṇāvihōvayārē jēṇēva bharahē tēṇēva uvāgacchai sabbōvayārē bharahassa uvaṇēi । bharahavisajjiē viulāī
māṇussagāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuṁjamāṇē viharai । bharahō vi vāsasahassamaṇaṇaṁ gaṁgā dēvīē saha bhōgē bhuṁjai । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē
aṇṇayā kayāi sēṇāvaī āṇavittā ēvaṁ vayāsī -- " gaccha ṇaṁ bhō khaṁḍappavāyaguhāē uttarillassa duvārassa kavāḍē
vihāḍēhi, vihāḍittā ēyamāṇattiyaṁ pañcappiṇāhi" । taē gaṁ sē sēṇāvaī naṭṭamālayaṁ dēvaṁ maṇasī kāūṇa aṭṭamabhattaṁ giṇhai ।
tammi ya pariṇamamāṇaṁsi pōsahasālāō paḍinikkhamē paḍinikkhamittā hāē kayabalikammē kayakōuya-maṁgala-pāyacchittē
appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrē dhūvakaḍucchrayahatthagaē jēṇēva khaṁḍappavāyaguhāē uttarillē duvārē jēṇēva tāṇi kavāḍāṇi
tēṇēva uvāgacchai ālō paṇāmaṁ karēi karitā kavāḍē sakkārēi sammāṇēi aṭṭhaṭṭhamaṁgalē ālihai ālihittā taṁ divvaṁ
daṁḍarayaṇaṁ gahāya sattaṭṭapaē paccōsakkai paccōsikkittā tē kavāḍē tēṇa daṁḍarayaṇēṇa mahayā mahayā saddēṇa tikkhuttō
āuḍēi। taē ṇaṁ tē kavāḍā daṁḍarayaṇāhayā mahayā mahayā saddēṇaṁ kuṁcāravaṁ karēmāṇā sarasarassa vihaḍiyā । taē ṇaṁ sē
sēṇāvaī bharahassa ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccappiṇai । bharahē vi ya ṇaṁ gayavaī durūḍhē maṇirayaṇaṁ parāmusai tō taṁ cauraṁgulappamāṇaṁ
maṇirayaṇaṁ gahāya hatthirayaṇassa dāhiṇillāē kuṁbhīē nikkhivas tēṇa maṇirayaṇēṇa viṇihayatamaṁdhayārē sa balavāhaṇa-
khaṁḍappavāyaguhaṁ pavisai । kāgiṇīrayaṇēṇa ya ēgūṇapaṁcāsamaṁḍalāṇi ālihai । saṁkamakaraṇēṇa ummagganimmaggāō uttarai ।
tāō puṇa naīō paccatthimēllāō kaḍagāō pavūḍhāō puratthimillēṇaṁ gaṁgānahaṁ samappiti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē suhaṁ suhēṇaṁ
vahamāṇē tāva gaē jāva khaṁḍappavāyaguhāē dāhiṇillassa duvārassa kavāḍā tē puṇa sayaṁ cēva vihiḍiyā । taē ṇaṁ sē
bharāhivē sabalavāhaṇē tīē guhāē dāhiṇillēṇaṁ duvārēṇaṁ nīi । taē ṇaṁ sē rāyā gaṁgāē naīē paccatthimaṁsi kūlaṁsi
khaṁdhāvāranivēsa kāūṇa nihirayaṇē maṇasī kāūṇa aṭṭamabhattaṁ pariṇhai । taē ṇaṁ aṭṭhamabhattaṁsi pariṇamamāṇaṁsi aparimiya-
rattarayaṇā dhuvā akkhayā avvayā lōyavissuyajasā lōgōvacayakarā dēvakayapāsihērāō uvāgayā navanihaō taṁ jahā-
nēsappē paṁḍyaē piṁgalaē savvarayaṇatahā mahāpaumē । kālē ya mahākālē māṇavagamahānihī saṁkhē ।। 1793 ।।
nēsappammi nivēsā
khaṁdhāvā rāvaṇa- gihāṇaṁ ।। 1794 । ।
gāmāgara-nagara-paṭṭaṇāṇaṁ ca ।
dōṇamuha-maṁḍabāṇaṁ

jugāijiṇidacariyaṁ
gaṇiyassa ya uppattī māṇummāṇassa jaṁ pamāṇaṁ ca । dhaṇassa yavīyāṇa ya nippattī paṁḍuē bhaṇiyā ॥। 1795।।
savvā ābharaṇavihī purisāṇaṁ jā ya hōi mahilāṇaṁ । āsāṇa ya hatthīṇa ya piṁgalaganihimmi sā bhaṇiyā ।। 1796।।
rayaṇāṇi savvarayaṇē cōhasavi varāī cakkavaṭṭissa । uppajjaṁtē paṁcidiyāī ēgiṁdiyāī ca ।। 1797 ।।
vatthāṇa ya uppattī niṣpattī cēva savvabhattīṇaṁ । raṁgāṇa ya dhōvvāṇa ya savvā ēsā mahāpaumē ।।1798।।
kālē kālannāṇaṁ bhavvapurāṇaṁ ca tisu vi kālēsu । sippasayaṁ kammāṇi ya tiṇṇi payāē hiyakarāī ।। 1799 ॥
lōhassa ya uppattī hōṛa mahākālē āgarāṇaṁ ca । ruppassa suvaṇṇassa ya maṇi-mōttiya silappavālāṇaṁ ।। 1800 ।।
jōhāṇa ya uppattī āvaraṇāṇaṁ ca paharaṇāṇaṁ ca । savvā ya juddhanīī māṇavagē daṁḍanīī ya ।। 1801 ।।
naṭṭavihināgavihī kavvassa ya cauvvihassa uppattī । saṁkhē mahānihimmī tuḍiyaṁgāṇaṁ ca savvēsi ॥। 1802 ।।
cakkapaṭṭhāṇā aṭṭhassēhā ya nava ya vikkhaṁbhā । bārasadīhā maṁjūsasaṁṭhiyā jaṇhavīyamuhē ।। 1803 ।।
vēruliya-maṇikavāḍā kaṇagamayā viviha rayaṇa- paḍipuṇṇā । sasi sūra- cakka lakkhaṇa aṇuvamavayaṇōvavattīyā ।। 1804 ||
paliō maṭhiyā nihisarināmā ya tēsu khalu dēvā । jēsiṁ tē āvāsā akkējjā āhivaccā ya ।। 1805।।
ēē navanihirayaṇā pabhūya- dhaṇa rayaṇa-saṁcayasamiddhā । jē vasamaṇugacchaṁti bharahā hivacakkavaṭṭīṇaṁ || 1806।।
.
taē ṇaṁ bharahē rāyā nihirayaṇāṇaṁ aṭṭhāhiyaṁ mahimaṁ karēi । nivvattāē aṭṭhāhiyā mahimāē susēṇaṁ sēṇāvaī saddāvēi
saddāvaittā ēvaṁ vayāsī - " gaccha ṇaṁ tumaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā ! gaṁgāē puratthimillē dōccaṁ nikkhuḍaṁ ōyavēhi । sē vi ōyavēttā paḍiniyattē
samāṇē tamāṇattiyaṁ pañcappii bharahēṇa sakkā riyasammāṇiyapaḍivisajjiē māṇussagāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuṁjamāṇē viharai ।
taē ṇaṁ sē cakkarayaṇē aṇṇayā kayāī aṁtalikkha paḍivaṇṇē sāhiyachakkhaṁḍamēiṇītalē viṇīyābhimuhē payāē yāvi hōtthā ।
taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā hatthibaṁdhavaragaē ajjiyarajjē nijjiyasattū uppaṇṇa-sayala rayaṇappahāṇē navanihisamiddhakōsē battīsā
rāyavarasahassāṇugayamaggē saṭṭhīē vāsasahassēhiṁ kēvalakappaṁ bhārahavāsaṁ ōyavittā pahāē kayabalikammē kayakōuya-maṁgala-
pāyacchittē appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrē amaravaisannihāē riddhīē tihuyaṇapahiyakittī cakka - rayaṇadēsiyamaggē haya-gaya-
raha - jōi - cauvvihasēṇṇasannināēṇa pakkhubhiyasamuddaravabhūyaṁ piva mēiṇi karēmāṇē gāmāgara-nagara- khēḍa - kabbaḍa - maḍaṁba paṭṭāṇāsama
sannivēsāiṁ laṁghēmāṇē jōyaṇaṁtariyāhi vasahi vasamāṇē vasamāṇē viṇīyaṁ rāyahāṇi uvāgaē, adūrasāmaṁtē kayakhaṁdhāvāranivēsō
pōsahasālamaṇupavisai ṇiruvasaggapaccayaṁ viṇīyaṁ rāyahāṇi maṇasī karēmāṇē aṭṭamabhattaṁ pagiṇhai aṭṭamabhattaṁsi pari-
ṇamamāṇaṁsi pōsahasā lāō paḍinikkhamai paḍitikkhamittā aṇēgabhaḍa - bhōiyāisahiē pavaravihīē bhuttē samāṇē siṁhāsaṇavaragaē
saṁvacchariya nivēiē suhamuhuttē āsiya sammajjiōvalittaṁ usiyadhayapaḍāgaṁ parabhavaṇanibaddhavaṁdaṇamālaṁ maṁcāimaṁcakaliyaṁ siṁghāḍaga-
gatiya- caukka- caccara-caumuha - mahāpaha- pahēsu kaṇayaghaḍiyāsu ujjhamāṇakālāgaru-kuṁdurukka turukka kappūrapūraviṇissaraṁtadhūmaṁ -
dhayāriyanahayalaṁ viṇīyaṁ nayara pavisiumāraddhō ।
taē ṇaṁ bharahassa pavisamāṇassa bahavē atthatthiyā kāmatthiyā bhōgatthiyā pūsamāṇayā ēvaṁ vayāsī -- jaya jaya naṁdā !
jaya jaya naravasabhā ! bhaddaṁ tē ajiyaṁ jiṇāhi, sattuvakkhaṁ vijiyaṁ pālēhi bhārahaṁ vāsaṁ । iṁdō iva dēvāṇaṁ, caṁdō iva
tārayāṇaṁ, dharaṇō viva nāgāṇaṁ, bahuīō puvvakōḍākōḍīō viṇīyāē nayarīē cullahimavaṁta - giri-sāgara-mērāgayassa ya
sagāmāgara-nagara-khēḍakabbaḍa - maṁḍaba- dōṇamuha-paṭṭaṇāsama-sannivēsasahiyassa bhārahavāsassa samaṁ payāpālaṇōvajjiya-laddhajasē
mahayāīsariyaṁ karēmāṇē pālēmāṇē suhaṁ suhēṇaṁ viharāhi" tti kaṭṭa, abhinaṁdaṁti abhithuṇaṁti ya ।
taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē

bharavasavaṇṇaō
181
pancōrahara paccōrahittā sōlasadēvasahassē sakkārēi sammāṇēi paḍivisajjēi । ēvaṁ battīsaṁ rāyavarasahassē sēṇāvai
gāhāvai, vaḍḍhai, purōhiyarayaṇē tinni saṭṭā sūyāra- sayā
aṭṭhārasa sēṇippasēṇīō annē ya bahavē rāīsara - talavara
- māḍaṁbiya - kōḍuṁbiya sēṭṭhi-satthavāha - pabhiiō sakkāritā sammāṇittā paḍivisajjēi । itthīrayaṇēṇaṁ battīsāē pavara-
rāyannayā' sahassēhiṁ battīsāē ya jaṇavayappahāṇa kannayā' sahassēhi battīsāē ya battīsaibaddhēhi nāḍayasahassēhi saddhi
saṁparivaḍē kubērarāyā va kēlāsasiharisiṁgabhūyaṁ bhavaṇavaravaḍisayaṁ aṇupaviṭṭhē ।
taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā punvābhimuhē siṁhāsaṇavaranisapaṇē kayanāṇāvihakōūya-maṁgalōvayārē vivihasaṁkahā hiṁ
khaṇamēttamacchiūṇa majjaṇagharamaṇupavisa pavaramajjaṇavihīē majjiē mitta-nāi niyaga-sayaṇa saṁbaṁdhipariyaṇēṇa annēhi ya
bhaḍa bhōīēhi saddhi aṭṭamabhattāō pārēi upi pāsāyavaragaē phuṭṭaṁtēhi muiṁgamatthaēhi battīsaibaddhēhiṁ nāḍaēhi uvalāli-
jjamāṇē 2 uvagijjamāṇē mahayā haya-naṭṭa- gīya- vāiya-taṁtī- tala-tāla-muiṁgapaḍu - pavāiyaravēṇaṁ māṇussagāī bhōgabhōgāī bhuṁjamāṇē
viharaṛa ।
taē ṇaṁ tassa bharahassaraṇṇō aṇṇayā kayāi tē dēvāiyā mahārāyābhisēyaṁ kāukāmā bharaharāyāṇaṁ vinnavaṁti--
"jiē ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiēhi bhārahē vāsē, vasamuvāgayā vijjāharāiyā rāyāṇō tamaṇujāṇaha mahārāyābhisēyaṁ karēmō ।" bharahō
vitaṁ dēvāiyāṇa cavaṇamaṇumaṇṇai tē vi hadrutuṭṭhā kayaṁjalikō ābhiōgiyā dēvā viṇīyāē nayarīē uttarapuratthimē disībhāē
ēvaṁ mahaṁ abhisēyamaṁḍavaṁ viuvvisu viubvittā samuhōdagāṇi ya titthōdagāṇi ya mahādahōdagāṇi ya gaṁgōdagāṇi ya ṇāṇāvihāō
ōsahīō ya ubaṭṭavēṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā itthīrayaṇēṇaṁ sēsaṁtēurēṇa ya nāḍagasahassēhi ya saṁparivuḍē abhisēgamaṁḍavaṁ
aṇupavisas sasiṁhāsaṇaṁ ṇhāṇapēḍhamaṇupayāhiṇī karēmāṇē puratthimillēṇaṁ ti sōmāṇēṇaṁ duruhai, tā sīhāsaṇē paratthābhimuhē
nisaṇṇē । taē ṇaṁ tē battīsaṁ rāyavarasahassā uttarillēṇaṁ tisōmāṇēṇaṁ duruhaṁti duruhittā bharahassa raṇṇō naccāsapaṇē nāidūrē
niya-niya bhaddāsaṇagayā sussūsamāṇā nama̭samāṇā paṁjaliuḍā pajjuvāsiti । taē ṇaṁ sēṇāvairayaṇē gāhāvairayaṇē baḍḍhairayaṇē
purōhiyarayaṇē aṇṇē va bahavē sēṭṭhi satthavāhamāiyā dāhiṇillēṇaṁ ti sōmāṇēṇaṁ, duruhittā samuciyāsaṇē sannisaṇṇā kayaṁjaliṇō
ciṭhṭhati । taē ṇaṁ tē ābhiōgiyā dēvā mahatthaṁ mahagdhaṁ mahārihaṁ mahārāyābhisēyaṁ ubvaṭṭavēṁti । tāhē tē battīsaṁ rāyavara-
sahassā abhiōgiyā ya dēvā aṇṇēya sēṭṭhi-satthavāhapabhiīō sōhaṇaṁsi tihi karaṇa nakkhatta-muhuttaṁsi tēhiṁ tēhiṁ sābhāviēhiṁ
uttaravēubviēhi ya rayaṇakala sēhi kaṇayakalasēhi rayayakala sēhi varakamalapaṭṭāṇēhiṁ mahayā mahayā abhisēēṇaṁ abhisiṁcati 2 tā
pattēyaṁ pattēyaṁ karayalapariggahiyaṁ sirasāvattaṁ aṁjali matthaē kaṭṭa, jaēṇaṁ vijaēṇaṁ vaddhāviti vaddhāvittā pamhalasūmālāē gaṁdhakā-
sāīyāē gāyā lūhiti । mauḍaṁ siriusabhasaṁtiyaṁ sakka vi diṇṇaṁ piṇidhaṁti । tayaṇaṁtaraṁ daddaramalayasugaṁdhigaṁdhiēhiṁ gāyāī
surakuṁḍaṁ ti divvaṁ ca sumaṇadāmaṁ piṇaddhaṁti । divvaṁ dēvaṁsuyajuyalaṁ niyaṁsāviti । kiṁ bahuṇā kapparukkhaṁ piva alaṁkiyavibhūsiyaṁ
karēṁsu dēvā । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā kōḍuṁbiyapurisē sahāvēi sahāvēttā ēvaṁ vayāsī - - " khippāmēva bhō ! hatthikhaṁdhavaragayā
viṇīyanagara samaṁtaō hiḍiūṇa ussukaṁ ukkaraṁ adaṁḍimaṁ kudaṁḍimaṁ abhaṁḍappavēsaṁ duvāla sasaṁvaccharāṇi mahāpamōyakaliyaṁ karēha
kāravēha ya karēttā kāravēttā ya ēyamāṇattiyaṁ paccappiṇaha । tē vi tahēva karēttā paccappinaṁti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā
siṁhāsaṇāō abbhuṭṭhēi, abbhuṭṭhittā puratthimēṇaṁ tisōmāṇēṇaṁ paccōruhittā gayavaī durūḍhē rāyamāī vi jēṇaṁ durūḍhā tēṇaṁ ti
sōmāṇēṇaṁ paccōruhaṁti paccōruhittā samaṁtaō cakkaharaṁ parivārēti । taē ṇaṁ sē bharahē rāyā bahujaṇaparivāraparivariē
niyapāsāyavaḍēṁsayamā gaē । taē ṇaṁ cakkāhivē duvāla saṁvacchariyaṁsi pamōyaṁsi nivvattaṁsi samāṇaṁsi hāē kayabalikammē
kayakōūyamaṁgalapāyacchittē appamahagghābharaṇālaṁkiyasarīrē sakōrēṁṭadāmēṇaṁ chattēṇaṁ dharijjamāṇēṇaṁ sēyavaracāmarāhi uddhavvamāṇīhi 2
sasi vva piyadaṁsaṇēhi naravaī jēṇēva bāhiriyā ubaṭṭāṇasālā tēṇēva uvāgacchai uvāgacchitā siṁhāsaṇavaragatē sōlasadēva sahassē
sakkārēi sammāṇēi sammāṇittā paḍivisajjēi uppi pāsāyavarapaē visayasuhamaṇuhavamāṇē viharai । bharahassa ṇaṁ raṇṇō cakka-
rayaṇē chattarayaṇē daṁḍarayaṇē asirayaṇē ēē cattāri ēgidiyarayaṇā āuhagharasālāē samuppaṇṇā । cammarayaṇē maṇirayaṇē kāgiṇi-
1. kaṇṇayāṇa saha. pā. 1. ppahāṇā kanna pā. 3. pradaṁḍimaṁ prabhaṛa jē. ।

ca bahuṇaṁ rāīsara-talavara - māḍaṁbiya kōḍuṁbiya sēṭṭhisatthavāhappabhiīṇaṁ āhēvaccaṁ pōrēvanvaṁ sāmittaṁ bhaṭṭitaṁ āṇāīsariya

jaha paṁjarāō sauṇī ghaḍāō vayarāṇi kaṁcuyā 1 purisō । ēvaṁ na cēva bhinnō jīvō dēhā u saṁsārī ।। 1821 ॥
jaha khīrōdaga - tila tēllakusumagaṁdhāṇa na kīrai bhēō । taha cēva na jīvassa vi dēhādavvaṁ tiu bhēō ।। 1822 ।।
saṁkōya-vikōēhi jahakkamaṁ dēhalōyamēttō ya । kuṁthussa ya
। hatthissa ya paēsasaṁkhā samā cēva ।। 1823 ।।

gayaṇaṁ jahā arūvī avagāhaguṇēṇa ghēppaē taṁ tu । jīvō tahā arūvī viṣṇāṇaguṇēhiṁ ghētavvō ।।1825 ।।
jaha puḍhavī aviṇaṭṭā āhārō hōṛa savvajīvāṇaṁ । taha āhārō jīvō nāṇāīṇaṁ guṇagaṇāṇaṁ ।। 1826 । ।
akkhayamaṇaṁtamaulaṁ jaha gagaṇaṁ hōi tisu vi kālēsu taha jīvō aviṇāsī avaṭṭhiō tisu vi kāsu ।। 1827 ।।
jaha kaṇagāō kīraṁti pajjavā mauḍakuṁḍalāīyā | davvaṁ kaṇagaṁ taṁ ciya nāma visēsō ya sō annō ।। 1828 ।।
ēvaṁ cauggaīē paribbhimaṁtassa jīvakaṇagassa । nāmāī bahuvihāī davvaṁ ciya tayaṁ cēva ।। 1829 ।।
jaha kammakarō kammaṁ karēi jaṁ vavai taha phalaṁ tassa । taha jīvō viya kamma karēi bhuṁjai ya tassa phalaṁ ।। 1830 ।।
ujjōvēuṁ divasaṁ jahai sūrō vaccaē puṇō atthaṁ । na ya dīsai sō sūrō aṇṇaṁ khēttaṁ payāsēṁtō ।। 1831।।
jaha sūrō taha jīvō bhavaṁtaraṁ vaccaē puṇō annaṁ । tattha vi sarīramaṇṇaṁ khēttaṁ varavī paga sēi ।। 1832 ।।
'puppha-phala- kamalāṇaṁ caṁdaṇa-agarūṇa surahigaṁdhāṇaṁ । ghēppara nāsāiguṇō nayarūvaṁ tēsi || 1833 ||
ēyaṁ nāṇaguṇēṇaṁ ghēppai jīvō u buddhimaṁtēhi । jaha gaṁdhō taha jīvō na hu sakkā tīraē ghēttuṁ ।। 1834 ||

paccakkhaṁ gahagahiyō dīsai purisō na dīsai pisāō । āgārēhiṁ muṇijjai ēvaṁ jīvō vi dēhaṭṭiō ।। 1836 ।।

aṇumāṇahēu siddhaṁ chaumatthāṇaṁ jiṇāṇa paccakkhaṁ । gēhasu gaṇaharajīvaṁ aṇāiyaṁ akkhayamakhvaṁ ।। 1838 । ।
kahiō jīvasahāvō jahaṭṭhiō jō taē purā puṭṭhō । ēttō kammavibhāgaṁ baṁdhavihāṇaṁ nisāmēhi ।। 1839||
iṁdiya kasāya-maya- gārakhēhi annāṇa-rāga-dōsēhiṁ । baṁdhai jīvō
jīvō kammaṁ nāṇāvaraṇāiaṭṭhavihaṁ ।। 1840 ।।
jaha āhārō bhuttō jiyāṇa pariṇamai sattabhēēhiṁ । rasa-sōṇiyamaṁsaṭṭhī majjā taha mēyasukkēhi || 1841 ।।
jīvō vi tahā jāṇasu suhāsuhaṁ vivihakaraṇajōgēhi । rāga-dōsavasagaō aṭṭhavihaṁ baṁdhaē kammaṁ || 1842॥
nāṇāvaraṇaṁ paḍhamaṁ bīyaṁ taha hōi daṁsaṇāvaraṇaṁ । taiyaṁ ca vēyaṇijjaṁ cautthagaṁ hōi mōhaṇīyaṁ ।। 1843 ।।
āuyakammaṁ bhaṇiyaṁ ca paṁcamaṁ chaṭṭha gaṁ bhavē nāmaṁ । sattamagaṁ puṇa guttaṁ aṭṭhamagaṁ aṁtarāyaṁ ca ।। 1844 ।।

jīvassa ya kammassa ya aṇāīmaṁ cēva hōi saṁjōgō । sō vi uvāēṇa puḍhō kīraṛa uvalāō jaha kaṇagaṁ ।। 1846।।

jaha aṁḍasaṁbhavā kukkuḍa tti aṁḍaṁ pi kukkuḍīpabhavaṁ । na ya puvvāvarabhāvō jahēha taha jīvakammāṇaṁ ।। 1848 ।।
jīvō kamma ca aṇāisaṁbhavaṁ saṁbhavaṁtapariṇāmaṁ । jīvassa baṁdhahēū sāhiyaṁtē nisāmēha ।। 1849 ।।
nāṇaṁ paṁcapayāraṁ payāsiyā sēsavatthuparamatthaṁ । jō tassa kuṇai niṁda sō asuhaṁ baṁdhaē kammaṁ ।। 1850 ।।

daṭṭhūṇa suṁdari naravarō vi mayaṇēṇa mōhiō saṁtō । bhaṇai sumaṁgala saṁpai sirammi mē vēyaṇā jāyā ॥। 2081 ।।

ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa gaō niyabhavaṇē dummaṇō narariṁdō । vāsagharammi nuvaṇṇō sēvāgayamaṁtiṇā diṭṭhō ।। 2083 ।।
puṭṭhō ya paṇa maūṇaṁ kahēsu jai dēva ! hōi kahaṇijjaṁ । kimimaṁ tumha sarīrē athakkāyallayaṁ jāyaṁ ॥ 2084 ॥
bhai nivō suṇa kajjaṁ jai sā sēṭṭhissa aṁgayā majjhaṁ । na havai ghariṇī tō mē maraṇaṁ saraṇaṁ na saṁdēhō ॥2085 ॥
nēhaḍulā juyāri jimva saviralu bhallā hōi । aṇu nēhu na kijjaī jaṁ tu saraḍḍhī hōi ।। 2086 ।।
jaṁ tu saraḍḍhī hōi lōivayaṇijjaṁ dāvai । kijjaṁtu vi ai ghaṇau nēhu māṇusa saṁtāvai || 2087 ||
sō vilu sayalu rasālu hōi na vi vihaḍai vahilu । jimva jōyārihicchōḍ tēmva piyajaṇi nēhu ḍulā ।।2088।।
iya bhaṇiya bhai maṁtī sāmiya hatthāgayaṁ imaṁ kajjaṁ । jaṁ sō maha sāhīṇō sumaṁgalō suṁdarī jaṇaō || 2089 ।।
gaṁtūṇa tassabhavaṇaṁ sāmēṇa naēṇa taha uvāēṇa । bhaṇiūṇa nēgamavaraṁ jahā dēi tahā karissāmi ॥। 2090 ।।

aha bhaṇai kurukumārō kurujaṇavaisāmiō kayaṁjaliō । ghara-gharaṇi-puttapāsāvamōyaṇaṁ dukkaraṁ sāmi ।।2178 ।।

bhai jiṇō ēstō cciya dulahō savvaṇṇudēsiō dhammō । jaṁ mōhamōhiyamaṇā dhammammi maī na kubvaṁti ।। 2180 ।।
aha kahavi hōi cittaṁ kammōvasamēṇa kassa vi jiyassa | jigavayaṇāmiyabhariyaṁ dhammāyariyaṁ na pāvēi ।। 2181 ।।

atthi ihēva bhārahēvāsē samuddōvamaṁ gaṁṭhasaṁṭhiyaṁ saṁsārapuraṁ nāma nayaraṁ । tammi ya uvarayajaṇaṇi jaṇayā abhavva

siddhipuranivāsiṇō, mahāmōha - aimōha - saṁmōha-mōha khīṇamōhanāmāṇō paṁca satthavāhā । narayagai-tiriyagai-maṇuyagai-dēvagaḍa-
siddhigaināmiyāō niya-niya - duhiyarō gahāya samuciyavarē gavēsayaṁtā sahiyā cēva saṁsārapuramāgayā । iō taō
varagavēsaṇaṁ kuṇaṁtā tēhi diṭṭhā dhammaviyā raṁ kuṇaṁtā abhavvāiyā paṁca vi kulaputtayā । ahō kimēē payaṁpaṁti mahāmōhāiyā
savihē hōūṇa sōumāraddhā | abhavvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "na dhammō na dhammiyā na paralōō ēvamēva dhattavaṁciō paramatthamayāṇaṁtō

"khāyaṁta-piyaṁtāṇa jō dhammō sō dhammō, sō puṇa atimōhassa cittē caḍiō ।" bhavvēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ -- "addhamadvēṇa dhammāhammā

vijjhamāṇakammidhaṇāṇa vacvaṁti vāsarā । annayā arcitasāmatthayāē jīvavīriyasassa vicittayāē kammapariṇāmassa
nidr̥ḍḍhaghaṇaghāikammidhaṇāṇa samuppaṇṇaṁ kēvalanāṇaṁ ruhadēva ḍaṁgarāṇaṁ । kuṇālēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - " kahaṁ tahāvihapariṇāmā vi hōūṇa
lahuṁ cēva kēvalanāṇaṁ pāviyā ?" bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ - "acitākammapariṇaī । aō cēva--
---
nāṇaguṇaḍīṇa vi supurisāṇa jai kahavi hōi vayaṇijjaṁ । na hu tē tēṇaṁ ciya huṁti hīlaṇijjā sayannāṇaṁ ।। 2227 ।।
jāē vi cukkakhaliē garuyā na hu huṁti nīyasāricchā । sarasalliō visīhō na havai sarisō siyālāṇaṁ ।। 2228॥
jai kaha vi hōi khalaṇā garuyāṇa vi garuyakammadōsēṇa । garūyayaraṁ paḍiyāraṁ kāūṇa havaṁti garūyayarā ।। 2229 ।।

cikkaṇa - cikkhallataḍē gurubhārakkaṁtakaṁdharō dhavalō । paḍiō vi uṭṭiūṇaṁ kinna bharaṁ nēī tīrammi ।। 2231 ।।
jai kaha vi sīhapōō cukkakamō hatthimatthayā lhasiō । tā ki kāūṇa kamaṁ puṇō vi na hu dalai karikuṁbhaṁ ।। 2232 । ।
jai kaha vi asaṁṭhaviō malamaliṇō hōi jaccavēruliō । tā kiṁ sōhijjatō puṇō vi na hu hōi kaṁtillō ।। 2233।।

bhaṇiyagahīyā suvōddēṇa sāhiō sāhaṇavihī । kayatthamattāṇayaṁ mannatō gaō suivōddō niyagharaṁ । kayā sāhaṇasāmaggī ।

vilakkhavayaṇō puṇō vi gaō māya gasamīvaṁ । pucchiō māyaṁgēṇa - - " kimāgamaṇakāraṇaṁ ? tēṇa vi kahiyaṁ jahāvaṭṭhiyaṁ ।
māyaṁgēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - puṇō vi " vijjaṁ giṇha imaṁ vā vijjābhimaṁtiyaṁ paḍaṁ । ēsō vipūyā purassaraṁ jahicchiyadāyagō bhē bhavissai ।
gahiō paṇāmapurassaraṁ suvōddēṇa pahō । caliō niyadēsābhimuhaṁ । vaccatassa aṁtarā cēva gahiō takkarēhi paḍō ।
vivaṇṇavayaṇō puṇō vi caliō suivōhō । samāgaō māyaṁgapāyamūlē kahiō paḍa-baiyarō | dinnō tēṇa vijjābhimaṁtiō
ghaḍō kahiō vihī sō vi taṁ gahāya niyagharaṁ gaō । pūiūṇa patthiō ghaḍō । dinaṁ ghaḍēṇa jaṁ maggiyaṁ । taō suhisayaṇajaṇaṁ
bhuṁjāviya tammajhagaō । ahō mē ghaḍāṇubhāvēṇa paṇaṭṭha dāriddaṁ ti jaṁpatō harisavasavisappamāṇamāṇasō ghaḍaṁ khaṁdhē nacciu-
māraddhō । pariōsa pabbhaṭṭacittassa' paḍiō ghaḍō baṁdhāō । bhaggō ya, puṇō vi gaō māyaṁgasagāsaṁ । māyaṁgēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ-
"ēttiyā cēva maha vijja। na puṇō maha samīvē samāgaṁtavvaṁ ti । bhaṇiya visajjiō gatō sagihaṁ viddāṇavayaṇō diṇamai-
vāhiūṇa rayaṇīē suhapasuttō । pēcchai sēyavasaṇanivasaṇaṁ majjhimavara vaṭṭamāṇamēgamitthiyaṁ । sasaṁbhramamuṭṭhiō kāūṇa paṇāmaṁ
suivōddō pucchyiāiō - - " bhagavai ! kā tumaṁ ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - jā taē pāēṇa pēlliyā sā cēva tuha gharalacchī ।" tēṇa
bhaṇiyaṁ - " kahiṁ gayā asi ?" tīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " māyaṁgagharē ।” tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ kō māyaṁgō ?" lacchīē bhaṇiyaṁ -- "jassa
sēvaṁ kuṇaṁtēṇaṁ cirakālamaggāṇulaggēṇa pāṇahāō vahatēṇa appā taē parikilēsigō | tēṇa bhaṇiyaṁ - "iha kimētthamāgayā ?” tīē

ubbhiyabhyaē ēvaṁ diṇē - diṇē payaṁpēi । aṇṇammi diṇē ēyaṁ suṇiya pucchiō bhōgadēvēṇa -- "vaccha ! kō ēyassa jaṁpiyassa

cēva gharassa sāmiō jāō । aō ēyaṁ payaṁpēmi ।" ēvaṁ suṇiya jāō kēvalivayaṇē bhōgadēvassa paccaō dāṇabahumāṇō ya ।
aṇṇāmma dinē bhikkhaṭṭā paviṭṭhēṇa diṭṭhō aisayanāṇiṇā guṇaṁdharasāhuṇā । bhaṇiyā ya-- “bhō bālaya ! na ēgaṁtēṇa

tumbhēhi kammaṁ kāyavvaṁ । ēsa puṇa puttagō na vi māṇēyavvō mahallagō saṁtō ēsō vi maha gharē kammayarō bhavissai ।
paḍivaṇṇamaṇēhiṁ tahēva kuṇaṁtāṇa vaccaṁti vāsarā । aṇṇammi dinē bhōgadēvō rayaṇīē suhapasuttō mahilā juyalassa saṁlāvaṁ
suṇēi । ēgā bhaṇai bhaiṇi ! kā tumaṁ ? " bīyāē bhaṇiyaṁ - " bhōgadēvagharalacchī" iyarīē bhaṇiyaṁ - " kusalaṁ tē ।" tīē
bhaṇiyaṁ-” avarāvaradāṇa-bhōgakajjāsattēṇa bhōgadēvēṇa vā varijjamāṇīē āṇāsārasāmi kammayarīē viva kattō mē kusalaṁ ?

pakkhittā kattō mē suhavāsō ? niraṁtaraṁ nirōha - dukkhadukkhiyā dukkhaṁ vasāmi ।" bhōgadēvēṇa citiyaṁ" dō vi dukkhiyāō ।
ahō lacchīē natthi thirīkaraṇōvāō । ēsā hi lacchī na sōha sajjhā' na nāsā ya sajjhā na bhattigijjhā na rakkhaṇatō
sirī । dāṇabhōgarōsirī uvayārakāriṇō vi dōsapōsirī visamasīlā na najjai kahamaṇuṇēvvā । jāvajjavi na muyai
tāva imīē cāō cēva sāhuṇō' tti, citiūṇa gaō niyanayarē । kāūṇa jigasāhupūyaṁ dāūṇa dīṇāṇāhāṇa dāṇaṁ

bīyā ghariṇī pariṇīyā sā alacchī, tīē saha natthi maha ēgattha vāsō puṇō daṁsaṇaṁ" ti bhaṇiya adaṁsaṇaṁ gayā sirī ।
bhujjō vi taṁ caiva dāliddaṁ sō cēva jaṇaparābhavō' siridēvassa ।

bhūō ।
aṇṇayā samāgaō bhagavaō samīvē dūrabhaviō kavilō nāma rāyauttō । nisuō sāmisamīvē dhammō । na bhāviō
cittē, vilakkhaṇaṁ daṭṭhūṇa gaō miriissa samīvē pucchiō dhammō । sō bhai -- “ natthēttha dhammō gaccha bhagavaō samīvē”।
puṇō vi gaō । amayabhūyaṁ pi niyakammadōsēṇa na ruiyaṁ bhagavaō vayaṇaṁ । puṇō vi samāgaō । miriī bhaṇai - - "ki
tuha samīvē jō vā sō vā dhammō natthi ?" maṁdadhammō dūrabhaviō maha samō cēva ēsa cēva kōi vihiṇā ghaḍiō ।
havau maha cēva sahāyagō" tti citiūṇa bhaṇiyamaṇēṇa - - " kavilā ! itthaṁ pi dhammō ihaṁ pi dhammō ।" ēvaṁ ca bhaṇatēṇa
nivvattiō sāgarōvamakōḍākōḍīpamāṇō guvilō bhavōdahī । bhaṇiyaṁ ca--
dubbhāsiēṇa ēkkēṇa miriī dukkhasāgaraṁ pattō । bhamiō kōḍākōḍī sāgarasarināmadhējjāṇaṁ ।। 2685 ।।
dikkhiō kavilō jāō sahāō parivvāya gapāsaṁḍaparūvaṇēṇa vaḍḍhiyaṁ micchattaṁ ।।2686॥
aṇṇayā gāmāgara-nagara- khēḍa - kabbaḍa - maḍaṁba - dōṇamuha-paṭṭaṇāsama-saṁnivēsa -saṁvāha - saṁkaḍaṁ mahīmaṁḍalaṁ viharaṁtō bahusamaṇa-
samaṇisahiō viṇīyanayarīē purimatālujjāṇē ahāphāsuē paēsē samōsaḍhō । juyāi jiṇavarō samappiūṇa pāḍihāriyaṁ
pīḍha - phalagamāiyaṁ sāhūṇa saharisamāgaṁtūṇa vaddhāviō niuttapurisēhi bharahāhiyō ।” jassa ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā daṁsaṇaṁ patyaṁti
jassa ṇaṁ dēvāṇuppiyā nāma gōyassa vi savaṇayāē kimaṁga puṇa daṁsaṇayāē harisavasa - visappamāṇahiyayā bhavaṁti' sē ṇaṁ
niggaṁthassa pavayaṇassa dēsaē nāyaē paṭṭhāvara aṇēgasamaṇasaya sahassāhivaī samaṇagahagaṇacaṁdaparivaḍḍhaē cōttīsabuddhāisaya
saṁpannē āgāsagaēṇaṁ cakkēṇaṁ āgāsagaēṇaṁ chattēṇaṁ āgāsagaēṇaṁ phaliyāmaēṇaṁ sapāyapīḍhēṇaṁ siṁhāsaṇēṇaṁ । sēyavaracāmarāhi

bharahasamakkhaṁ sakkō paṇamiūṇa bhagavaṁtaṁ bhaṇai -- "bhayavaṁ ! kaivihō avaggahō havai ? bhagavayā bhaṇiyaṁ -- “sakkā !
paṁcavihō taṁ jahā -- dēviṁdarāya - gahavaḥ - sāgārisāhammaavaggahō cēva । paṁcavihō avaggahō pariṇāmavasēṇa suhahēū ।
tattha dāhiṇaḍḍhaṁ sōhammāhivaiṇō, uttaraḍhaṁ īsāṇidassa, chakkhaṁḍabharahaṁ bharahāhivaiṇō, aṁgāī jaṇavayaṁ, gihavaiṇō ā-
samāvaggahaṁ, vasahivaiṇō sāhammiyāvaggahō, jaiṇō ēsa paṁcavihō vi" avaggahō sāhūṇa viyarijjatō pariṇāmavisēsēṇa
sivasuhasāhagō । kiṁ na suō taē jalaṇappahō nāma māhaṇasuō paṁcavihāvaggahapayāṇēṇa muhaparaṁparāē paramapayaṁ pāviō ?”
surasāmiṇā bhaṇiyaṁ -- "bhayavaṁ ! kō ēsa jalaṇappahō ? kahaṁ vā paṁcavihāvaggahapayāṇēṇa paramapayaṁ pāviō ?" bhagavayā
bhaṇiyaṁ -- "surapahu ! suṇahu sāvahāṇō । ”

tahiṁ vi tava mukkō pahāya samaē puṇō vi saṁpattō । vaḍavāsiṇīē puraō sakōvaṁ bhaṇiumādattō
jai dēvi na dēsi dhaṇaṁtā niyahatthēṇa kinna mārēsi । mārā viyāṇa taha māriyāṇa bhaṇa kō kira visēsō
i bhaṇiya puṇō paḍiō jalaṇappahō cattalajjamajjāō । aṇṇammi diṇē kuladēvayāē saṁjāyakaruṇāē
udvāḍiō na uṭṭhai bhai ya jai dēsi maha sahatthēṇa । siddhasarūvaṁ atthaṁ tō bhuṁjē nannahā dēvi
tō tīē aṭṭharayaṇā hasiūṇa samappiyā sahatthēṇa । bhaṇiō vacca sagēhaṁ gahiūṇa diō vi sō caliō
ēgāgī baccaṁtō dīhaddhākhēyakhēiyasarīrō । sunnāraṇē vaḍapāyavassa mūlē
uttariūṇa vaḍāō makkaḍarūvēṇa vaḍasihō jakkhō । saṇiyaṁ saṇiyaṁ gēṇhai taṁ
sahasa tti sō vibuddhō pēcchai taṁ makkaḍaṁ gahiyagaṭhi । pacchā muhaṁ niyaṁtaṁ
tēṇa vi pavaṁgamēṇaṁ nēūṇa samappiyāṇi rayaṇāṇi । vaḍavāsiṇī vi hasiūṇa bhaṇai lahuṁ khivasu bhaṁḍārō
valiō vilakkhavayaṇō kuddhō kuladēvayaṁ abhisavaṁtō' । nāhaṁ naya sā saṁpai niyāṇamēyaṁ ti jaṁpatō

aṇṇammi dinē bharahō sāvaē saddāviya bhaṇai - " mā tubbhē āraṁbhaparapēsaṇāiyaṁ kukammaṁ karēha, ahaṁ bhē vittiṁ pakappēmi ।

cāusi uddipuṇṇamāsiṇīsu savisēsāṇdvāṇaparāyaṇēhiṁ jiṇa sāhu-caraṇakamalabhasalattaṇaṁ bhayaṁtēhi acchiyavvaṁ" । tēhi vi
tava paḍivannaṁ । bhuṁjaṁti paīdiṇaṁ bharahagharē । annayā bhaṇiyā tē bharahēṇa -- “ jayā bhē bhuttaṁ bhavai tayā savvēhi vi miliūṇa
saha savaṇagōyarē mahayā mahayā saddēṇa ēvaṁ paryāpayavvaṁ - 'jiō bhavaṁ vaṭṭaē bhayaṁ tamhā mā haṇa haṇa haṇa" tē vi tahēva

raṁbhapasattaṁ mamaṁ saṁbhārēṁti । ahō mē visayāmisaluddhayā ! 1 ahō mē saṁsārābhinaṁdittaṇaṁ ! ahō mē dhammē udāsīṇayā ! ahō

khippara । ēvaṁ sarai saṁsārō ।
•
aṇṇammi dinē vinnattō mahāṇasiēhi "dēva bhōyaṇavēlāē alavakhā saṁkhā sāvayāṇa na najjai sāvayāsāvayavisēsō
aṇavatthā ēsā । jai vi jammaṁtarōvajjiyasuhōdaēṇa savvaṁ saṁpajjai sāmi sālagharē taha vi vayamasamatthā pāgaṁ karitaē ।"
taṁ suṇiya bharahō bhaṇai - - " suparikhiē kāūṇa bhuṁjāvēha ।" taō tē parikkhiumāraddhā kō bhavaṁ sāvaō kai
sāvayāṇa vayāṇi ?” sō bhai - - " na saṁti sāvayāṇa vayāṇi । sammattamūlāpaṁcāṇuvvayāṇi sattasivakhāvayāṇi cēva sāvaya-
dhammō ।" ēvaṁ jē sāvayadhammakuṁsalā tē puḍhō kāūṇa raṇṇō uvaṇiyā nāṇa- daṁsaṇa- dēsaca raṇadharatti kāgiṇīrayaṇēṇa
tihi rēhāhi laṁchiyā । chaṭṭhē chaṭṭhē māsē puṇō vi aṇuōgō kīrai । parikkhā nivvaḍiyā puṇō vi kāgiṇīrayaṇēṇa
laṁchijjaṁti bhōyaṇaṁ ca lahaṁti sēsā paḍisēhijjati । paidiṇaṁ bharahasīhaduvārē 'jiō bhavaṁ vaḍḍhaē bhayaṁ tamhā māhaṇatti'
bhaṇaṁti । taō tē lōē māhaṇa tti pasiddhi gayā । tē vi niyaputtabhaṁḍāṇi saṁvaḍḍhiyāṇi sāhūṇa samappaṁti jai nittharaṁti
tō samaṇadhammaṁ giti । aha nō tāhē ahigayajīvājīvā ittāṇi sāhusussūsaṇā parāyaṇāṇi sāvagāṇi bhavaṁti । annō
vi jaṛa kō vi tāṇa samīvē saṁbujjhai । tā taṁ pi jai icchā samaṇadhammaṁ gārhati bharahēṇa dinaṁti lōgō vi tāṇa dāṇaṁ
dāumāraddhō । bharahēṇa cēva tāṇa sajjhāyanimittaṁ titthayarathui - - 'sāhu sāvaya-sāmāyārī saṁti-kammapurassaraṁ āyariyā vēyā
kayā ēvaṁ vaccai kālō ।

muṇisuvvayanāmāō gaēhiṁ chahiṁ varisasayasahassēhiṁ । dasavarisasahassā u hōhī namināmatitthayarō ।। 3132 ।।
samaikkaṁtēhiṁ taō paṁcahi varisāṇa sayasa hassēhiṁ । saṁvaccharasahassāū ariṭṭhanēmī jiṇō hōhī
tīsāē sahassēhi varisāṇadr̥ddhamēhi ya saēhi । nēmijiṇāō hōhī varisasayāū jiṇō
aḍhāijjasaēhi gaēhi varisāṇa pāsanāmāō । bāvattarivāsāū hōhī carimō
munisuvvayanēmijiṇā ēē hōhiṁti gōyamasagōttā | avasēsā titthayarā kāsavagōttā
jammōvajjhapurīē hōhī ajiyassa jiṇavariṁdassa । sāvatthīē purīē
abhinaṁdaṇajiṇajammō hōhī viṇiyāē rāyahāṇīē । sumaissa kōsalaurē
vāṇārasīē jammō supāsanāmassa jiṇavariṁdassa । caṁdāṇaṇammi nayarē jammō caṁdappahajiṇassa
kāyaṁdīē purīē jammō suvihissa titthanāhassa । bhaddilapura mmi jammō hōhī sirisīyalajiṇassa
sīhapurē sējjaṁsō hōhī caṁpāē vāsupujjajiṇō । kaṁpillapurē vimalō
taha rayaṇapuravarammī jammō titthāhivassa dhammassa । saṁtissa ya kuṁthussa ya arassa tihūṁ gayaurammi
mallījiṇassuppattī mihilāē suvvayassa rāyagihē । mihilāpurīē namiṇō sōriyanayarammi nēmissa
vāṇārasīē jammō hōhī pāsassa bhuvaṇanāhassa । khattiyakuṁḍaggāmē jammō sirivaddhamāṇassa
vijayā ya tahā sēṇā siddhatthā cēva maṁgalā । susīmā puhavī nāmā
māmā naṁdā ya viṇ ya jayā rāmā tahēva ya । sujasā suvvayā cēva airā ya sirī tahā
dēvī pabhāvaī cēva paumāvaī tahēva ya । tahā vappā sivā cēva vammā ya tisalā tahā
jiyasatta ya jiyārī saṁvararāyā ya mēharāyā ya । dharō paiṭṭhō mahasēṇanaravarō taha ya suggīvō
daḍharahanivō ya viṣahū vasupujjanarāhivō ya kayavammō । taha sīhasēṇarāyā bhāṇū taha vissasēṇō ya
sūrō sudaṁsaṇō taha kuṁbhō ya sumittanaravaī cēva । vijaō samuha vijaō ya assasēṇō ya
bhaṇiyāṇi jiṇavarāṇaṁ ammā-piyarāṇa nāmadhēyāṇi । iṇhi ajiyāiṇa pariyāyaṁ saṁpavakkhāmi
puvvāṇa sayasahassaṁ puvvaṁgūṇaṁ tu ajiyapajjāō । cauraṁgūṇaṁ lakkhaṁ saṁbhavanāhassa pajjāō
puvvaṁgaddhavihīṇaṁ lakkhaṁ puvvāṇa taiyatitthayarō । bārasapuvvaṁgūṇaṁ lakkhaṁ puvvāṇa
sōlasapubvaṁgūṇaṁ puvvāṇaṁ lakkhamēva paumābhē l puvvāṇa sayasahassaṁ vīsaṁguṇaṁ
cavīsa gavihīṇō lakkhō caṁdappahassa pariyāō । aṭṭhāvīsaṁguṇō lakkhō puvvāṇa
paṇuvīsasahassāī putrvāṇaṁ sīyalassa pajjāō । igavīsavarisalakkhā sējjaṁsajiṇassa
cauppaṇṇavarisalakkhā pariyāō vāsupūjjanāhassa । paṇṇarasavarisalakkhā vimalajiṇidassa
amalakkhāī varisāṇamaṇaṁtajinavaridassa aḍaḍhāijjā lakkhā varisāṇaṁ dhammanāhassa
paṇuvīsasahassāī vāsāṇaṁ saṁtijiṇavaridassa । tēvīsaṁ ca sahassā kuṁthujiṇēddhaṭṭhamasayāī
igavīsasahassā vāsāṇamarassa samaṇapariyāō । cauppaṇṇasahassāī navavarisasayāī mallisa
addhamā sahassā vāsāṇaṁ suvvayassa pariyāō । aḍhāijjasahassā vāsāṇaṁ namijiṇidassa
sattēva ya vāsasayā hōhī pariyāō nēmināhassa । sattarivarisāī tahā pāsajiṇidassa pariyāō
lakkhaṇā hōi sattamā

maṇisuvvayana miṇō aṁtarammi hōhiṁti paumaharisēṇā । naminēmijiṇidāṇaṁtarammi jayanāmaō cakkī
nēmissa ya pāsassa ya jiṇaṁtarē baṁbhadattacakkahō । aha āūṇi imēsi bharahāhiva saṁpavakkhāmi

cakkaha rabaladdhabalā nikhaṁḍamahimaṁḍalassa bhōttārō । navabaladēvā navakēsavā ya hōhiti iha bharahē
tiviṭṭhū yaduviṭṭhū ya sayaṁbhupurisōttimē purirasasīhē । taha purisapuṁḍarīē dattē nārāyaṇē kaṇhē
ayalē vijaē bhaddē suppabhē ya sudaṁsaṇē । āṇaṁdē ṇaṁdaṇē paumē rāmē yā yā vi apacchimē
āsaggīvē tāraē mēraē mahukēḍhavē nisuṁbhē ya । balipaharāē taha rāmaṇē ya navamē jarāsiṁdhū
ēē khalu paḍisattū kitīpurisāṇa vāsudēvāṇaṁ । savvē vi cakkajōhī savvē vi hayā sacavakēhiṁ
nīluppaladalavaṇṇā savvē vi hu kēsavā muṇēyavvā । himaya raha rahā sasamappahā ya halahariṇō savvē
asi dhayiṁga tiviṭṭhanāmēṇa kēsavō paḍhamō । sattarisarāsaṇāī
sattarisarāsaṇāī samr̥siyaṁgō dubiṭṭū ya
saṭṭī cāvasamūsiyadēhō kēsī sayaṁbhunāmēṇa । taha pannāsadhaṇūsiyadēhō
paṇayālīsa sarāsaṇasamūsiō purisasīhanāmō tti । taha purisapuṁḍarīō ēgūṇatīsaṁ dhaṇupamāṇō ॥3203 ।।
chavvīsadhaṇupamāṇō dattō nāmēṇa kēsavō hōhō | sōlasadhaṇūsiyaṁgō nārāyaṇanāmaō kēsī
taha dasasarāsaṇāī samūsiō kaṇhanāmaō kēsī । jaṁ cēva taṇupamāṇaṁ harīṇa taha halaharāṇaṁ
sēyaṁsammi tiviṭṭhū kēsiduviṭṭha ya vāsupujjammi । vimalē sayaṁbhunāmā purisōttimaṇaṁtaijiṇammi
dhammammi purisasīhō paṁca imē jiṇavarē namasaṁti । taha purisapuṁḍarīō dattō aramalliaṁtaraē
nārāyaṇakēsī puṇa muṇisuvvayanamijiṇāṇa aṁtaraē । nēmikamakamalabhasalō hōhī kaṇhō tti pacchimaō
caurāsī saṁvaccharalakkhā āū tiviṭṭhū nāmassa | bāvattarisaṁvaccharalakkhā āū duviṭṭussa
taha saṭṭivarilakkhā āummi sayaṁbhunāmakēsissa । varisāṇa tīsa lakkha । purisōttimakēsavassāuṁ
dasavarisasayasahassā āu kēsissa purisasīhassa । taha purisapuṁḍarīē pannaṭṭhīvāsasahassāiṁ
chappaṇṇavarisasahasā āuṁ dattābhihāṇa kēsissa । nārāyaṇassa bārasavarisasahassaṁ ca kaṇhassa
paṁcāsī saṁvaccharalakkhā āuṁ balassa ayalassa । paṇasayarisaya sahassā āuṁ baladēvavijayassa
paṇa dvivaralakkhā āuṁ balabhaddabhaddanāmassa । paṇapannavarisalakhā suppabhanāmassa āummi
sattaravarilakkhā baladēvasudaṁsaṇassa āummi । paṁcāsī saṁvaccharasahassa āṇaṁdassa āummi
patravirisasahasā naṁdaṇanāmassa āuyaṁ hōhī । pannarasavarisasahassā āuṁ baladēvapaumassa
bārasavarisasayāī āuṁ ।

pōyaṇapurē bhavissati tiviṭṭunāmēṇa paḍhamamahumahaṇō । bāravaīē duviṭṭhū sayaṁbhupurisōttimō cēva

taṁ vayaṇaṁ sōūṇaṁ tivaī apphōḍiūṇa tikkhuttō । anbhahiyajāyaharisō miridda imaṁ

ēgattō majjha kulaṁ annattō tulai tihūyaṇaṁ sayalaṁ । ēgattō maha jāī annattō maṁdarō mērū

taha maha kulaṁ pahāṇaṁ savvakulāṇaṁ pi majjhayārammi । iya bhaṇirēṇa nibaddhaṁ nīyā gōttaṁ duhavivāgaṁ
bharaō vi vaṁdiyatayaṁ puṇō vi risahēsaraṁ paṇamiūṇa । cauraṁgabalasamēō viṇīyanayari aṇupaviṭṭō
aha bhaṇai bhuvaṇanāhō risahō saṁjaṇiyatihuyaṇāṇaṁdō । parahiyakaraṇēvakaraī paramappā paramakāruṇiō
viyasiyapuṁḍarīyamuhaṁ puṁḍarīyaṁ vimalakamaladalanayaṇaṁ । guṇahāri jaṇahāri bharahasuyaṁ bhuvaṇasupasiddhaṁ
puṁḍariya! vaccasu tumaṁ suraṭṭhāvisayammi niyayagaṇasahiō । mahi-mahilabhālatilaō asthi girī tattha sētuṁjō
tammi samārūḍhē dujjayaghaṇaghāikammamukkāṇaṁ । hōhī khētuṇubhāvā kēvalanāṇuppayā

punnāga - nāga-sīvannisa rasasayārapamuhaviḍavillā
ricchaṁcha- bhalla - saddala sarahahari-makkaḍakkaṁtā
tattha yadīharaasviḍavikōṭṭarēsu ya mihuṇagaṁ vasai । tassa kaha kaha vi jāō salakkhaṇō sūyagō ēgō
pakkhānilapaidiṇacūṇidāṇaō vaḍhiō ya sō tēhi । thēvōvaladdhanahagamaṇasattijuttōnnadiyahamma
tāvalayāē nīḍā uḍittā jāva gaṁtumāraddhō । dubbalapakkhattaṇaō tā paḍiō addhamaggammi
taddēsamā gaēhi gahiō sō tāvasēhiṁ kōḍḍēṇa । nīō niyayāvāsaṁ
karāviō sayalakalagahaṇaṁ
tihi vārammi pasatthē miliūṇaṁ muṇikumārayajaṇēṇa । suganāsō tti salīlaṁ paiṭṭiyaṁ nāyamēyassa
tammōhamōhiyāī jaṇaṇī - jaṇayāṇi tassa tatthēva । āgaṁtūṇa ṭhiyāī suyavayaṇā lōyaṇaparāī
ēvaṁ vaccai kālō anna dinē suṇai sūyagō ēvaṁ । vakkhāṇaṁ kulavaiṇā kīraṁtaṁ tāva
jalahijalamajjhayārē harimēlō nāma atthi varadīvō । sahayārapāyavō atthi tassa īsāṇa kōṇammi
dēvāsuranara-kinnara-vijjāharamihuṇasēviyacchāō । amiyaphalō amiēṇaṁ sittō mūlāō dēvēhiṁ
dēvāṇubhāvaucciya tassa phalaṁ jōhajīvaī jīvō । tassa jarā rōgā vi hu nāsaṁti puṇannavō hōi
sōūṇa imaṁ vayaṇaṁ suyanāsō sūyagō vicitēi । asthi maha gamaṇasattī jarābhibhūyāṇi jaṇagāṇi
gaṁtūṇa tattha dīvē sahaya । raphalāṇi dōnni āṇēmi । niyajaṇaṇījaṇayāṇaṁ rōgaṁ ca jaraṁ ca nāsēmi
saṁpattajōvvaṇō jō na viṇīō hōi jaṇaṇi jaṇayāṇa । kiṁ tēṇa jaṇaṇijōvvaṇaviuḍaṇamēttēṇa puttēṇa
iya citiūṇa caliō kamēṇa pattō maṇicchiyaṁ ṭhāṇaṁ । darapakkā daḍhabaṁdhā duaṁbayāmaṁjarī gahiyā
valiō calaṁtapakkhauḍajaṇiyagurukhēya khēiyasarīrō । gamaṇāsattō saṁtō jalahijalē nivaḍiō sahasā
ētthatarammi diṭṭhō samuddadattēṇa pōyavaṇiēna । taddēsamā gaē gahiō saṁjāyakaruṇēṇa
bhaṇiō ya sō suēṇaṁ uvayārī jīviyappayāṇēṇa । majjha tumaṁ kiṁ kīrai paccuvayārē na mē sattī
tahavihu hasu aṁbayamēgaṁ mā kuṇasu patthaṇaṁ vihalaṁ । valipaliyarōgajaraharaṇapaccalaṁ divamāhappaṁ
jāīē cēva tiriō ēsō kammēhiṁ supurisasamāṇō । īya citiūṇa gahiyaṁ samuddadattēṇa aṁbaphalaṁ
laṁghittu lahuṁ jalahiṁ sugō gaō jaṇaṇi-jaṇayapāsamma । vaṇiō vihu vijayapuraṁ pattō khēmēṇa kusalēṇa
bhariūṇa thālamēgaṁ maṇi-mōttiyapavaravatthamāīṇaṁ । thālōvara tamaṁbaṁ mōttūṇa gaō nivasagāsē
naravaipāyāṇa purō thālaṁ mōttūṇa vihiyapaṇivāō । uciyāsaṇē nisaṇṇō puṭṭhō kusalaṁ nariṁdēṇa
hisiūṇa bhaṇiō raṇṇā kiṁ ēttha aṁbayā natthi । vaṇiṇā kahiō savvō jahaṭṭiō vaiyarō tassa
vimhiyamaṇēṇa suciraṁ tamaṁbayaṁ pēkkhiyaṁ' nariṁdēṇa । sammāṇiūṇa sēṭṭhī visajjiō niyayagēhammi
phalamēgaṁ parivārō bahuō mahavallahō ya tā nūṇaṁ । ēgāgiṇō na juttaṁ bhōttuṁ accabbhuyaṁ vatyuṁ
jaō-
dēvagurusaṁvibhattaṁ dinaṁ suhisayaṇabaṁdhavajaṇāṇa । jaṁ bhujjai taṁ bhuttaṁ sēsaṁ uyaraggivijjhavaṇaṁ
iya citiūṇa bhaṇiyā purisā rōvēi bīyamēyassa । pālēha payattēṇa jā phalai kahēha tā majjha
tēhi vi tahēva vihiyaṁ jāō aṁbō namaṁtasāhālō । darapikkaphalō rammō rakkhijjai paurapurisēhi
kaha kaha vi pavaṇapahayaṁ phalamēgaṁ nivaḍiyaṁ taō turiyaṁ । rayaṇīē visaraṇaṁ khaddhaṁ visabhāviyaṁ jāyaṁ
1 pulaiyaṁ pā0 । 2 aha jē0 ।

'jugāijiṇidacariya
daṭṭhaṇaṁ paccūsē paḍhamaphalaṁ nivaḍiyaṁ pamōēna । ghēttūṇa gayā purisā naravaiṇō pāyamūlammi
sāṇaṁdamāṇasēṇaṁ raṇṇā uvarōhiyassa taṁ diṇṇaṁ । tēṇa vi bhuttaṁtarasā paṁcataṁ pāviō vippō
savisāō naranāhō sahāsamakkhaṁ payaṁpiuṁ laggō । na hu hōi amayarukkhō visarukkhō ēsa maraṇaphalō
rē dhā dhā dhāvaha nisiyakuhāḍē gahāyavēgēṇa । āmūlaṁ taṁ chiṁdaha visarukkhaṁ kiṁ viyārēṇa !
tēhi vivachinna āhaō vāṇiō mahīvaiṇā । rē pāva pāva ! pāhuḍamuvaṇitō kaha na lajjihasi
pariṇāmiyabuddhīē dīhaṁ daṭṭhūṇa tēṇa vaṇiēṇa । bhaṇiō rāyā naravara ! nahavai visapāyavō ēsa
āṇēha phalaṁ ēga nivaḍiyarukkhāō jēṇa daṁsēmi । sāmissa paccayaṁ sayalalōyapaccakkhamihaṁ pi
naravaivayaṇēṇa lahuṁ phalamēgaṁ ghēttumāgaō purisō । jarajinō saḍiyataṇuṁ mariumaṇō āṇiō purisō
taṁ tassa phalaṁ dinaṁ jhaḍa tti sō rōgavajjiō jāō । saṁjāyapaccaēṇaṁ visūriyaṁ naravariṁdēṇa
aviyāriyakajjakarō jaha sō naranāha sōiuṁ laggō । taha mā tumaṁ pi pacchā pacchāyāvēṇa ijjhisi
vōlīṇō jāmō jāmiṇīē vīō samāgaō taiō । gahiyanisiyaggakhaggō saṁpattī raṇamuhā tattha
ghaḍiyā saddē nivō paribuddhō bhaṇaḥ kōvarattacchō । rē raṇasūrassa siraṁ ghēttūṇa lahuṁ samāgaccha
ki avaraddhamaṇēṇa bhaṇai nivō tujjha ki viyārēṇa ? । sō āha maha na sajjhō raṇasūrabhaḍassa sirachēō
aviyāriūṇa kajjaṁ kīrataṁ dēi dāruṇaṁ dukkhaṁ । suṇa sāvahāṇahiyaō sāmiya! avakhāṇayaṁ ēē
vissapurē vissaṁbhararāyā savvatthapāyaḍapayāvō । aṇṇadiṇē hēḍāūyavaṇiēṇa samappiō turaō
ārūḍhō naranāhō hēlāē haō pahāviō turiyaṁ । dhārijjatō vēgaṁ giṇhai vivarīyasikkhō vva
ēsa gaō ēsa gaō ēsō jāitti jaṁpiranarāṇa | maṇapavaṇajaiṇavēgō jhaḍatti addaṁsaṇī hūō
bahurukkhasauṇasāvayaghūyaḍaghukkāratā sajaṇaṇāē
aidulahabhattapāṇiyapaṇaṭṭa jiyajīviyāsāē
chūḍhō mahāḍavīē naranāhō tēṇa duṭṭhaturaēṇa । khinnō millai vaggaṁ ṭhiō haō sō vi uttiṣṇō
niyasāmi dōhakāri tti kaliyapāṇēhiṁ sō harī mukkō। rāyā vi saṇiya saṇiyaṁ vaḍapāyavamēgamallīṇō
sahā chuhā kilaṁtō jā ciṭṭhai naravarō tahiṁ tāva | pēcchai vaḍasāhāō jalabiṁdu nivaḍamāṇaṁ sō
aspāyavapatēhi puḍayaṁ kāū muyai tasē । darabhariyapuḍē bhamirō pavaṁgamō kaha vi saṁpattō
jāva karē kāūṇaṁ pathaṁpiyāmi tti vavasiō rāyā । tā tēṇa pavagēṇa bhūmīē pāḍiō puḍaō
ārūḍhō vaḍasāhāē vānarō naravaī vi savilakkhō । ghēttūṇa puṇō millai pattapuḍaṁ tammi ṭhāṇammi
bhariyaṁ puṇō vi giṇhai puṇō vi sō vānarō pavāḍēi । ēvaṁ ca tiṣṇi vārāē cautthavārāē parikuviō
citas rāyā kō ēsa vairiō majjha avayarai ēvaṁ । parisusiyatālu - galayaṁ mayaṁ pi maṁ māriō mahai
ēgaṁ va dō va tiṇṇi va bārāō khamijja jō khamī hōjja | vāraṁvāraṁ avayārakāriṇaṁ kōṇumarisējja ?
jai kaha vi puṇō vigdhaṁ kāhī maha ēsa vānarō pāvō । tā taha kaha vi karissaṁ jahā samappiti ālīō
puṇaravi mukkō raṇṇā puṇaravi payapūriō puḍō jāō । jā giṇhai puhaivaī tāva harī jhatti ōiṇṇāṁ
naravaikarāō dhuṇiuṁ bhūmīē nivāḍiō puḍō' hariṇā । parikuviyanaridēṇaṁ haō harī tikkhachuriyāē

siririsahasā midēsaṇā
1
samāsatthō
bhaṇa dēva !
sumariyapuvvabhavēṇaṁ lihiya miṇaṁ vānarēṇa savisāyaṁ । māpibasu vaccha ! salilaṁ ayagaramuniggayaṁ ēvaṁ
puvvabhavē tujjha piyā rāyā raṇasēharō ahaṁ āsi । kammavasā mariūṇa aḍavīē vānarō jāō
vānaralihiyaṁ daṭṭhūṇa naravaijāyagaruyanivvēō । niyacariyaṁ nidatō vunnamaṇō dukkhiō jāō
khaṇamēttēṇa vimukka pāṇēhiṁ pavaṁgamō marēūṇa । paḍhamanikāē juimaṁ mahiḍḍhiō vaṇayarō jāō
rāyā vi jāva picchai taṁ ṭhāṇaṁ tāva natthi sō biṁdū । ṭhāṇaṁtarē paḍatō diṭṭhō sō vimhiyamaṇēṇa
jā niyai uvari huttaṁ tā pēcchai ayagaraṁ mahāghōraṁ । tassa muhāō paḍataṁ lāla salilaṁ pibībhacchaṁ
ētthaṁtarammi tarasā payamaṇulaggā samāgayā sēṇā । pīyaṁ pāṇaṁ bhuttaṁ ca bhōyaṇaṁ naravaridēṇaṁ
ēsō ayagararuvēṇa kō vi maha vēriō mahāpāvō । iya citiūṇa raṇṇā sō vihu saṁpāviō nihaṇaṁ
ahaha maha bālavilasiyamahaha kahaṁ nigghiṇaṁ vihiyamēyaṁ । ēgaṁtahiō jīviyadāyā jaṁ ghāīō pavagō
na tahā maha vasaṇamiṇaṁ kammavasā nivaḍiyaṁ daha dēhaṁ । jaha nikkāraṇamāraṇakaraṇaṁ hariṇō duhaṁ dēi
tāsu viyāriyakaraṇaṁ suhamaulaṁ dēva ! dēi jīvāṇaṁ । aviyāriyakaraṇaṁ puṇa paē paē dēi dukkhāī
taiē vi vālī paharē turiē samāgaē pattō । karagahiya divva khaggō raṇappahō rāyapāsammi
ētthaṁtarammi paḍhiyaṁ muhamaṁgalapāḍhaēṇa purisēṇa । jō sahai na sō purisō parābhavaṁ nīyalōyāṇa
purisapayāhayadhūlī vi kuṇai kēsaggahaṁ lahuṁ cēva । sō tīē vina hu tullō parābhavē jō
taṁ suṇiya bhai rāyā kō paharē ēttha majjha saṁnihiō' । viṇayavihiyaṁjalīō raṇappahō bhaṇai
rē ! raṇasūrasarīraṁ khaṁḍākhaṁḍa karēha maha puraō । jēṇa disidēvayāṇaṁ dēmi bali niyayahatthēṇa
।
raṇasūrō raṇasūrī khalī kaō kēsari vva dujjōhō । mā hu karējja pamāyaṁ ruddhō rayaṇīē dēvassa
tā uggaryāmma sūrē haya-gaya-raha- jōhajaṇiyapaḍirakkha' । kāūṇa sāmisālaṁ pacchā taṁ māraissā mi
nisuṇēha tāva ēgaṁ kahāṇayaṁ jaṁ suyaṁ maē dēva ! । ēgammi purē kulaputtayassa bhajjā yā naulī ya
samamēva pasūyāōṁ parōpparaṁ paramapīijuttāō । puttāṇa vi tāṇa daḍhaṁ annānnaṁ vaṛḍhaī pīī
vaccatēsu diṇēsu niyadharavāvāra vāvaḍā jāyā । kulaputtassaya pariṇī puttaṁ maṁtrīē mōttūrṇa
putta naulōya duvē kīlaṁtā jāva tattha ciṭṭhati । tā vubbhaḍajamabhaḍabhiuḍibhīsaṇō āgaō sappā
khaiūṇa tayaṁ ḍibhaṁ valamāṇō naulaēṇa savvaviō । dhāvitu taō ruddhō sayakhaṁḍō sō kaō tēṇa
ruhirāvalittavayaṇō kulaputtayabhāriyāē sō puraō । tuha puttamāragō māriō tti cāḍūṇi pakarēi
ruhirāvalittatuṁḍaṁ ta daṭhṭhē sā gayā suyasamōvē । diṭṭhō paṁcattaga puttō aha tīē kōvēṇa
musalēṇa huō naulō sō vi maō takkhaṇā tahi ṭhāṇē । pacchā diṭṭhō sappō khaṁḍākhaṁḍi kaō tattha
pacchāyāvēṇa taō tīē maṇē dāruṇaṁ mahādukkhaṁ । saṁjāyaṁ tattha khaṇē suyamaraṇāō vi amahiyaṁ
tā paḍhamaṁ kōvavasē jā buddhī hōi sā na kāyavvā । kiṁpāgaphalāṇaṁ piva na suṁdarō tīē pariṇāmō
ēvaṁ bhaṇiūṇa ṭhiō raṇappahī jāva tāva rayaṇī vi । rīṇō akayasuhāṇa va maṇōrahāhiyayamajjhammi
māgahajaṇamaṁgalatūrasaddasavaṇēṇa bōhiō rāyā । kayapābhāiyakiccō vimaṇamaṇō ciṭṭhaē jāva

270
jugāiji ṇidacariyaṁ
tāvāgaō turaṁtō vimalamaī nāmarāyabaramaṁtī । viṇaṇa paṇamiūṇaṁ rāyāṇaṁ bhaṇiumāḍhattō
dēva ! raṇasūrabhiccō dēvaṁ viṣṇavai tumha payapuraō । jai khuṭṭō navakhaṁḍa attāṇaṁ attaṇā kāhaṁ
raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ āṇēha āṇiō namiya bhaṇai naranāhaṁ । kiṁ nikkāraṇakōvō kīrai amhārisāṇurvāra
raṇṇā bhaṇiyaṁ paccakkhadaṁsaṇē kahamakāraṇē kōvō । sō āha sayaṁ sāmiya ! bhōgaṁgakaraṁḍayaṁ pēccha
diṭṭhō karaṁḍamajjhē khaṁḍākhaṁḍī kaō mahāsappō । vimhiyamaṇēṇa puṭṭhō raṇṇā kō ēsa paramatthō
āmūlāō savvō vi sāhiō vaīyarō naridassa । tuṭṭhō rāyā diṇṇaṁ vatthāharaṇāiyaṁ tassa
sāmaṁta maṁti-bhaḍa bhōiyāulē maṁḍavē nisaṇṇassa । ujjāṇāō purisō samāgaō suṁdarō nāma
dēva ! tuha malayatilaē ujjāṇē sūriṇō samōsariyā । bahusamaṇasaṁghasahiyā bahussuyā sutthiyā nāma
sakkāriūṇa purisō visajjiō appaṇā saparivārō । gayakhaṁdhasamārūḍhō caliō guruvaṁdaṇaṭṭhāē
aha tipayāhiṇapuvvaṁ sutthiyasūri namēvi naranāhō । uciyāsaṇē nisaṇṇō dhammaṁ sōuṁ samāḍhatō
bhō bhō bhavvā! nisuṇēha dhammasavvassamappaṇō patthaṁ । bhāvāṇusāraō cciya sahalaṁ savvamaṇudvāṇaṁ
tā suhajjhāṇavisuddha kāyavvā hōi sayalajōgēsu । sō puṇa kasāyakalusiyacittassa na jāyaē niyamā
nīyāṇa nayaṇa - vayaṇēsu vasai dēhēsu majjhimanarāṇa । uttimanarāṇa kōvō kālēṇa phalēṇa nivvaḍai
savvuttimapurisāṇaṁ hōṁti kasāyā na cēva kaiyā vi । aha huṁti maraṁti maṇē maṇayaṁ pina pāyaḍā huṁti
jaō--
dhannāṇaṁ khu kasāyā jagaḍijjaṁtā vi parakasāēhiṁ । nēcchati samuṭṭhēuṁ suniviṭṭhō paṁgulō cētra

ēkkō dō va tiṣṇava kahavi tulaggēṇa jai guṇē hōṁti । kalikālē jammi puṇō butthaṁ sabvēhi vi guṇahi
sīsēhi tasma raiyaṁ cariyamiṇaṁ vaddhamāṇasūrīhi । hōu paḍhaṁtasutāṇa kāraṇaṁ mōkkhasōkkhassa
paṇamāmi pāsapāē duhamgisaṁtattasattamuhacchāē । guṇagakhyaniyagurūṇa vi namāmi payapaṁkayaṁ payaō
tihuyaṇa mariō vvariēṇa niyajasēṇēva dhavilayasarīrā । kaviyaṇaima hakayavāsā sarassaī jayai supayāsā
girisariyā rapavajjhamāṇapakkhalaṁtapaya payārillā | dubbalagōṇi vva girā mahājaṇa sudhīvarēṇēva
